Saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat Tupana ehay moherep hat Iona Tupana tipo­ꞌoro tawa Niniwe kape yt naku i rakaria kape wẽtup ywania kape. Pyno apoꞌare — Kat pote Iona Pira wato hunmỹꞌã pe myeꞌym eꞌat pe toĩneꞌen hap ete e. Pira wato hunmỹꞌã pe toĩneꞌen myeꞌym eꞌat. Miꞌi hawyi pira teꞌen neꞌi yi Niniwe pe hawyi Iona tuwẽtem naꞌyn. Miꞌi hap tawa Niniwe piaria tikuap taꞌyn hawyi taꞌa­tukuap pywo Iona ti Tupana mipo­ꞌoro hap. Myeꞌym eꞌat pe ikuꞌuro pira hunmỹꞌã hawyi tuwẽtem e. Miꞌi hap ewy aru atunug e. Uito ti Miitꞌin Ykeꞌet Sese e Iesui miꞌi hawyi arẽtem guꞌuro pyi i raꞌyn hawyi aremo­herep i aru ehowawi Iona ewy e. Myeꞌym eꞌat hap ete uiku­ꞌuro hawe yi hunmỹꞌã pe uisyp hawe arepy­huꞌat myeꞌym eꞌat hawyi arẽtem guꞌuro pyi hawyi eweikuap aru pywo Uito Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Miitꞌin Ehakye­raꞌat Hanuat hap are e Iesui.

Saꞌa­wyꞌi sese wẽtup ywania porekuat hary­poria kawiat tut pya pyi at wẽtem hap moran kai tut morekuat pot Sarumãu weꞌeg hap kapiat tuwa­nẽtup hamo ihay se kuap hamo tut e. Meiũran ti aru karãpeĩ Tupana henoi uwe waku uwe yt naku i e hap eꞌat piat turan toĩneꞌen itote saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat morekuat hary­poria kawiat eiminug yt naku i hap enoi hanuat e katu­pono saꞌa­wyꞌi pya pyi tut morekuat Sarumãu kapiat iweꞌeg hap kapiat tuwa­nẽtup hamo maꞌato koitywy Uito areĩneꞌen eipy­ꞌa­setpe poꞌog uiweꞌeg aseꞌi morekuat Sarumãu kai maꞌato uhehay kape yt eweiwa­nẽtup teran hin i raꞌyn eipe e. Miꞌi pote mekewat wẽtup ywania poꞌog waku Tupana wanẽtup hawe eikai e. Miꞌi pote mekewat eꞌat pe aru — Kat pote yt eweimohey i Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Sarumãu Saipepiat e aru ehepe mekewat morekuat hary­poria kawiat yi Sapa piat eiwe­mõti hamo e Iesui tehay pun haria pe.

Iꞌewyte meiũran ti aru mekewat Tupana uwe waku uwe yt naku i e hap enoi hamuat hap eꞌat pe ti aru tawa Niniwe piaria henoi — Eipe yt nakuaria i iꞌatuꞌe ehepiat katu­pono saꞌa­wyꞌi miꞌiria teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup Tupana ehay enoi hat Iona mienoi kapiat hawyi teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok kahato Tupana kape. Maꞌato eiperia yt eweiꞌaipok hin i Tupana kape Uito ti rat poꞌog Iona kai pytkai e. Taꞌi eipy­ꞌa­setpe areĩneꞌen wen maꞌato uimienoi kape yt eweiwa­nẽtup hin i e.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi poꞌog Iesui henoi — Yt uwe i migꞌi wo hytmoi ariãty hot hap e. Yt taꞌa­tupag hin i kamũti kaꞌa pe maꞌato ipytyp sese pe yn taꞌa­tupag ariãty hot hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi wehytꞌok haria teꞌe­ra­ꞌa­kasa raꞌyn hawyi tehaꞌat kuap heremo hawyi e.

Yne heremo aheha pytig pote. Ihotꞌok hawyi aheha koꞌi wo wata­ꞌa­kasa kuap yne raꞌyn e. Miꞌi pote eheha koꞌi ariãty ewywuat eipiit piat moẽtyhot hamo e. Waku aheha koꞌi pote waku kahato heremo kahato yne yne maꞌato yt aheha pytig i yt kat i heremo ahepe. Wati­ky­ꞌesat muꞌap kuap hamo maꞌato ahoꞌo­wasat hap ewy watoĩ­neꞌen at toĩneꞌen pytkai are e. Eipyꞌa piat uimohey hap hawyi eheha wakuat ewywuat toĩneꞌen hawyi heremo kahato muꞌap Tupana kapiat hap maꞌato yt naku i kyꞌesat haria eipe pote ariãty yt nakuat i ewywuat eipyꞌa pe toĩneꞌen. Miꞌi pote saꞌag hap yn eweikat are e. Miꞌi hawyi eipiit puo iꞌypyryp we sese topy­huꞌat e. Yt naku i hap nug neran haria eipe pote yt eheha pytig i rakaria ewywuat eweikup­teꞌen e. Miꞌi pote iꞌypyryp wiat gupteꞌen haria ewy eweikup­teꞌen kahato eipe hawyi eipiit puo eheĩneꞌen hap yt naku i pe topy­huꞌat e. Miꞌi pote Tupana kuap hap yt kat i eipyꞌa pe yt uimohey i eipe pote e. Waku hap yn eweiky­ꞌesat pote eheha koꞌi ariãty wakuat ewywuat topy­huꞌat e. Miꞌi hawyi yt kat i iꞌypyryp hap eipiit pe. Eheĩneꞌen hap ete hẽtyhot hap yn ehete e.

PIAT EWYIesui piat taꞌa­tu­nãpin kahu turan putꞌokꞌe Musei miwan enoi hat hawyi toꞌe — Toꞌiro uiꞌyat kape watenuk hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toto raꞌyn hupi iꞌyat kape. Putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe hawyi taꞌapyk yparakai ypyke maꞌato yt tuwe­posei i tenuk hamo.

Miꞌi pote Musei miwan enoi hat tuwa­nẽtup — Kat pote som yt tuwe­posei i Iesui aheko ewy e. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe — Tupana miky­ꞌesat koꞌi toĩ yne miwan me wen miꞌi hap koꞌi eweiwaure hawyi wẽtup sehay ehenoi e. Eipe ti eheko wẽtup enoi kahato haria e. Eheko upi eiwe­piitsei sei kahato eiwe­posei kahato eikoho koho kahato hawyi — Waku kahato aito mesup Tupana wanẽtup hawe eweiꞌe eipyꞌa pe e. Maꞌato yt miꞌi tã hin i are e. Eiperia ahekuiꞌa koꞌi ipitpit kahato hap ewywuat are e. Aikotã eiwe­kui­ꞌa­koho kahato iꞌokpe ete maꞌato ehekuiꞌa pyꞌa yt eiwepyi hin i miꞌi pote miꞌu nem ipyꞌa pe toĩneꞌen hap ewy e. Eipo pe ete waku kahato yt ipitpit hin i maꞌato eiwa­nẽtup hawe ipitpit hap ewy toĩneꞌen e. — Yt weꞌeg i kahato rakaria ti rat eipe e. — Pyno Tupana aipiit nug hat pote waku aipiit sei hap watunug at kaꞌap imowepit hamo eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope e. Maꞌato pywo pe areꞌe ehepe aiwa­nẽtup hap aipyꞌa piat nug hat Tupana toĩneꞌen wy are e. Miꞌi pote waku aipyꞌa piat aiwa­nẽtup hap sei hap watunug at kaꞌap wy imowepit hamo are e. Maꞌato eipyꞌa ipitpit hap ywytip hap eweiwaure kahato raꞌyn e. Eiwa­nẽtup hap eipyꞌa koꞌi ipitpit kahato eiminug saꞌag koꞌi wo e. Yt eiweꞌeg hin i ti rat katu­pono eipiit painug hap yn ewetunug maꞌato eiwa­nẽtup hap eipyꞌa piat painug hap yt kat i Tupana wanẽtup hawe are e. Eipiit koꞌi ikahu kahato yt ipitpit hin i wen maꞌato eipyꞌa koꞌi yt ikahu hin i eiminug saꞌag koꞌi wo e. Eipitpit kahato eiwa­nẽtup saꞌag koꞌi wo e. Taꞌi eiwepyi kahato ehekuiꞌa koꞌi ok pe ete maꞌato yt eiwepyi hin i kat som nem toĩneꞌen ehekuiꞌa koꞌi pe hap e. Waku poꞌog aiwa­nẽtup hawe — Pyno waku atiꞌa­tu­mõꞌẽ uimiꞌu uheka­reꞌen yt hekat i rakaria pe hatek takaria pe miꞌi hawyi Tupana mowepit hat areĩneꞌen e hap kape poꞌog waku watu­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap — Uiposei sio yt e hap kape yn watu­wa­nẽtup hap kai are e.

Miꞌi hawyi poꞌog Iesui toꞌe — Urutunug uruposei hap pote poꞌog waku urutoria eikai e haria eipe e Iesui tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe miꞌi pote eipe ti rat yt naku i poꞌog Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. — Taꞌi wẽtup hyt uꞌi 10 hyt uꞌi kaipyi atum Tupana pe pote poꞌog waku uito iraniaꞌin kai eweiꞌe neꞌi maꞌato Tupana — Yt naku i kahato eipe e. Eipe eimiꞌu apopyt hit kaipyi eweihoꞌoium Tupana pe hawyi — Waku poꞌog tora­niaꞌin kai urutu­kup­teꞌen eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope neꞌi wen maꞌato Tupana kyꞌe hap ete iꞌewyte miitꞌin kyꞌe hap ete waure wo kahato eweikup­teꞌen e. Waku watum Tupana aimiium wẽtup hyt 10 hyt aheꞌuꞌi hap kaipyi maꞌato poꞌog waku watum aipiit yne Tope waku poꞌog wati­ꞌa­tu­kyꞌe miitꞌin e Iesui.

— Taꞌi eipe ti iraniaꞌin miat eimõ­typot hap yn eweiky­ꞌesat haria eipe maꞌato Tupana piat eimõ­typot hap yt eweiky­ꞌesat hin i haria eipe e. Tupana eimõ­typot hap yt eweikat hin i hawyi e. Tupana mõtypot yat pe eiꞌapyk hap poꞌog wakuat iraniaꞌin kawiat hap eweiky­ꞌesat e. Iꞌewyte yne tawa pe muꞌap upi ehekat kyiꞌat hap tote miitꞌin wẽpowat kahato hap eimõ­typot hamuat hap yn eweikat at kaꞌap maꞌato Tupana piat eimõ­typot hap yt eiwekat hin i e. Yt naku i are mesu­wa­ro­tiaria kaipywiat yn eimõ­typot hap toĩneꞌen hawyi yt kat i Tupana kaipywiat eimõ­typot hap toĩneꞌen e Iesui woꞌo­muꞌe haria pe.

Aiko­hye­wyry tuereto woꞌosyp hap tote turan yt watikuap hin i aikope aikope ikuꞌuro rakaria toĩneꞌen yi pe aimisyp koꞌi saꞌa­wyꞌi katu­pono yt heremo i te itote e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato eiperia e. Taꞌi eipe ti woꞌosyp hawiat hap gupteꞌen haria yt heremo i rakat ewywuat are e. Taꞌi miitꞌin teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup eimienoi kape maꞌato ehehay kaipyi yt taꞌa­tukuap hin i Tupana hawyi iꞌatu­mohun hap yn topy­huꞌat eimienoi kaipyi e. Eimienoi ikuꞌuro rakat nem nakat ewy e wẽtup sehay moherep haria pe yt Tupana e hap ewywuat moherep haria pe.

Pyno itote toĩneꞌen wẽtup ok miit uwe waku uwe yt naku i e morekuat piat hat. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe Iesui pe — Are pãi etimohit kahato urumuꞌe haria akag koꞌi iꞌatu­minug saꞌag hap ete Uhyt e. Pyno kat som ereꞌe teran uruepe sio uruto waku sio yt sio uruto iraniaꞌin aimuꞌe haria akag koꞌi ewy ewanẽtup hawe sio yt katu­pono uruto poꞌog morekuat ehay kuap haria tora­niaꞌin kai sio miit tiꞌa­parap morekuat ete sio yt e haria uruto pote e Iesui pe.

Miꞌi pote Iesui tiwesat — Yt uheso i uhyt e. Eweikuap kahato miwan eiperia e. Kat som waku miitꞌin tunug kat som yt naku i hap e. Miꞌi hawyi uruikuap poꞌog iraniaꞌin kai eweiꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi miitꞌin airo haria eweikup­teꞌen miwan moherep hap kaipywiat haria wo eweikup­teꞌen e. — Wãi wãiꞌe­weiꞌe hap yn miitꞌin kape — Yt etunug neiꞌo eweiꞌe hap yn miꞌi pote waku nug haria yt tunug kuap i wakuap katu­pono waku nug haria pyhyp haria eweikup­teꞌen morekuat e hap kaipyi e. Yt uheso hin i mehĩ eiperia ti eweikup­teꞌen aikotã ipotyi rakat ewy eiwo­ꞌo­ꞌapyk miitꞌin okpe tote haria ewy hawyi yt taꞌa­tu­hupit kuap i ti ehehay ipotyi rakat are e. Eweipo­rokpun yt hekat i rakaria okpe tote morekuat ehay ipotyi rakat hawyi — Ewetunug o morekuat e hap ewy eweiꞌe maꞌato yt pote surara po pe uruipag eipe ehatyꞌi hatyꞌi hamo eweiꞌe e. Morekuat ehay nug hap ete yt eweipo­wyro hin i hatek takaria e. Iꞌewyte yt ewetunug hin i ti morekuat piat einãpin hap koꞌi eimi­mo­herep hap koꞌi e hap ewywuat e. Miꞌi pote typy ihay rakaria ewy eweikup­teꞌen are e. Pyno ti eimienoi aikotã aikotã ipotyi kahato rakat ewy — Ewetunug no ewetunug no eweiꞌe hap yn uruepiat eiꞌa­tu­nãpin hap ewy ewetunug o eweiꞌe maꞌato ti iꞌewyte eipe yt ewetunug hin i eiꞌe hap ewy iraniaꞌin miat eiꞌe hap ewywuat e miꞌi pote ti Tupana wanẽtup hawe yt nakuaria i sese eipe e. Miꞌi pytkai yt eiwe­mõti hin i ehaꞌa­seꞌi minug saꞌag koꞌi ete katu­pono ehaꞌa­seꞌin koꞌi tukup­teꞌen eiꞌe­wy­wuaria koꞌi e. Saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria eiꞌy­wotꞌin tiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi e. Taꞌa­tu­moma teran kahato Tupana ehay moherep haria koꞌi e. Miꞌi hap ewy te ti eiperia eweikup­teꞌen ahaꞌa­se­ꞌiꞌin saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria ewy te eweikup­teꞌen Tupana ehay moherep haria auka haria eperia are e Iesui more­kuaria wãiꞌe hap moherep haria pe.

Yt nakuaria i kahato eipe. Yt eiwe­mõti hin i ehaꞌa­se­ꞌiꞌin minug koꞌi ete. Saꞌa­wyꞌi taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato Tupana ehay enoi haria Tupana mipo­ꞌo­roria koꞌi e. Miꞌi hawyi eipe eweiꞌa­tu­mo­kahu ehaꞌa­se­ꞌiꞌin miꞌa­tu­ꞌuka syp hap koꞌi e Tupana mipo­ꞌoro tehay moherep hamuat syp hap koꞌi. Mesup ti eweiꞌa­tu­mõ­typot kahato ehaꞌa­se­ꞌiꞌin miꞌa­tu­ꞌuka koꞌi woꞌosyp hawiat iꞌatuꞌkag koꞌi katu­pono eiwe­mõti kahato eipyꞌa pe ehaꞌa­se­ꞌiꞌin minug saꞌag koꞌi maꞌato eiꞌy­wotꞌin ewy te eweikup­teꞌen katu­pono mesup te ti eweiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka teran Uito iꞌewyte yne Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi are e. Yt nakuaria i sese ti eipe — Uruto poꞌog torania kai eiꞌe pytkai e. Taꞌi aikotã aikotã tohenoi saꞌa­wyꞌi miwan me ehetiat hap ewy mesup ewetunug e. Mio tã e ti saꞌa­wyꞌi Tupana — Uhemiitꞌin iraniaꞌin taꞌa­tu­ꞌauka e. Iraniaꞌin ti taꞌa­tu­sa­tyꞌi satyꞌi yne iraniaꞌin taꞌa­tu­mohit mohit e Tupana ti miwan me ehepiat pe e Iesui toꞌauka teran haria pe. Series,

Pyno ti koitywy ehepiat Tupana ihay mekewat miwan me saꞌa­wyꞌi — Taꞌi koitywy eiꞌy­wotꞌin miꞌauka uimi­po­ꞌoro koꞌi suu koꞌi yne yne eipo ete te topy­huꞌat e. Ehepe yt heremo i maꞌato uheha pe ti tuwekuap uhemiit suu yn ni eipo ete e. Iꞌewyte ti mesup te ti eweikup­teꞌen uimi­po­ꞌoro atuꞌuka rakaria e. Taꞌi eiꞌy­wotꞌin ewywuaria eipe eweikup­teꞌen e. Haꞌa­wynug hap tote­pyi­wiaria te wẽtup ywania yn mesup te eweikup­teꞌen. Yt uheso hin i uhytꞌiꞌin. Tupana miꞌa­piheg kahato koꞌi aru eweikup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e. Katu­pono ehaꞌa­seꞌiꞌin minug upi ewetunug ne e. Iꞌatu­sai­pe­piaria sese te ti eweikup­teꞌen e Iesui toꞌauka teran haria pe. Saꞌa­wyꞌi sese ti ahaꞌa­seꞌi pot Atãu saꞌyru Apeu ehaꞌa­seꞌi Kãi tiꞌauka toywyt Tupana mohey sese hat Apeu. Toipun kahato toywyt suu yi tote. Miꞌi hap ewy te Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi eweiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka e Iesui toꞌauka teran haria pe. Saꞌa­wyꞌi Tupana mipo­ꞌoro aseꞌi Sakaria eiꞌy­wotꞌin miꞌauka wo toĩneꞌen. Ipotpap kahato Tupana mõtypot hap etiat. Tupana mõtypot hap yat etiat turan toiwuk yne miitꞌin miium Tupana kapiat hawyi tuwẽtem Tupana ehamo turan eiꞌy­wotꞌin tiꞌauka raꞌyn Tupana mõtypot yat pe e. Taꞌi saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat Tupana mohey hat Apeu taꞌa­tu­ꞌauka iꞌewyte Tupana mipo­ꞌoro Sakaria taꞌa­tu­ꞌauka wy iꞌewyte iraniaꞌin Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato eiꞌy­wotꞌin miꞌauka koꞌi tukup­teꞌen e. Pyno mesup te ti eiperia eiꞌy­wotꞌin ewywuat eweikup­teꞌen ne e Iesui toꞌauka haria pe.

Yt naku i wo kahato eipe miwan moherep haria ete are e. Eipe ti rat okenꞌypy pyhyp haria ewywuaria Tupana mienoi koꞌi ete are e. Eweikuap kahato Tupana ehay Musei mimo­herep poꞌog torania kai. Iraniaꞌin tikuap teran Tupana etiat maꞌato yt ewehenoi hin i iraniaꞌin me e. Tupana kuap teran haria mesuwe tukup­teꞌen maꞌato yt eweho­ꞌo­ken­hypꞌok hin i ikyꞌesat haria pe. Taꞌi muꞌap Tupana kapiat eweikuap wen maꞌato yt eweiwat i miꞌi upi iꞌewyte yt ewehenoi hin i iraniaꞌin me e. yt ewehenoi hin i muꞌap Tupana kuap hamo iꞌewyte yt eiwe­hytꞌok hin i wy mekewat okenꞌypy puo hawyi seke teran haria pysokpun haria eweikup­teꞌen e Iesui — Uwe waku miꞌa­piheg wo uweꞌin yt e haria morekuat piat haria pe.

Mio tã Iesui toꞌe hawyi iꞌatu­py­ꞌahak sese Iesui ete nagnia ehay enoi haria iꞌewyte miwan enoi haria iꞌatu­py­ꞌahak kahato mio tã e pote. Miꞌi hawyi apo apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe kahato at Iesui pe kat ehay kat ehay pirik kahato itote Iesui ete tuꞌuka teran haype. Taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat sehay Iesui kaipyi iwemaꞌat hap iꞌauka hamuat hap taꞌa­tu­mõ­py­ꞌahak teran Iesui hap maꞌato yt toiꞌa­parap hin i towesat hap ete. Miꞌi hawyi yt taꞌa­tu­waure hin i taꞌa­tu­py­ꞌahak Iesui ete. Iꞌaparap hap taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat haype taꞌa­tukat kahato. Taꞌa­tu­maꞌat hap yn taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat. Miꞌi pote migꞌi wo teran Iesui taꞌa­tusat iꞌypyryp wyi aikotã wamiri ewy tukup­teꞌen Iesui pytyp teran hap ete iꞌaparap hap taꞌa­tukat kahato ihay kaipyi maꞌato ti yt taꞌa­tu­puẽti i hawyi taꞌa­tu­henoi teran sura­raꞌin miat iꞌauka Iesui iꞌaparap hap taꞌa­tukat hawyi maꞌato yt taꞌa­tunug kuap i katu­pono Iesui waku yn ihay waku yn tutunug mote.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi miitꞌin sem kahato teꞌe­ru­wa­ꞌa­tunug Iesui ewawi taꞌa­tu­moe­hãite hap taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato. Miꞌi pote toꞌo­pykit pykit neꞌi iꞌatu kahato hemig neran haria. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe temiitꞌin me — Eiweꞌeg woꞌo Tupana ehay ran enoi haria pupi e. Miꞌiria typy sehay enoi haria e. — Uruto poꞌog urikuap Tupana ehay torania kai iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi — Waku kahato eipe iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­pot­mu­ꞌeria pe maꞌato — Yt nakuaria i eipe e Tupana iꞌatue­mi­mu­ꞌeria pe pytkai e. Taꞌa­tu­suꞌat kahato Tupana wenãpin miwan miat wen maꞌato yt taꞌa­tunug hin i aikotã Tupana toꞌe hap ewy. — Waku kahato uruto iꞌatuꞌe miitꞌin me hawyi — Pywo ti rat waku kahato eipe e iraniaꞌin miꞌiria pe maꞌato — Yt naku i kahato eipe e i Tupana miꞌiria pe katu­pono Tupana piat ainãpin hap taꞌa­tu­suꞌat kahato pytkai yt naku i kahato taꞌa­tunug migꞌi wo. Sehay ikahu kahato rakano taꞌa­tu­henoi wen maꞌato iꞌatu­minug koꞌi yt naku i kahato e. Typy hẽku rakaria ewywuaria miꞌiria yt ewetunug neiꞌo miꞌiria ewywuat are. Taꞌi manĩ puk koꞌi ewywuat neꞌi miꞌi haria are e. Manĩ kurin kat ipyp takat watopag manĩ pakup we hawyi toimo­ꞌokpuk neꞌi ipakup takat e. Pyno eipe ti yt eiweꞌeg i pote iꞌatu­minug saꞌag koꞌi timo­wato neꞌi aru yt naku i nug ehepiat hamo e. Pyno waku eiweꞌeg wo iꞌatu­minug koꞌi ewywuat nug hap pupi are e katu­pono miꞌiria ti manĩ puk ewy meiũran ti eipe eiꞌe­wyte eweikup­teꞌen miꞌiria ewy e. Iꞌewyte yne huwy piat ewywuat iꞌatu­minug koꞌi migꞌi wo iꞌatu­mi­ꞌa­pyhik koꞌi meiũran aru Tupana tiꞌa­tu­mo­herep wuatꞌi ehamo e. Meiũran ti aru heremo kahato iꞌatu­minug saꞌag migꞌi wo topy­huꞌat wuatꞌi mikuap mo are e. Kat eweiꞌe som iꞌypyryp we meiũran ti aru Tupana timo­herep wuatꞌi miitꞌin ehamo sio waku sio yt hap are e. Aikotã wati­mo­herep ahehay ywaiti hap totepyi aheypa­rakai ywaiti hap kaipyi hap ewy toimo­herep aru wuatꞌi miitꞌin minug saꞌag wuatꞌi miitꞌin minug wakuap tehay wo wuatꞌi miitꞌin ehamo wuatꞌi miitꞌin ikuap hamuat e. Aikotã more­kuaria mipo­ꞌoro sehay ewywuat Tupana timo­herep wuatꞌi ehamo iꞌatu­minug saꞌag sio iꞌatminug wakuap e Iesui.

PIAT EWYUiwy­riaꞌin miitꞌin miat eiꞌauka hap pupi yt eweikenꞌẽ teiꞌo katu­pono eipiit auka hawyi yt kat i raꞌyn poꞌog taꞌa­tunug kuap ehete eiꞌauka hawyi. Maꞌato Tupana pupi waku eweikenꞌẽ kahato katu­pono Miꞌi ti eipiit toiꞌauka kuap iꞌewyte toipugha kuap eipe aria koro pe aikope ehoꞌopot hap toĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat hawe e. Miꞌi pote waku Tupana pupi eweimõ­typot kahato poꞌog poꞌog miitꞌin kai e.

Maꞌato Tupana aikyꞌe kahato e Iesui. Pywo kahato toiꞌa­tu­kyꞌe wuatꞌi miitꞌin. Miitꞌin yt uwe i mikyꞌe koꞌi toikyꞌe kahato e. Taꞌi miitꞌin kyꞌe kahato hat Uiꞌywot e. Poꞌog aikyꞌe iraniaꞌin aikyꞌe haria kai. Taꞌi ahetama pe wati­we­neru raꞌyn weitaria hit koꞌi haꞌup yt iwato hin i haꞌup typy ape kurin nakaria putꞌokꞌe 5 weita hit kyiꞌat hamo watoꞌe mesuwe yt haꞌup kahato rakat i miitꞌin wanẽtup hawe weita hit aimiꞌu apopyt watoꞌe. Yt kan hamo i weitaria miitꞌin iꞌatuꞌe maꞌato Tupana pyꞌa pe waku kahato yne tominug koꞌi e. Taꞌi toiꞌa­tu­kyꞌe kahato weitaria koꞌi e. Yt toiwaure hin i weitaria apykok hamo e Iesui. Yt eweikenꞌẽ teiꞌo uiwy­riaꞌin katu­pono eipe ti poꞌog kahato weitaria kai eikyꞌe Tupana e. Pyno aikuap kahato Tupana aikyꞌe haype are e. Taꞌi toikuap yne ahetiat e. Taꞌi toiꞌa­tukuap kahato yne ahepiat. Aipiit yne ete toikuap. Karania karania aiꞌasap koꞌi etiat toikuap yne. Wẽtup aiꞌasap taꞌat yi tote hawyi toikuap are. Miꞌi hap ewy aikuap Tupana e. Miꞌi pote yt naku i wato­kenꞌẽ miitꞌin pupi sio aiꞌauka sio yt hap pupi katu­pono aiꞌa­pykok kahato Aiꞌywot atipy piat e Iesui ahepe.

PIAT EWYPywo areꞌe ehepe uwe uwe yt tokenꞌẽ i uimohey hap moherep hamo ahewa­nĩ­kaptia ehamo aiꞌauka teran haria pe miꞌi e hat piat — Uhemiit kahato miꞌi miit areꞌe kahato atipy pe Uiꞌywot pe e. Miꞌi miit piat yt aremõti hin i e. Uito areĩeneꞌen Eheykeꞌet Koro iꞌewyte Eikywyt Koro wuatꞌi eꞌat pe uimohey hap eweimo­herep miitꞌin me — Uiꞌauka pote uiꞌauka maꞌato yt aremõti hin i Uimi­mohey moherep hamo e hat pe — Aimohey hat sese mekewat miit are Uiꞌywot sese atipy piat pe e Iesui.

Maꞌato — Yt atimohey i eweiꞌe iraniaꞌin me uhepiat — Uiꞌauka aru atimo­herep Uheykeꞌet Wato Uikywyt Wato iꞌatuepe hawyi uiꞌauka hap pypi arekenꞌẽ eweiꞌe hawyi iꞌewyte Uito ahenoi Uiꞌywot Atipy piat iꞌewyte yne Tupana yatypiat ieĩneꞌen haria itotiaria pe mio tã e hat etiat — Yt Uimohey kahato hat i miꞌi miit areꞌe aru itotiaria pe e Iesui.

Pyno ehehay saꞌag uhetiat Eheykeꞌet Koro etiat Eikywyt Koro etiat iꞌewyte saꞌag ewetunug uhete miꞌi pe ehẽtup Tupana pe paaꞌe­weiꞌe hap wywo pote Tupana tiwaure kuap eiminug saꞌag koꞌi uhetiat hap wen maꞌato wẽtup eiꞌe saꞌag hap Tupana yt tiwaure kuap i are. Karãpe Tupana Pãꞌãu toꞌe ehepe — Eweimohey ro Uhaꞌyru miꞌi hawyi eweiꞌe Tupana Pãꞌãu Wakuat pe — Eso eweiꞌe motoro yt atiky­ꞌesat i eꞌe hap katu­pono ahiag mẽpyt ri Emimo­herep Iesui eweiꞌe saꞌag eipyꞌa pe Tupana Pãꞌãu Wakuat pe pote Tupana yt karãpe i waure wo eiꞌe hap saꞌag eipyꞌa piat Topãꞌãu miat eiꞌe hap etiat are e Iesui tuwepiat. Pyno eiweꞌeg woꞌo — Eso eiꞌe Tupana Pãꞌãu miat eimuꞌe turanuat uhepiat hap pupi katu­pono pywuat sehay yn tohenoi uhetiat e Iesui — En ni ahiag mẽpyt e haria pe.

PIAT EWYUipot­mu­ꞌeria meiũran ti aru ehero­poꞌok teꞌe­ru­wa­ꞌa­tunug hap kape Tupana mõtypot yat kape taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­kagnia pyꞌa­setpiat — Miꞌiria yt naku i kahato rakaria taꞌa­tuꞌe hamo eimaꞌat sehay wuat eiꞌauka hamo eheroto surara kape e.

Miꞌi turan eheroto turan — Kat areꞌe aru atiꞌa­tu­wesat yt eweiꞌe i teiꞌo eipyꞌa pe eiwa­nẽtup hawe are katu­pono aikowat wakuat wyti aru iꞌatu­wesat hamuat Tupana Pãꞌãu henoi ehepe aru itote ihay aru toꞌe hap ok tã maꞌato eiwẽ pyi ihay e Iesui temiitꞌin me.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok miitꞌin tok pyi toꞌe Iesui pe — Urumuꞌe hat e uiꞌywot wyti ikuꞌuro raꞌyn maꞌato uiꞌywot ekareꞌen yt kat i tutum uhepe maꞌato uheykeꞌet pe tutum yne hawyi mesup uheykeꞌet yt hoꞌoium neran hin i uhepe uiꞌywot powatꞌyp pãi — Uiano uiano areꞌe pytkai yt toipatꞌok hin i e. Miꞌi pote atiky­ꞌesat kahato ehay ro — Ehoꞌo­patꞌok to eꞌywot ekat eywyt pe ere o uheykeꞌet pe e Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat — Are pãi Uito wyti yt atimõꞌẽ teran i eiꞌywot ekareꞌen koꞌi ehepe uhyt e. Yt ariot i mesuwat yi kape iraniaꞌin ekat mõꞌẽ hamo e. Pywo ti rat eweꞌeg wo o eheykeꞌet ekat kyꞌewi hap pupi areꞌe epe uhyt e. Tupana yt uipo­ꞌoro i mesuwe eꞌywot ekareꞌen mõꞌẽ hamo pãi e.

Mio tã toꞌe hawyi tohenoi yne itotiaria pe — Eiweꞌeg wo o meimuẽwat eheka­reꞌen iwato kahato kyꞌe kahato hap pupi e. Uhekat kahato teran eweiky­ꞌesat maꞌato eheĩneꞌen hap sese yt eweikat hin i hawyi yt eweipuẽti i wyti aru ehekat wuatꞌi eꞌat piat hap e. Mesu­wa­rotiat eheka­reꞌen iwato kahato hap kaipyi yt eweipuẽti hin i eipyꞌa piat eimo­wepit hap sese hap e.

Miꞌi hawyi hãꞌãkap wuat tohenoi ahekat kyꞌewi hap etiat. Mio tã toꞌe Iesui — Saꞌa­wyꞌi so toĩneꞌen wẽtup ok iko iwato kahato rakat iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi so toiꞌa­tukoi kahato yne teꞌyi koro tote hawyi so tuwenug kahato raꞌyn manĩ itote iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi so tutunug kahato uꞌi hawyi iꞌatu kahato uꞌi hyt ahyt koꞌi sem tutunug at kaꞌap hawyi — Aikotã som waku atunug aru e katu­pono Uheꞌuꞌi hyt ahyt kahato raꞌyn e so topyꞌa pe. Uiꞌyat koꞌi yne yt putꞌokꞌe hin i uheꞌuꞌi hyt ahyt ereko hamo e so. Pyno aikotã aru atunug aru e topyꞌa pe. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe tuwepe — Pyno atikuap taꞌyn aikotã waku uheꞌuꞌi hyt ahyt sem atimoheg wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e. Pyno waku atunug kahato uheꞌuꞌi hyt yat koro koꞌi hawyi waku uheypa­rakai sem itote atunug uheꞌuꞌi hyt ahyt sem koꞌi ereko hamo e so tuwepe. Pyno waku atiꞌa­tu­pugha uheꞌuꞌi yat pot koꞌi hawyi poꞌog iwato ikahu rakaria atiꞌa­tunug kahato uheꞌuꞌi hyt ahyt sem ereke hamo e so.

Miꞌi hawyi ti aru uimo­wepit hap toĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe katu­pono yt karãpe i aru yt uimiꞌu i hap toĩneꞌen uikai e so tuwepe topyꞌa pe tuwa­nẽtup hawe e. Taꞌi waku raꞌyn waku raꞌyn wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e. Uheꞌuꞌi iwato sese sakpo raꞌyn mesup waku pe raꞌyn aru areĩneꞌen pãi e so. Uiꞌok hap yn aru toĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi pote uheĩneꞌen hap waku pe areĩneꞌen uꞌi hyt ahyt sem pote e so topyꞌa pe tuwehum kahato tuwe­wawi haype. Mesup taꞌyn yne uimi­ky­ꞌesat ok tã wuatꞌi eꞌat pe atikyiꞌat kuap e so uꞌi saꞌup mo e so. Pyno waku uipohep taꞌyn wyti aru uipotpap hap koꞌi ete pyi hawyi uiwepit hap yn naꞌyn atikat hawyi arenuk at kaꞌap uimie­reko iwato kahato e. Karania eꞌat kapiat neꞌi miꞌi raꞌyn uheka­reꞌen e so topyꞌa pe e.

Miꞌi hawyi Tupana toꞌe tope atipy kaipyi — Yt eweꞌeg i kahato rasig e katu­pono mesup ewãtym wyti ekuꞌuro hap toĩneꞌen are e uꞌi wo hekat rakat pe. Miꞌi hawyi apuru uwe po pe ekareꞌen koꞌi sem topy­huꞌat e Tupana tekat iwato mohey hat pe e.

Mio tã e hãꞌãkap wuo tohenoi hawyi toꞌe itotiaria pe tomi­mu­ꞌeria pe — Miꞌi ewywuat teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat mesu­wa­ro­tiaria taꞌa­tue­ka­reꞌen etiat yn wehum haria e. Miꞌiria yt hekat rakaria i Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. Teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup kahato taꞌa­tue­ka­reꞌen ete hawyi iꞌatu­wa­nẽtup hawe yt putꞌokꞌe i Tupana kapiat teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup hamo e Iesui itotiaria waꞌa­tunug sok haria pe.
PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui henoi i raꞌyn topot­mu­ꞌeria pe — Uiwy­riaꞌin e yt naku i watu­wa­nẽtup yn aimiꞌu mesu­wa­rotiat kape e. Yt naku i aipiit piat ehesokpe koꞌi kape yn watu­wa­nẽtup e.

Katu­pono aheĩneꞌen hap wuatꞌi eꞌat piat aimo­wepit hap wuatꞌi eꞌat piat yt tut i aimiꞌu iwato kahato hap kaipyi iꞌewyte aipainug hap kaipyi aimo­wepit hap yt tut i e. Aiwepit sese hap yt tut i ahesokpe aipainug hap kaipyi are e. Taꞌi aimiꞌu sese ahesokpe sese ti tut Tupana miium kaipyi are. Miꞌi ti poꞌog waku watikat aimiꞌu koꞌi kai ahesokpe koꞌi kai are e.

Eiwe­haꞌat ro weitaria koꞌi kape e. Yt teꞌe­ru­we­miꞌu koi kuap i wen maꞌato Tupana tiꞌa­tupoi kahato weitaria koꞌi are e. Iꞌewyte yt kat i uꞌi hyt koꞌi taꞌa­tue­reko aito ewy maꞌato Tupana tiꞌa­tupoi kahato weitaria koꞌi yne eꞌat pe taꞌa­tu­he­wyry hap upi e. Pyno aito ti poꞌog poꞌog Tupana miꞌa­tu­kyꞌe koꞌi torania weitaria koꞌi kai are miꞌi pote aipoi kuap Tupana aikotã toipoi weitaria koꞌi ewy e Iesui.

Taꞌi pywo ti yt aity­pore i pote yt kan hamo i watu­wa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi katu­pono watu­wa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi haty wo pytkai aipiit moty­pore hap yt kat i toĩneꞌen e. Iꞌewyte — Pyno areĩneꞌen motꞌi kahato mesuwat yi tote e hap kape watu­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap aimo­kenꞌẽ hap wywo pytkai aiku­ꞌuro hap eꞌat tut aru hawyi yt watoĩ­neꞌen kuap i wẽtup eꞌat poꞌog watu­wa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi ahesaika hap wywo pytkai e. Pyno aipiit moty­pore hap yt watunug kuap i aiwa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi hawuo hap ewy yt kan hamo i aiwa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi — Are pãi are an yt kat i uimiꞌu hawyi uiku­ꞌuro uhesyꞌat hap upi pãi an aiwa­nẽtup aimo­kenꞌẽ hap upi hap yt kan hamo i katu­pono yt aiwa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi hap kaipyi ti aimiꞌu koꞌi toĩneꞌen e. Yt naku i paaꞌwa­toꞌe — Yt kat i uhesokpe hawyi uhatek hap sese toĩneꞌen hawyi uiku­ꞌuro aru yt kat i uhesokpe hawyi e hap upi yt naku i watu­wa­nẽtup saꞌag aimogyt hap ewy e Iesui ahepe. Series,

Uimohey haria e eiwe­haꞌat ro gaꞌapy pohyt koꞌi kape katu­pono tuwe­painug kahato gaꞌapy koꞌi ikahu kahato sese e. Taꞌi gaꞌapy yahig kape eiwe­haꞌat ro katu­pono tuwe­painug kahato i hupi itote ipohyt koꞌi wo ikahuria kahato rakaria miꞌiria e. Ikahu kahato poꞌog poꞌog ikahu saꞌay­ꞌiwuat ieĩneꞌen hat morekuat koro pot Sarumãu hekat rakat esokpe kahuria kahato rakat kai. Poꞌog poꞌog ikahu gaꞌapy piat pohyt koꞌi morekuat Sarumãu esokpe koꞌi kai e. Gaꞌapy piat pohyt koꞌi yt wepotpap haria i iꞌewyte yt teꞌe­ru­we­sokpe piꞌig kuap i haria tukup­teꞌen maꞌato iꞌatu­we­painug hap Tupana minug poꞌog ikahu ahesokpe kai are e.

Wuatꞌi eꞌat pe gaꞌapy piat koꞌi Tupana minug sokpe puo e. Gaꞌapy watitek hawyi mũki­ꞌite ipohyt pap taꞌyn aiko watunug hawyi e. Miꞌi hawyi igag hawyi aheꞌaria wo iꞌyp koꞌi watunug e. Uimohey haria kat pote yt eweimohey i Tupana tikuap kahato ahesokpe nug hap aipainug hap e. Yt eweikuap i te apo aikotã aito poꞌog Tupana mikyꞌe koꞌi gaꞌapy pohyt koꞌi kai hap e. Pywo kahato Tupana tum kuap ahepe ahesokpe e.

Miꞌi tupono yt naku i watu­wa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi yt kat i Tupana mohey hap wywo — Yt kat i uimiꞌu pote uiku­ꞌuro irane mũki­ꞌite aiwa­nẽtup aimo­kenꞌẽ hap upi e. Yt naku i — Uhatek hawyi kat som aru atuꞌu rat kat som uimẽpyt miꞌu wo aikope pyi aru uhesokpe e hap kape yn yt naku i watu­wa­nẽtup koꞌi koꞌi haty kahato aipyꞌa pe hap wywo yt kat i Tupana kapiat imohey hap wywo are e. Aikope pyi aru ahesapo hy pãi an yt naku i hawyi yt naku i aru e hap aimo­kenꞌẽ hap wywo yt naku i watu­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap aimo­kenꞌẽ hap ewywuat koꞌi hap upi e. Taꞌi yt Tupana mohey haria i mekewat koꞌi koꞌi kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap teꞌe­ro­kenꞌẽ hap wywo yt kat i Tupana mohey hap wywo maꞌato aito — Pywo pe wyti Tupana ti aimoieĩ­neꞌen kahato kuap hat waku watoꞌe e. Taꞌi Tupana tiꞌa­tukuap kahato ahesyꞌat yt ahesokpe i hap e. Taꞌi mesu­wa­rotiat iraniaꞌin ywania Yt Tupana kuap i haria taꞌa­tuꞌok hap taꞌa­tu­sokpe hap taꞌa­tuꞌyatnug hap kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap maꞌato yt atiky­ꞌesat i eipe miꞌiria ewy eweikup­teꞌen aikotã yt Tupana mohey i haria ewy e. Yt atiky­ꞌesat eipe miꞌiria ewy eweikup­teꞌen uiwy­riaꞌin maꞌato atiky­ꞌesat eweikat kahato aikotã pote waku miitꞌin muꞌe Tupana etiat hamuat hap kape e. Miꞌi hap kape yn poꞌog waku watu­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap hap atiky­ꞌesat e. Miꞌi hap ti watunug mote wati­puẽti kahato iraniaꞌin aimi­ky­ꞌesat koꞌi Tupana po pyi mekewat aiꞌok hap aiꞌyat koꞌi ahesokpe hap koꞌi wy e. Miꞌi hawyi waku eweiwa­nẽtup aikotã Tupana topy­huꞌat Wuatꞌi Ywania Porekuat nuat hap kape are e. Miꞌi hap eweikat poꞌog mesu­wa­rotiat koꞌi kai hawyi putꞌokꞌe aru ehepe eipoi­tyro hap mesu­wa­rotiat hap koꞌi eimoieĩ­neꞌen hap koꞌi eimiꞌu eiꞌyat eisapo hy eheꞌyni eimikoi ehesokpe koꞌi hawyi Tupana mipoi­tyro koꞌi eweikup­teꞌen ipo pyi are e Iesui ahepe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe tomohey haria pe — Uihũria koꞌi ewywuat no eipe are e. Yt typyꞌi kahato i eipe maꞌato yt eweikenꞌẽ teiꞌo katu­pono Tupana einug neran more­kuaria wo karãpe Tupana topy­huꞌat Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Morekuat nuat hap eꞌat pe e.

Waku wati­we­neru aheka­reꞌen miꞌi hawyi waku aheka­reꞌen saꞌup kaipywiat waku wahoꞌoium ahekat yt hekat i rakaria pe hatek takaria pe are e. Miꞌi watunug hawyi aheka­reꞌen sese iwato kahato toĩneꞌen atipy pe wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e. Miꞌi tote ahekat sese mohag hap toĩneꞌen aheiam yt karãpe i ipotꞌi rakat are e. Yt karãpe i ikahuro ahekat itote e. Iꞌewyte seroꞌok eharia yt tuwe­hytꞌok kuap i itote yt uwe i itote aipo­hari rakaria are e. Iꞌewyte aheka­reꞌen u haria koꞌi apeꞌi koꞌi sari koꞌi nupiꞌa koꞌi wẽkiꞌa ahekat u haria yt uwe i itote atipy pe e. Aheka­reꞌen atipy pe pote iꞌewyte eiwa­nẽtup hap aipyꞌa piat iꞌewyte tukup­teꞌen itote maꞌato eheka­reꞌen mesu­wa­rotiat yn tukup­teꞌen pote iꞌewyte eikyꞌe hap eiwa­nẽtup hap eipyꞌa piat toĩneꞌen wy mesu­wa­rotiat koꞌi ete yn e. Watu­we­haꞌat kahato aimi­kyꞌe koꞌi kyꞌewi hap kape are e. Pywo kahato aikope ahekat toĩneꞌen hap kape aiwe­wa­nẽtup hap iꞌewyte toĩneꞌen kahato are e. Aimi­kyꞌe kape yn aheha toĩneꞌen aiwa­nẽtup hawe are e Iesui ahepe.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup sehay Iesui henoi ahepe itote. Mio tã e — Waku woꞌoe­ropat haria ewywuat wato­py­huꞌat e. Mesu­wa­ro­tiaria tiky­ꞌesat kahato taꞌa­tue­ropat hap waku kahato rakat e. Waku Tupana eropat kahato haria watoĩ­neꞌen are e. Taꞌi ahetama pe karãpe more­kuaria tuwat taꞌa­tue­tawa pyi taꞌa­tu­ꞌatoiat taꞌa­tuꞌyat pe surara akag iꞌatuꞌyat piaria apykok hamo. — Eweꞌeg wo o uiꞌyat apykok hap ete e tesu­rara akag me. Araꞌaipok hawyi saꞌup iwato atum epe mehĩ e more­kuaria taꞌa­tuꞌyat piaria apykok haria pe. Miꞌi hawyi tuwat wẽtup tama kape hawyi waku yne hawyi teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok taꞌa­tuꞌyat kape taꞌa­tu­mẽ­pytꞌin kape. Miꞌi hawyi waku itote yne taꞌa­tuꞌyat piaria iꞌatu­wepit itote hawyi more­kuaria timõ­typot kahato taꞌa­tuꞌyat piaria apykok haria. — Waku kahato ti rat en uhyt mana e toꞌyat apykok haria pe e. Pyno waku watu­kup­teꞌen Tupana yat piaria apykok hat ewy e. Waku surara akag ewywuat aheropat Aipo­typot Tupana e. Aikotã ipotpap takaria ariãty wywo wãtym muat ipotpap yat piaria poi hamo mohag ium hamo aria nug hamo haria ewywuat waku wahe­ropat Tupana mẽpytꞌin e. Waku wate­ropat wãtym muo rakaria ewy haty pytkai yt watoket pytkai i waku wahe­ropat kahato Aiꞌakag emiitꞌin taꞌa­tu­kyꞌe hap wywo are e. Aikotã hesaika rakat ipiit sakup wywo rakat ewy waku watu­we­potpap Tupana mẽpytꞌin eropat hap upi e. Aikotã aheropat haria wãtym muo taꞌa­tupag ariãty aiꞌyat pe miꞌi hawyi yne heremo itote miꞌi hap ewywuat waku watu­we­potpap e. Waku aheꞌa­riãty imehit rakat ewy yt kat i iꞌytyk hap miꞌi ete hap ewy watu­we­potpap Tupana mẽpytꞌin kyꞌe hap yn ahete e. Taꞌi ahetama puo more­kuaria eropat haria hekatup kahato morekuat ut hap at kaꞌap taꞌa­tu­he­katup katu­pono putꞌokꞌe morekuat turan meremo taꞌa­tu­ho­ꞌo­ꞌo­kenhyp teran haype e. Miꞌi hawyi at kaꞌap taꞌa­tu­he­katup taꞌa­tu­mo­rekuat ut hap e. Miꞌi hawyi morekuat putꞌokꞌe toꞌo­ken­ꞌy­pyke hawyi meremo taꞌa­tu­ho­ꞌo­ꞌo­ken­hypꞌok teran hawyi taꞌa­tu­pysei aheko ewy waku hap ewy hawyi taꞌa­tupoi hawyi taꞌa­tu­mõ­typot kahato taꞌa­tu­kyꞌe taꞌa­tu­po­rekuat taꞌa­tu­potpap hap ete e. Miꞌi haria ewywuat waku watu­kup­teꞌen are e katu­pono tut irane Tupana akotã morekuat tut hoꞌo­kyiꞌat hap ienuk wato hap eꞌat kape hap ewy e. Miꞌi hawyi woꞌo­kyiꞌat hap enuk hap kapiat hut turan — Ariot raꞌyn eweiꞌo­ken­hypꞌok to e haty wo toꞌyat koro ete hawyi meremo heropat haria tuwat hawyi — Ereke ereke Urupo­typot iꞌatuꞌe hawyi teke e.

Heropat haria yt teꞌe­roket hin i teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat taꞌa­tu­ka­ꞌiwat putꞌokꞌe turan iꞌatu­wepit kahato yt teꞌe­roket i maꞌato taꞌa­tukat kaꞌap sio tut sio yt Aiꞌakag iꞌatuꞌe hap ete e. Miꞌi hawyi putꞌokꞌe hawyi iꞌatu­ka­ꞌiwat koro piit ete taꞌa­tue­sok­pepag hawyi — Eraꞌapyk o mehĩ mimi iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­ꞌakag sese pote e. Maꞌato karãpe teropat haria yt naku i rakaria ket kai neꞌi putꞌokꞌe morekuat pote teꞌe­ru­we­mõti kahato. Miꞌi hawyi okenꞌypy ete ihay taꞌa­tukuap taꞌa­tuket turanuat pote teꞌe­ru­we­mõti kahato maꞌato heropat hap etiat taꞌa­tu­potpap turanuat pote teꞌe­ru­wehum kahato taꞌa­tue­tu­ꞌisa ut hap ete e. Miꞌi hap ewy waku watu­we­potpap e. Miꞌi turan Aipo­typot putꞌokꞌe pote yt mesu­wa­rotiat morekuat minug ewy hin i tutunug Tupana are e. — Uheropat ro uheropat ro iꞌatuꞌe haty wo mesu­wa­ro­tiaria more­kuaria e. Maꞌato Aiꞌakag Tupana putꞌokꞌe hawyi — Woro­ho­ꞌo­kyꞌe kahato e yn ahepe hawyi aheropat hat ewy topy­huꞌat itote hawyi toihep tesokpe ikahu kahato rakat morekuat nuat esokpe miꞌi te pagꞌe topiit etewuat eropat hat esokpe ewywuat miꞌi hawyi toꞌe aru ahepe — Saꞌa­wyꞌi uheropat kahato haria waku kahato rakaria eipe e ahepe. Miꞌi pote koitywy areĩneꞌen eheropat hat eipotpap nug hat ewy areĩneꞌen e aru ahepe hawyi — Eraꞌapyk to uheypa­rakai ete hawyi woro­ho­ꞌopoi yne ehenuk hap koro ikahu kahato e aru Ahetu­ꞌisa Koro Tupana ahepe. — Taꞌi waku kahato eipe katu­pono yt eiket turanuat i putꞌok­ꞌare pote e. Pyno waku wato­py­huꞌat iweꞌeg kahato rakaria ewy watu­we­potpap Aika­ꞌiwat potpap nug hap ete uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin e Iesui katu­pono yt eweikuap hin i karãmuo putꞌokꞌe Aiꞌakag Koro hap sio ihotꞌok puo sio wãtymꞌi sio wãtym hake sio atpo­sake turan hap yt eweikuap hin i e. Pyno waku pe kahato watoĩ­neꞌen putꞌokꞌe Aiꞌywot Tupana yt watoket i te turan hap e Iesui temiitꞌin me ahepe. Pyno waku wate­ropat kahato katu­pono yt pya hin i putꞌokꞌe hamuat Wuatꞌi Potypot Nuat hap. Miꞌi tupono waku wate­ropat kahato aikotã — Putꞌokꞌe irane Ahetu­ꞌisa e haria ewy. Waku wati­ꞌa­ry­mary yne putꞌokꞌe turan hap atiky­ꞌesat e haria ewy katu­pono karãpe Aika­ꞌiwat aipok hap kat eꞌat pe turan kat eꞌat pe turan hap yt watikuap hin i pote e. Taꞌi tut wyti aru aikotã sero­ꞌokꞌe hap tut hap ewy yt uwe i ikuap hap ewy e. Mesu­wa­rote yt watikuap hin i karãpe putꞌokꞌe sero­ꞌokꞌe hat katu­pono migꞌi wo sero­ꞌokꞌe haria tõꞌẽ hap ewy. miꞌi tupono waku aiweꞌeg wo kahato sero­ꞌokꞌe hat hap pupi hap ewy katu­pono tuwe­hytꞌok aiꞌyat pe yt iheg i rakat pe meremo aheroꞌok hamo aheka­reꞌen koꞌi pohari hamo. Maꞌato aiweꞌeg wuat pote yt aheroꞌok kuap i miꞌi hap ewy kahato. Waku watu­kup­teꞌen sura­raꞌin ewywuat haria teꞌe­ra­haꞌat at kaꞌap takaria ewy miꞌi pote karãpe Eika­ꞌiwat putꞌokꞌe aru hawyi meremo eweikuap uhut hap mekewat sura­raꞌin ewywuat uhekatup pote are e. Uito areĩneꞌen Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Eykeꞌet wo Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Kywyt wo miꞌi pote ariot i te aru mesuwat yi kape are. Maꞌato mekewat uhut hap eꞌat pe yt uwe mikuap mo i ariot are. Mekewat uhut hap eꞌat yt iꞌatu hin i uhekatup haria tukup­teꞌen e. Mekewat eꞌat pe — Yt tut i iraꞌyn poꞌog Aika­ꞌiwat iꞌatuꞌe haria ahyt tukup­teꞌen are. — Yt tut i poꞌog mesuwat yi kape Aika­ꞌiwat e haria tukup­teꞌen hap eꞌat pe aru ariot aikotã sero­ꞌokꞌe hat ut hap ewy e Iesui ahepe tomohey haria pe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi e hap tohenoi hawyi ipotmuꞌe Peteru apoꞌe Iesui pe — Uruka­ꞌiwat e mekewat sehay iãꞌãkap ehay uwe pe ehenoi e sio uruto epotmu­ꞌeria piat muꞌe hano sio yne miitꞌin mesuwat yi totiaria muꞌe hamo ehenoi e.

Yt uruhe­katup i apuru eut hap kape sio iraniaꞌin yt emohey i haria kape mio tã ere e Peteru Iesui pe. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat — Pyno ahenoi uwe pe ahenoi mekewat uhehay iãꞌãkap. Karãpe mekewat morekuat toto turan tesu­rara akag po pe iweꞌeg kahato rakat po pe totoiat torania toꞌyat­piaria sem iꞌewyte tomẽ­pytꞌin hawyi — Etiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­pykok o uiꞌyat piaria areto hap turan e tope. Iꞌewyte etiꞌa­tu­po­ꞌoro miitꞌin mesuwe iꞌatupoi hamo iꞌatu­ꞌa­pykok kahato hamo e tesu­rara akag me e. Miꞌi surara akag ni uimohey haria apykok haria ewywuat kahato areꞌe uhehay iãꞌãkap upi e. Miꞌi pote eweꞌeg wo uimohey haria apykok hap pupi are ehepe e. Taꞌi uheropat haria sese pe mio tã are einãpin hamuat katu­pono atiky­ꞌesat kahato eiperia aikotã morekuat eropat haria powyro kahato sese rakaria ewy hap atiky­ꞌesat areto turan e. Atiky­ꞌesat kahato uhemiit apykok haria powyro kahato rakaria aikotã morekuat eropat haria hãpyk sese rakaria ewy hap e. Miꞌi tã ewywuat eweikup­teꞌen turan ariot pote woro­ho­ꞌonug eipe more­kuaria wo uhetama pakup we. Uhekat yne yne eiwano topy­huꞌat e. Pywo pe miitꞌin kyꞌe hap upi eweiꞌa­pykok uimohey haria pote — Pyno waku kahato en wuatꞌi uhemiit akag wo hap atiky­ꞌesat areꞌe aru e. — Atikuap taꞌyn uimohey haria poi hãpyk kahato hap kaipyi uimohey haria kyꞌe hap kaipyi woro­ho­ꞌokuap eipe waku kahato rakaria wo eweikup­teꞌen uheropat haria akag wo koꞌi areꞌe aru uimi­ky­ꞌesat ewy uimohey haria powyro kahato rakaria pe e. Miꞌiria ewywuat Tupana mimõ­typot sese koꞌi tukup­teꞌen aru wuatꞌi eꞌat pe uhut hawyi e.

Maꞌato iraniaꞌin uheropat haria maꞌat haria yt iweꞌeg nakaria i miꞌi haria pupi aremõti kahato uhut hap eꞌat pe e. Katu­pono — Aika­ꞌiwat yt tut irane i raꞌyn miꞌi tupono waku yt naku i watu­wenug e haria e hamo taꞌa­tu­maꞌat uimohey haria. — Taꞌi yt tut i som katu­pono toĩneꞌen motꞌi itote iatuꞌe uhut hap ete. Pyno waku watuꞌu mahy aimo­pẽꞌã hamo yn waku iꞌatuꞌe saꞌag. Waku wati­ꞌa­tu­ꞌahyk iraniaꞌin heropat haria iꞌatuꞌe. Waku watu­ꞌuka hemiitꞌin ete uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin koꞌi ete iꞌatuꞌe aru. Waku mahy ete watu­wenuk iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono yt tut hamuat i raꞌyn mesup wote toĩneꞌen motꞌi itote. Waku aimo­pẽꞌã yn hap wywo waku watoĩ­neꞌen iꞌatuꞌe ti aru uheropat haria akag koꞌi yt iweꞌeg i sese rakaria e.

Yt taꞌa­tu­mohey hin i aru Taꞌa­tu­ka­ꞌiwat putꞌokꞌe hamuat hap maꞌato mio tã taꞌa­tuꞌe turan sese putꞌok­ꞌare i raꞌyn are e. Karãpe putꞌok­ꞌare hawyi mekewat uhemiitꞌin maꞌat haria atiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­piheg apiheg kahato itote e. Miꞌi hawyi — Yt naku i kahato eipe areꞌe aru iꞌatuepe hawyi — Motoro pya pya uikai hawyi eweikup­teꞌen aikope yt uimohey haria i tukup­teꞌen hap tote areꞌe aru uimohey apykok haria pe uimohey haria maꞌat haria pe. Miꞌi hawyi atiꞌa­tuꞌokpok kyse wo hawyi atiꞌa­tu­mo­kuꞌi iꞌatupiit koꞌi uimohey haria apykok haria saꞌag nakaria e Iesui.

Pywo pe areꞌe heropat hat ikuap kahato kat koꞌi kat koꞌi Toka­ꞌiwat Tupana miky­ꞌesat koꞌi wen maꞌato yt tutunug i pote miꞌi hat wyti Ikaꞌiwat tipokpok kahato aru taꞌaipok hawyi are e. Maꞌato uheropat hat yt ikuap i kahato kat som Toka­ꞌiwat miky­ꞌesat hawyi miꞌi hap yt inug i miꞌi hat iꞌewyte Ikaꞌiwat tiꞌpokpok aru maꞌato yt kahato i aikotã toipokpok teropat hat ikuap kahato pytkai yt tutunug i Toka­ꞌiwat miky­ꞌesat hap ewy katu­pono yt tuwepyi i toiꞌa­parap e. Maꞌato waku watu­kup­teꞌen heropat waku rakaria yne Aika­ꞌiwat miky­ꞌesat koꞌi aimikuap ok tã nug haria e. Miꞌi hap ewy Aika­ꞌiwat tiky­ꞌesat kahato e. Pyno karãpe wẽtup ok pe ikaꞌiwat tum iwato kahato teropat hap miꞌi hat kaipyi ti toiky­ꞌesat iwato hap poꞌog miꞌi teropat hat pote e. Pyno poꞌog poꞌog Tupana timo­herep ahepe tomi­ky­ꞌesat watunug hap koꞌi tomi­ꞌai­roria aito pote. Pyno waku watunug tomi­ky­ꞌesat tomi­mo­herep ahepe aimohey haype pote. Waku watunug imiky­ꞌesat hap ok tã tomo­wepit hap e. Maꞌato yt watunug i toꞌe ahepe hap ewy pote poꞌog wati­ꞌa­parap iraniaꞌin kai katu­pono watikuap imiky­ꞌesat pytkai yt watunug i hawyi pote are e. Watunug imiky­ꞌesat hawyi tuwehum kahato ahowawi hawyi poꞌog toimo­herep ahepe tomi­ky­ꞌesat koꞌi maꞌato yt pote yt aimohey kuap i e Iesui temiitꞌin me ahepe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe ahepe — Pyno ahenoi teran ehepe uhetiat e. Uito ti aria ewywuat yt naku i nug hap yne mesuwat yi tote wuk hamo e. Aikotã aria wy Uito aikotã watiwuk aiko hap ewy wẽtup aria aipo piat hap kaipyi watiwuk yne e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi yt iwato hin i aria itote maꞌato watopag aria itote hawyi tutuꞌu yne. Iwato kahato aria itote hawyi wuk wukꞌe itote hawyi ikahu hawyi yt kat i moi yt kat i iꞌanam yt kat i saꞌag tutuꞌu kahato hawyi waku pe amikoi koꞌi hamo e. Uito ti mekewat aria ewywuat areĩneꞌen mesuwat yi tote wuatꞌi saꞌag miitꞌin wanẽtup hawe wuk hamo e. Aria ewywuat ti Uito maꞌato uiko yt atiwuk i te maꞌato atiwuk teran haype e.

Katu­pono ahoꞌopot hap ariaꞌyp posak etiat yt i te wen maꞌato miꞌi kape arewa­nẽtup kahato e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi ahetꞌok hat Iuwãu uhetꞌok taꞌyn yꞌy wo maꞌato wẽtup ok uhetꞌok hap toĩneꞌen ne miꞌi ti aria ewywuat uimo­so­ꞌopot hap sese are.

Uimohey haria yt naku i aru topy­huꞌat ahete pãi e. Pywo ti rat yt ariot i mesu­wa­rotiat kape woꞌo­wese hap erut hamo maꞌato ariot hawyi woꞌo­tu­ꞌuka kahato hap yn sehay topy­huꞌat e. Uhehay pun haria tiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka teran haype uhehay mohey haria ete e. — Yt pywo pe ihay iꞌatuꞌe yn uhehay ete eimi­mo­herep ete hawyi yt iꞌatu­wese kahato ehete uhehay moherep haria eipe pote e. Pyno yt eweiwa­nẽtup teiꞌo eipyꞌa pe meiũran aru yne mesu­wa­rote woꞌo­wese haria tukup­teꞌen hap kape e. Yt eiwa­nẽtup teiꞌo miitꞌin iꞌatu­wese kahato hap uhehay kape eipyꞌa pe are e. Yt karãpe i aru yne miit woꞌo­wese haria tukup­teꞌen katu­pono poꞌog iꞌatu­py­ꞌahak aru uhehay moherep haria ete ahewa­nĩ­kaptia are e. Aikotã surara sese tipatꞌok kuap miit piit kyseꞌyp wo hap ewy miꞌi hap ewy uhehay tiꞌa­tu­patꞌok miitꞌin wẽtup kai uimohey haria hawyi wẽtup kai yt uimohey haria i e. Pyno miitꞌin woꞌo­patꞌok hat ewy areĩneꞌen e. Wẽtup kai uhehay upiaria tukup­teꞌen hawyi wẽtup kai yt iꞌatupap i uhehay upiaria e.

Miꞌi hawyi ti aru 5 ok wẽtup yat piaria gupteꞌen haria meiũran aru yt toꞌo­wese hin i toꞌo­patꞌok uimohey hawyi are e. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌo­patꞌok patꞌok haria wo tukup­teꞌen wẽtup yat pe e. Uimohey haria iwese kahato pytkai iraniaꞌin mekewat yat piaria yt iꞌatu­wese hin i itote wẽtup ywania pytkai e. Typy ok myeꞌym ok ete sio myeꞌym ok typy ok ete uimohey haria ete ipatꞌok hawyi — Wãiꞌia­tuꞌe iraniaꞌin uimohey haria mohit hamo aru e.

Miꞌi turan miitꞌin tuꞌuka teran ehete uimohey haria eipe hawyi e. Taꞌi eiꞌy­wotꞌin yt iꞌatu­wese hin i ehete uimohey haria eipe hawyi e. Ehaꞌy­ruꞌin ehaki­ꞌytꞌin iꞌewyte yt iꞌatu­wese hin i ehete uimohey eipe hawyi eimẽ­pytꞌin pytkai are e. Iꞌewyte eity ipyꞌahak ehete topy­huꞌat uimohey hawyi eipe tomẽ­pytꞌin eipe pytkai e. Iꞌewyte eimẽ­pytꞌin yt iꞌatu­wese i ehepe uimohey hawyi taꞌa­tu­tyꞌin taꞌa­tu­ꞌy­wotꞌin eipe pytkai are e. Ehaki­tuꞌin iꞌewyte yt iꞌatu­wese i ehete taꞌa­tu­mi­mo­ha­pyꞌap koꞌi pytkai eipe e. Miꞌi hawyi getap kaꞌiwat yt iwese hin i tosa­ꞌyru ete tosa­kiꞌyt ete tosa­ꞌyru tosa­kiꞌyt uimohey hano raꞌyn mote e. Taꞌi ariot pote miitꞌin toꞌo­patꞌok kahato wyti aru uimohey haria ete yt iꞌatu­wese hin i iraniaꞌin mesu­wa­ro­tiaria eipe eiwese kahato pytkai e. Yt kat i aru woꞌo­wese hap sese mesuwe aru are e Iesui ahepe tomohey haria pe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi poꞌog Iesui tohenoi miitꞌin sem itotiaria pe — Uheka­tu­wy­riaꞌin e mesu­wa­ro­tiaria tikuap kahato iꞌaman ut irane hap teꞌe­ra­haꞌat at hun kape — Meiẽ iꞌaman hamuat iꞌatuꞌe. At wẽtem hap kaipyi iꞌaman tut iꞌatuꞌe miꞌi hawyi iꞌatuꞌe hap ewy iꞌaman tut kahato. — Meiũpe ywyhig at ẽtyhot hap aũka hap koꞌi miꞌi pote iꞌaman irane iꞌatuꞌe ahetama pe hawyi iꞌatuꞌe hap ewy iꞌaman naꞌyn tut e.
Taꞌi kahato atipy ihyrypꞌi kahato hap miꞌi pote mesu­wiaria iũe eꞌat hakup irane mesup iꞌatuꞌe hawyi iꞌatuꞌe hap ewy putꞌokꞌe eꞌat kahu hap e.

Mesu­wa­ro­tiaria tikuap kahato iꞌaman ut hap sio yt hap teꞌe­ra­haꞌat atipy kape hawyi taꞌa­tukuap maꞌato mesu­wa­ro­tiaria taꞌa­tuieĩ­neꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat piat hap kape yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup teran hin i e. Taꞌi miꞌiria tikuap aikotã aru iꞌaman sio at waku hap maꞌato uwe Uito hap yt taꞌa­tukuap hin i. Taꞌa­tukuap uhehay koꞌi kape taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup pytkai yt uikuap i te uwe sese Uito e. Teꞌe­ra­ꞌa­kasa kahato uiminug yt miitꞌin eminug kuap i iwato rakat koꞌi kape pytkai yt uikuap i te uwe Uito e hap kape yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup teren hin i teꞌe­ra­haꞌat kahato uhowawi yt uimohey i te rakaria mesu­wa­ro­tiaria e. Yt ihapytig i rakaria Tupana kape yt kat i iꞌatueha rakaria ewywuaria pote e Iesui miitꞌin sem itotiaria pe.  PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi poꞌog toꞌe Iesui itotiaria pe — Kat poteĩ yt eiwa­nẽtup teran i uwe Uito sese e hap kape e. Kat pote yt eiwa­nẽtup sio Uito waku sio yt hap kape e. Eiwo­ꞌokuap uwe waku uwe yt hap kape meremo eiwo­ꞌokuap yne eiwo­ꞌo­mohey hap ete uwe waku uwe yt naku i wato­mohey maꞌato uhetiat uimohey hap kape yt eiwe­wa­nẽtup teran hin i wuatꞌi atunug waku ehehamo pytkai are.

Uimohey haria wẽtup sehay ahenoi teran ehepe — Karãpe ehewa­nĩ­kaptia aheroto sura­raꞌin po pe Morekuat kape aiꞌauka hamo aiꞌpyhik hamo waku watikat kahato aiwe­nõꞌẽ i aiwa­nĩ­kaptia popywiat hamuat are e. Miꞌi hap eꞌat pe aiꞌauka teran pote waku watoĩ­neꞌen iweꞌeg kahato rakano iꞌatu­py­ꞌa­setpe miꞌi hawyi muꞌap upi waku watikat kahato muꞌap aiwe­to­popy ahewa­nĩ­kaptia po pywiat hap are. Yt naku i watuwat morekuat koro kape aiꞌauka teran haria upi katu­pono itote meremo ahum morekuat koro pe hawyi morekuat — Yt naku i en e hawyi ahum tesu­ra­raꞌin akag pe hawyi surara akag aipag iheg me kat aiwo­ꞌo­pyhik hawe e. Miꞌi hawyi woꞌo­pyhik hawe watu­kup­teꞌen at kaꞌap hawyi aikotã aru watu­we­nõꞌẽ mekewat woꞌo­pyhik hap saꞌag myi e. Taꞌi itote yt uwe i tuwẽtem kuap i e. Miꞌi tote waho­ꞌopot kahato mekewat saꞌup iwato ium hamo hawyi aiꞌyat toiwe­neru aiko koꞌi aimikoi koꞌi aimẽ­pytꞌin koꞌi totat temiitꞌin nuat aheha­ryꞌi totat towanuat ahemiitꞌin torania toipo­ꞌoro topotpap nug hamo hawyi ahekat koꞌi toiꞌa­tu­we­neru yne saꞌup sat hamo. Miꞌi hawyi yne aiwanuat morekuat nuat hawyi watu­we­nõꞌẽ aipyhik hap kaipywiat hawyi — Waku raꞌyn motoro pya mesu­wepyi e ahepe sio meremo woro­ꞌauka en aru e ahepe. Miꞌi tupono waku poꞌog ahewa­nĩ­kaptia meremo watunug aiwy­riaꞌin sese wo muꞌap upi eheroto sura­raꞌin miat morekuat kape turan are e Iesui temiitꞌin me ahepe.

Iesui tiꞌa­tu­muꞌe itotiaria turan iraniaꞌin itotiaria teꞌe­roꞌe Iesui pe — Mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe wanĩ­kaptia mipo­ꞌoro aipo­rekuat nuat mekewat Piratu e hap het rakat yt naku i kahato tutunug katu­pono gaꞌatpo ti ahetama Kari­reira piaria morekuat Piratu timoma kahato iꞌatuꞌe. Morekuat totat ahemiitꞌin hawyi toiwuk Tupana mõtypot yat pe iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi totopag mekewat iꞌatusuu at hap Tupana mõtypot yat piat yparakai tote mekewat aihũria suu wuk hap eypa­rakai tote aihũ watum hawyi watiwuk Tupana mõtypot hamuat hap tote iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe iꞌatuepe — Pyno uruto poꞌog morekuat Piratu miꞌa­tu­ꞌuka koꞌi kai eweiꞌe. Yt karãpe i urutunug saꞌag imiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka koꞌi minug ewywuat eweiꞌe. Miꞌi pote Tupana miꞌa­piheg koꞌi wuaria tukup­teꞌen miꞌiria aiꞌy­wania eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope e Iesui. Maꞌato pywo pe ti areꞌe ehepe eiperia ti wy iꞌewyte yt nakuaria i kahato eweikup­teꞌen are. Gaꞌatpo eiꞌy­wa­niaria morekuat Piratu tiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato yi Kari­reira piaria. Yt naku hin i ti ipap hap eweiꞌe. Yt ikahu hin i iꞌatu­ku­ꞌuro hap eweiꞌe e. Miꞌi hap ewy ti aru eweipap yt uimohey i eipe pote e. Maꞌato wuatꞌi eꞌat pe ti aru hoꞌopot hap eiwanuat topy­huꞌat eiwano e. Maꞌato yt paaꞌe­weiꞌe i yt uimohey i hap ete pote yt naku i pe wuatꞌi eꞌat pe eweikup­teꞌen poꞌog yt naku i morekuat Piratu miꞌauka koꞌi hoꞌopot hap kai are.

Taꞌi saꞌa­wyꞌi sese 18 surara topap yne taꞌa­tuꞌyat nu kawiat ywaiti rakat taꞌat iꞌatuepiit ete hawyi yt naku i eweiꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi sura­raꞌin gupteꞌen haria topap yne nu yat taꞌat iꞌatuete hawyi. Iꞌatu­ku­ꞌuro hap yt ikahu hin i eweiꞌe. Miꞌi pote eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope — Eweikuap kat pote mekewat 18 surara topap nu miꞌa­tu­ꞌuka koꞌi eweiꞌe. Taꞌi sura­raꞌin yt naku i nug kahato haria pote ti Tupana tiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­piheg sese miꞌiria eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope. Taꞌi poꞌog tawa Ieru­sarẽi miaria kai yt naku i nug haria miꞌiria pote Tupana tiꞌa­tu­moma yne eweiꞌe eiwo­ꞌope. Maꞌato pywo pe areꞌe ehepe meiũran ti aru eipe poꞌog eweipap miꞌiria kai poꞌog yt naku i areꞌe. Eiku­ꞌuro hap poꞌog yt ikahu i miꞌiria kuꞌuro hap kai. Katu­pono wuatꞌi eꞌat piat eiku­ꞌuro hap topy­huꞌat yt ikahu hin i. Maꞌato paaꞌe­weiꞌe yt uimohey i hap ete hawyi miꞌi hawyi uimohey haria wo eweikup­teꞌen hawyi waku puo eweikup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e Iesui tomohey hap pun haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui henoi hãꞌãkap wo iꞌatuepe. — Wẽtup ok so toto tomikoi ypia wato hap kape e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi warana ypia pyꞌa­setpe Wiku yp toĩneꞌen itote hawyi toto mekewat tomikoi Wiku yp kape hawyi toho­ꞌokat Wiku saat toho­ꞌohep hamo. Maꞌato putꞌok­toꞌe hawyi so maꞌato iꞌyhop yn toĩneꞌen itote ihãite kahato. Maꞌato yt kat i haat ipoi hamo. Yt wẽtup i haat toipuẽti tomiꞌu wo. Miꞌi hawyi toikaykay tuwe­wawi teropat hat tomikoi ypia apykok hat — Uhyt e gaꞌatpuat gaꞌatpuat eꞌat ariot saꞌa­wyꞌi meiũwat yp kape uipoi hap kat hamo maꞌato yt kat i atipuẽti te e so. Miꞌi hawyi gaꞌatpo eꞌat iꞌewyte haat hap eꞌat raꞌyn turan ariot i maꞌato iꞌewyte iꞌyhop yn ne atipuẽti yt uipoi hin i uhesyꞌat hawyi. Koran ariot i hawyi heꞌat raꞌyn maꞌato araꞌa­kasa hawyi yt uipoi hin i hat mesuwat uimikoi Wiku yp e. Pyno uhyt etiꞌyppun no meiũwat yp ywyhop mo e. Kat pote uheꞌyi u hat toĩneꞌen maꞌato yt uipoi hat i e. Miꞌi hawyi waku wẽtup i watikoi mesuwat yi aikope toĩneꞌen mesup Wiku yp hap tote e.

Mio tã e pote — Yt uhyt e mikoi ypia apykok hat. Yt rat uika­ꞌiwat yt naku i rat wati­ꞌyppun e. Waku watum yi hun kahato tope 12 ewaty pe te sio haat hamuat sio yt ti raꞌyn hap kuap hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi waku watipoi kahato aimipun koꞌi wo e. Waku ahywytip kahato iꞌanam koꞌi miꞌi hawyi weita iun aꞌẽpo koꞌi waku wati­puruk kahato haga etiat e. Miꞌi hawyi arewa­nẽtup irokirẽ wat 12 ewaty hawyi haat aru maꞌato yt haat pote waku wati­pugha e. Pyno 12 ewaty hawyi waku mehĩ eraꞌaipok erahaꞌat sio wakuat sio yt hap kuap hamo e. Maꞌato miꞌi turan yt haat i te raꞌyn pote waku etiꞌyppun uhyt e. Miꞌi mikoi Wiku yp ewy kahato ti eweikup­teꞌen eipe e Iesui. Wẽtup 12 ewaty hawyi ete sio haat rakat ewy sio yt hap ewy eweikup­teꞌen. Maꞌato yt i te ti pote Tupana miꞌyppun wo eweikup­teꞌen e Iesui toꞌy­wania pe yt tomohey i te haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toĩneꞌen i raꞌyn wẽtup Tupana mõtypot yat pe i raꞌyn miitꞌin muꞌe hamo. Miꞌi tote toĩneꞌen wẽtup ok hary­poria ahiag ipiit piat rakat itote. Iꞌahu kahato 18 anu raꞌyn. Toho­ꞌopot kahato katu­pono ahiag mimo­ꞌahu toĩneꞌen. Iꞌok tũꞌã kahato hap wywo toho­ꞌopot ahiag minug. Iesui tehaꞌat miꞌi hary­poria kape hawyi toikaykay tuwe­wawi. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe tope — Mana atipok taꞌyn epoꞌi poꞌi hap ahiag minug e. Pyno mana e eꞌahu hap epoꞌi poꞌi hap ewy kahato. Pyno miꞌi hap ewywuat epoꞌi poꞌi hap atiporop taꞌyn e. Miꞌi hawyi tuwe­ponug hawyi iꞌok tũꞌã hap meremo tokosap taꞌyn. Waku hawyi hary­poria toꞌe tehay wepit kahato hap wywo — Waku kahato En Tupana e.

Maꞌato Tupana mõtypot yat apykok hat ipyꞌahak kahato Iesui ete katu­pono Iesui timo­hãite mekewat hary­poria yt topotpap i hap eꞌat pe pote. Miꞌi pote toꞌe tomi­mu­ꞌeria pe — Toĩneꞌen wyti 6 eꞌat aipotpap nug hamuat e. Pyno waku 6 eꞌat aiwe­potpap hap turan watikat aimoe­hãite hap maꞌato mesup eꞌat pe yt naku i kahato watikat amoehãite hap e. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat — Mehĩ e yt eweꞌeg hin i aikotã typy ehay rakat ewy ereĩneꞌen katu­pono etipotpap kahato tuereto mesuwat eꞌat pe ehũ wewato ahup taꞌat yi kaꞌa pe pote meremo etiõtem hap atikuap e.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat — Typy hẽku rakat neꞌi wyti en e. Yne eꞌat pe ewete­re­poꞌok ewetioto eihũria iꞌatu­moe­ꞌyꞌu hap kape. Yne eꞌat pe ewete­re­poꞌok yꞌy kape eihũria e Iesui Tupana mõtypot yat apykok hat pe. Pyno mesuwat hary­poria ahaꞌa­seꞌi Aparãu emiariru toĩneꞌen wen maꞌato 18 anu turan ahiag mipoꞌi wo toĩneꞌen aikotã ehũ saity ete hap ewy are. Kat poteĩ pyno yt eweiky­ꞌesat i Aparãu emiariru moehãite hap e. Kat poteĩ — Wãiꞌere mesuwat mana erepoꞌok hap ete yt naku i yt aipotpap i hap eꞌat pe e Iesui.
Mio tã e Iesui hawyi wanĩ­kaptia paaꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe. Maꞌato iraniaꞌin itotiaria teꞌe­ru­wehum kahato Tupana pe Iesui minug wakuap koꞌi ete.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi poꞌog Iesui henoi teran iãꞌãkap wuo maꞌato saꞌa­wyꞌi apoꞌe iꞌatuepe — Aikotã som Tupana topy­huꞌat Miitꞌin Porekuat no hap ete apoꞌe. — Pyno ahetama pe toĩneꞌen iãꞌỹi kurin kahato rakat aimiꞌu mosẽꞌẽ hap Mutata iãꞌỹi watoꞌe. Miꞌi ti kurin kahato wen maꞌato wẽtup ok tikoi toko pe hawyi hẽtyt hawyi meiũran iꞌyp ywaiti kahato raꞌyn ariaꞌyp sese ewy wo raꞌyn toĩneꞌen. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌyp haĩkupy pe weitaria teꞌe­ru­we­soknug naꞌyn iꞌyhop koꞌi og muo. Miꞌi hap ewy ti Tupana topy­huꞌat Morekuat no mesuwat yi tote Mutata iãꞌỹi mikoi hap ewy e Iesui tomi­mu­ꞌeria pe. Series,

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui apoꞌe i raꞌyn — Aikotã wyti aru so Tupana topy­huꞌat Miitꞌin porekuat no e hawyi sehay iãꞌãkap wuo toiꞌa­tu­muꞌe i raꞌyn. — Pyno uhytꞌiꞌin aikotã uꞌi nug hap ewy kahato ti aru Tupana topy­huꞌat Morekuat no mesu­wa­ro­tiaria pe e. Aikotã watopag manĩ puk ipyre kape. Miꞌi hawyi wati­ꞌa­pokik manĩ puk ipyre wywo. Miꞌi hawyi wati­ꞌahik hawyi watoiat hawyi meiũran iꞌapo­perup hawyi wati­karay miꞌi hawyi aimiꞌu wo raꞌyn he kahato raꞌyn. Miꞌi hap ewy ti aru Tupana teke aipyꞌa pe tehay wo e. Kurin nakat ewy iꞌapopyt ewy ihay pytkai hawyi ihay tuwe­mo­wato aiwa­nẽtup hawe hawyi meiũran uꞌi he hap ewy wato­py­huꞌat e Iesui itote muꞌap upi tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape toto turan.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­muꞌe kahato yne tawa hit piaria Tupana ehay wo. Miꞌi hawyi tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kapiat epuꞌap upiaria toiꞌa­tu­muꞌe kahato Tupana ehay wo. Miꞌi hawyi muꞌap upi wẽtup ok apoꞌe Iesui pe — Urupo­rekuat e karania apuru pyno teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat Tupana mieha­kye­raꞌat koꞌi wo atipy pe e sio apuru typyꞌi kahato miit sio apuru yt typyꞌi i apoꞌe Iesui pe. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat.

Waku eweiꞌe eipyꞌa pe — Uito areke teran pãi areke teran an mekewat okenꞌypy yt iwato i rakat ewywuat pe areha­kye­raꞌat hap puẽti hamo waku eweiꞌe at kaꞌap eipyꞌa pe are. Yt naku i — Waku mũki­ꞌite areke eweiꞌe hap ewy eweiꞌe are. Katu­pono meiũran ti aru iꞌatu kahato tuwe­hytꞌok teran atipy pe aikope Tupana toĩneꞌen Morekuat no hap kape wen maꞌato miꞌiria yt tuwe­hytꞌok kuap i katu­pono wehytꞌok hap motꞌi poityꞌi rakaria — Mũki­ꞌite waku areke saꞌa­wyꞌi iꞌatuꞌe pote e haria pote e. Yt kat i typy okenꞌypy atipy kape. Eweikat ro mekewat wẽtup yn okenꞌypy Uiꞌywot kape hap e Iesui tuwepiat.

Miꞌi hap eꞌat pe aru — Ereꞌo­ken­hypꞌok to Mimi ereꞌo­ken­hypꞌok to Uhyt iꞌatuꞌe motꞌi kahato uhowawi wen — U pãi yt woro­ho­ꞌokuap kahato i eipe aikope pyi eweiõꞌẽ areꞌe iꞌatuepe aru. Uiꞌyat ri iheg me raꞌyn areꞌe aru. Iheg me sese raꞌyn ni okenꞌypy areꞌe aru — Ereꞌo­ken­hypꞌok o eweiꞌe motꞌi uhepe hawyi e. Waku mesup ereke uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin are e Iesui.

Miꞌi tote aru okenꞌypke teꞌe­rewak kahato. — Saꞌa­wyꞌi urutenuk kahato ewywo Mimi. Urutu­we­sa­poꞌu kahato kue ewywo Mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe uhepe. Ehay ete ti urutu­we­muꞌe kahato wuatꞌi puo muꞌap upi iꞌatuꞌe aru uhepe.

Miꞌi hawyi atiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pywo pe ti rat areꞌe ehepe saꞌa­wyꞌi yt uimohey i pote yt woro­ho­ꞌokuap hin i eipe areꞌe aru. Yt atikuap hin i aikope pywiat eweiõꞌẽ hap areꞌe aru. Eweiwat ro uiꞌya­ty­pepyi pãi katu­pono yt nakuap i nug haria ti eipe areꞌe aru yt tuwe­hytꞌok i haria pe e Iesui.

Miꞌi hawyi teꞌe­ruwak popuo teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok haty turanuat hap ewy iꞌatu­wa­nẽtup hawe iꞌatu­pyꞌa pe kyryꞌet kyryꞌet taꞌatuiãi ete haty kahato iꞌatupiit ete pote. Katu­pono saꞌa­wyꞌi Aparãu yt pya hin i iꞌatukai toĩneꞌen meiẽwat getap we toĩneꞌen. Iꞌewyte Isaki iꞌewyte Iako iꞌewyte saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria Tupana ehay moherep tukup­teꞌen kahato itote Tupana yat pe ienuk hap ikahu kahato hap tote. Miꞌi haria ewy aru eweikup­teꞌen mekewat woꞌo­kakꞌi haria ewy yt eiwe­hytꞌok teran i mesup yn mote. Meiũran aru Tupana okenꞌypy sakpo eweikup­teꞌen hoꞌopot hap tote yn. Yt eweikup­teꞌen hin i aru uiwywo atipy pe are — Mũki­ꞌite waku wato­mohey eweiꞌe mesup pote e.

Maꞌato tuwe­hytꞌok kahato iraniaꞌin ywania. Miꞌi haria ti tuwe­hytꞌok aikope Tupana toĩneꞌen Morekuat no hap tote yt aiꞌy­wania sese hin i pytkai. Tõꞌẽ tõꞌẽ kahato aikope pyi at tuwẽtem hap kaipyi aikope at minꞌe hap kape hawyi at posak kaipyi tõꞌẽ Tupana wywuat tukup­teꞌen hamo. Miꞌi hawyi miꞌiria paaꞌe haria pe — Eiwe­hytꞌok to areꞌe miꞌiria pe maꞌato ehepe ti aru — Eiwe­hytꞌok to yt are hin i e. Uhehamo eweikup­teꞌen mesup uhehay sio waku sio yt hap kape ehewaure toĩneꞌen pytkai mekewat eꞌat wyti aru — Yt woro­ho­ꞌokuap i eipe areꞌe aru Tupana ehamo ehepiat yt uimohey i haria te eipe pote e Iesui yt tomohey i te haria pe.

Uiꞌy­wania e eipe ti Tupana ehay kuap yianmiat haria eweikup­teꞌen maꞌato o iraniaꞌin ywania ehewot­ꞌyptia rakaria wyti aru tuwe­hytꞌok eheꞌyianme atipy pe wẽtup ywania pytkai katu­pono uimohey haria tukup­teꞌen miꞌiria aru are maꞌato eipe uhepiat sehay yianmiat kape eweikuap kahato pytkai yt eiwe­hytꞌok teran i mesup okenꞌy­pyke atipy kape e. Miꞌi pote iraniaꞌin tuwe­hytꞌok kakato aru maꞌato eipe yt eweiky­ꞌesat i pote iꞌatu­wat­ꞌymo eiwe­hytꞌok aru are e Iesui toꞌy­wania Iuteuria pe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Tupana ehay enoi haria putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui yatype teꞌe­roꞌe hamo — Erẽtem no meremo meiũpepyi iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono morekuat Eroti wyti eꞌauka teran moityꞌi raꞌyn Uhyt iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Morekuat Eroti ti awahuru ewywuat uiwa­nẽtup hawe katu­pono woꞌo­ꞌauka teran hat miꞌi miit areꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi eweiwat ro Eroti kape hawyi ehenoi uiꞌe hap tope — Uito ti meiũ ahiagnia atusopo kahato hat raꞌyn iꞌewyte atiꞌa­tu­moe­hãite kahato iꞌahu rakaria mũki­ꞌite ti aru iꞌewyte atunug atunug wakuat uipot­moe­hãite hap koꞌi uhewyry hap upi e. Miꞌi hawyi mũki­ꞌite eꞌihotꞌok hawyi ti aru waku yne raꞌyn uiminug koꞌi miꞌi hawyi waku yne hawyi areto e.

Mesup eꞌat pe uipotpap teran miitꞌin moehãite hap ete hawyi mũki­ꞌite iꞌewyte uipotpap teran hawyi mũki­ꞌite eꞌihotꞌok hawyi toran naꞌyn uipotpap hap mesuwe katu­pono uiꞌauka hap eꞌat aru putꞌokꞌe raꞌyn are. Maꞌato mesup eꞌat pe waku te arepotpap waku uhewyry mesuwe iꞌewyte mũki­ꞌite waku ti wy. Maꞌato eꞌihotꞌok toran naꞌyn uipotpap hap toran naꞌyn. Katu­pono uiꞌauka hap eꞌat yt pya hin i raꞌyn waku eweiꞌe mekewat Eroti pe awahuru ewywuat pe. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌewyte wẽtup ewehenoi tope — Yne saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat Tupana ehay moherep haria topap kahato tawa Ieru­sarẽi me iꞌewyte Uito Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Tehay Moherep Hanuat yt naku i pyno wẽtup tawa pe uiꞌauka hap e. Iꞌewtye Uito atiky­ꞌesat saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi atuꞌuka hap tote te uiku­ꞌuro hap uhyt eweiꞌe o miowat uiꞌe hap ewehenoi mekewat awahuru pe e.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tuwak toꞌy­wania kyꞌewi tomohey hap pun haria pote. — Tawa Ieru­sarẽi miaria e yt eweiweꞌeg hin i eiperia katu­pono Tupana mipo­ꞌo­roria auka haria eipe e. Ihay moherep haria eweiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka haꞌa­wyte nu koꞌi wo e. Eweiꞌa­tu­ꞌakit kahato i ti Tupana mipo­ꞌoro koꞌi e. Miꞌi hap ewy Uito wy woro­ho­ꞌo­kyꞌe eipe pytkai — Eweiõꞌẽ ro eweiõꞌẽ ro uhowawi are yn pytkai akotã waipaka ty tiꞌa­tu­kaykay tomẽ­pytꞌin koꞌi hap ewy woro­ho­ꞌo­kaykay kahato eipe — Eweiõꞌẽ ro eweiõꞌẽ ro uhowawi are kahato waipaka waryꞌi imẽpyt rakat ewy maꞌato ti — Yt yt yt eweiꞌe uhepe piku piku koꞌi ewy. Uipo­pesap ywytꞌok­pype are waipaka ewy maꞌato — Yt rat eweiꞌe uhepe e Iesui tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi piaria pe tuwak turan.

Are pãi miꞌi hawyi ti aru eiweran eweipy­huꞌat areto hawyi. Yt eweiꞌa­kasa hin i uhowawi aru maꞌato meiũran ti aru esaipe­piaria aiꞌy­wania Iuteuria — Waku kahato Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Sese Aheha­kye­raꞌat hat iꞌatuꞌe aru uhetiat pe hawyi miꞌi hap eꞌat pe aru araꞌaipok ehowawi i raꞌyn e Iesui tuwak hawuo. Maꞌato mesup yt uimohey hin i eipe pote eweikup­teꞌen aru aikotã aiꞌyat ikahu rakat yt uwe i miit wywo rakat ewy iꞌanam kahato gaꞌapy mihik pe tawa Ieru­sarẽi toĩneꞌen motꞌi are. Miꞌi hawyi eiꞌyat mesuwe yt kat i eipe yt uwe i hawyi are. Maꞌato meiũran ti aru — Miꞌi Miit waku kahato Aipo­rekuat no eweiꞌe uhepiat hawyi mekewat eꞌat pe iraniaꞌin ewy waku puo eweikup­teꞌen Tupana ywania wo i raꞌyn maꞌato mesup te yt e Iesui toꞌy­wania pe yt tomohey teran i te haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi yt iꞌatu­potpap i hap eꞌat pe putꞌokꞌe itote Tupana mõtypot yat pyi wẽtup getap kape Iesui toto Tupana mõtypot yat piaria apykok hat yat kape toto. Itote iꞌatu kahato nagnia ehay enoi haria. Itote Iesui taꞌapyk tenuk iꞌatu­ꞌakag wywo hamo. Miꞌi hap kape teꞌe­ra­haꞌat kahato Iesui kape. Taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato Iesui tiꞌa­parap hap sio Iesui ipotpap yt iꞌatu­potpap i hap eꞌat miitꞌin moehãite hap ete sio yt iꞌatuꞌe. Katu­pono itote ti toĩneꞌen ihainia iꞌahu kahato rakat ipiit puk takat. Miꞌi pote teꞌe­ra­haꞌat kahato sio apuru Iesui timoe­hãite sio yt aipotpap i hap eꞌat pe taꞌa­tue­ro­mõ­pusu teran haype. Miꞌi hap Iesui tikuap tuwe­kaipyi miꞌi hawyi toꞌe — Eiperia ti eweikuap kahato wãiꞌe hap koꞌi yt naku i mesup eꞌat pe mio tã watunug hap koꞌi. Taꞌi aheꞌa­seꞌi Musei wãiꞌe hap koꞌi kuap kahato haria eipe pote apoꞌare teran ehepe — Waku apo miitꞌin moehãite hap watunug Tupana mõtypot eꞌat pe sio yt e. Uiwesat ro e Iesui woꞌo­muꞌe haria akag me.

Maꞌato yt taꞌa­tu­wesat teran i katu­pono iꞌatu­py­ꞌahak Iesui ete. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tipo­pytyk ipiit puk takat ipo ete. Miꞌi hawyi tuwe­ponug ipiit puk takat ete pote meremo ipiit ihãite i raꞌyn topy­huꞌat. Miꞌi hawyi ipohep ipiit ete pyi — Pyno waku raꞌyn eete mehĩ e. Waku ereto i ro eꞌyat kape e.

Toto hawyi Iesui tuwe­morem itotiaria ewawi — Eiperia eipotpap kahato yt motpap i hap eꞌat pe e. Woro­ho­ꞌokuap eipe. Eihũ wewato ahup taꞌat yi kaꞌa pe yꞌy pe hap enõtem hap ete eipotpap miꞌi hap eꞌat pe pywo are sio yt. Taꞌi pywo ti are e miꞌi tã ti ewetunug yt naku i aipotpap e hap eꞌat pe. Miꞌi pytkai kan hamo uimohit teran mesuwat eꞌat piat miit moehãite hap upi e.
Miꞌi hawyi yt taꞌa­tu­wesat kuap i kahato Iesui.

Miꞌi hawyi toiꞌa­tu­muꞌe i tehay iãꞌãkap wo Iesui katu­pono toikuap itotiaria teꞌe­ru­we­mo­wato hap pote. Taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat morekuat eꞌypa­rakai totiat taꞌa­tu­ꞌapyk ienuk hap eꞌat turan — Uito poꞌog torania kai taꞌa­tuꞌe hap moherep teran haype iꞌewyte taꞌa­tue­sokpe ikahu kahato hap ete taꞌa­tu­ꞌapyk hap tote. Morekuat eꞌokipy tote teꞌe­renuk teran. Yt teꞌe­renuk teran i iraniaꞌin miitꞌin emiit wywo.

Miꞌiria pe Iesui toꞌe — Uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin karãpeĩ more­kuaria eikaykay ienuk hap kape turan o yt eiwo­ꞌo­ꞌapyk teiꞌo iwatoꞌin nakaria eꞌamyap tote eiwe­mo­wato haype hap e. Pyno poꞌog waku paaꞌe haria wo yn itote eweikup­teꞌen. Maꞌato eweiꞌapyk more­kuaria ewy turanuat putꞌokꞌe wẽtup ok poꞌog iwato rakat eikawiat hat. Miꞌi hawyi aru ienuk hap kaꞌiwat toꞌe aru ehepe — Apuete uhyt mana etum no eꞌamyap meiũwat uiwy pe e aru. Miꞌi hawyi eraꞌapyk kuepe e aru. Miꞌi pote aru eiwe­mõti hap kahato topy­huꞌat ehete e. Miꞌi hawyi ienuk hap eꞌat pe eremõti kahato yi tote apyk pe eraꞌapyk hawyi e.

Miꞌi pote woro­ho­ꞌo­nãpin teran uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin. Karãpe aikaykay ienuk hap kape turan waku wata­ꞌapyk yt uwe mikuap i yatype. Miꞌi pote aru ienuk kaꞌiwat tut ahowawi hawyi — Poꞌog waku morekuat amyap tote ro eraꞌapyk mana uhyt e aru ahepe. Miꞌi hawyi aiwe­mõ­typot hap itote topy­huꞌat. Iꞌewyte aru itotiaria aikuap taꞌyn more­kuaria mimõ­typot no watoĩ­neꞌen hap are.
Katu­pono mio tã e ehowawi AheTupana — Wemo­wato haria mohit hano areĩneꞌen e. Maꞌato wemohit haria mõtypot hano areĩneꞌen e.

Miꞌi hawyi tuwe­morem hawyi Iesui toꞌe i ienuk kaꞌi­waria pe — Uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin e karãpe ienuk hap iwato rakat watunug teran yt naku i wati­ꞌa­tu­kaykay ienuk hap kape aika­tu­wyria aiwy­riaꞌin iwatoꞌin nakaria are. Poꞌog waku watu­wẽka ienuk kape yt uwe mikuap i koꞌi hesyꞌat rakaria hatek takaria katu­pono miꞌi haria yt aikaykay kuap i aru taꞌa­tuenuk hap kape yt hekat rakaria i pote. Maꞌato aiwy­riaꞌin hekat rakaria yn wati­ꞌa­tu­kaykay pote meiũran iꞌewyte aikaykay taꞌa­tuenuk wato hap kape. Yt naku i — Waku atikaykay uiwy­riaꞌin hekat rakaria uiꞌyat kape ienuk hamo katu­pono atiꞌa­tupoi hawyi iꞌewyte wyti aru uikaykay iꞌatuꞌyat kape iꞌatu­miꞌu u hamo yt naku i watoꞌe aiwa­nẽtup hawe wati­ꞌa­tu­kaykay miitꞌin ehenuk hap kape turan.

Poꞌog waku watoꞌe aiwa­nẽtup hawe — Waku poꞌog atiꞌa­tu­kaykay uiꞌyat kape tenuk hamo hatek sese rakaria ipiit saꞌag nakaria ipy saꞌag nakaria poꞌog waku watoꞌe. Waku yt ihapytig i rakaria yt miitꞌin mikyꞌe koꞌi i atiꞌa­tu­kaykay uiꞌyat kape ienuk hamo poꞌog waku watoꞌe are. Pyno miꞌi tã watunug hawyi Tupana meremo tikuap ahegyiꞌat hap hawyi wy ti aru meremo aru Tupana aikaykay tomi­mõ­typot koꞌi wo wato­py­huꞌat aipoi hamo toenuk wato hap kape e. Katu­pono hatek takaria kyꞌe haria wo watoĩ­neꞌen Tupana ewywuat pote. Miꞌi hawyi eweinõꞌẽ eiku­ꞌuro hap pyi miꞌi hawyi aru taꞌaipok kahato ehowawi mekewat miꞌu eimiium hap satek takaria piat enuk wato nug hap saꞌup Tupana po pyi atipy pe e Iesui.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok miit itote ihay kahato Iesui kape tenuk hap yparakai totepyi — Ikahu kahato tig ehay e. Urumuꞌe kahato En. Pywo aru meiũran meimuẽwat ienuk haria iꞌatu­wepit kahato Tupana yparakai henuk hap tote e. Taꞌi Tupana putꞌokꞌe Morekuat no hap eꞌat pe ienuk hap aimo­wepit kahato hap aru toĩneꞌen e.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiwesat — Pywo ti rat mehĩ wen maꞌato ti mesup taꞌyn Tupana tiꞌa­tu­kaykay tenuk wato hap kape maꞌato miꞌi pytkai miitꞌin yt tuwat teran i e. Pyno ahenoi ehepe miꞌi iãꞌãkap wuo. Wẽtup eꞌat pe so hekat kahato rakat tiꞌa­tu­kaykay kahato tominug ienuk hap iwato kahato rakat kape. Katu­pono Miꞌi Miit miitꞌin Potypot nuat ieĩneꞌen hat.

Miꞌi hawyi tuwehay poꞌoro kahato miitꞌin typyꞌi rakaria kape — Eweiõꞌẽ ro eweiõꞌẽ ro waku raꞌyn aimiꞌu ikãꞌã raꞌyn iwato kahato rakat waku raꞌyn eweiõꞌẽ mesuwe katu­pono yparakai tote raꞌyn aimiꞌu wuat aimo­wepit hap e. Iꞌewyte ahesapo hy waku raꞌyn wy e. Uꞌi he kahato rakat toĩneꞌen e. Pyno eweiõꞌẽ ro e. Waku raꞌyn eweiõꞌẽ ro uiwy­riaꞌin e. Pyno waku eweiꞌe ro iraniaꞌin me uiwy­riaꞌin me e teꞌe­ropat haria tehay enoi haria pe e. Miꞌi hawyi tuwat. — Aimiꞌu raꞌyn iꞌatuꞌe.

Maꞌato — Apu i ete iꞌatuꞌe. Yt naku i te mesup areto e. Etikuap kat pote yt uipo­hepap i te mesup katu­pono atipuẽti raꞌyn mesup yi wakuat uiweko nug hamuat e. Katu­pono mesup taꞌyn ti areto hamuat mekewat yi hun kapiat uiꞌa­kasa uiweko nug hamuat hap kape e. Miꞌi tote ti ikahu kahato. Pyno waku ereꞌe morekuat pe — Yt areto kuap enuk hap ikahu rakat kape e morekuat potpo­ꞌoro pe.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok pe i — Toꞌiro morekuat enuk hap kape mehĩ e. Waku raꞌyn e. Ikahu kahato tig itote e. Miꞌi pote — Waku mehĩ e wen maꞌato ti mesup te yt areto kuap i e yt uipo­hepap i te mesup. Etikuap kat pote. Naꞌatpo atikyiꞌat 5 wewato ahup miꞌi pote mesup areto uiꞌa­kasa hamo waku sio uimi­kyiꞌat koꞌi sio yt hap kuap hamo. Sio iꞌatue­saika uheꞌyara ekyi yi totiat hamo sio yt. Miꞌi hap koꞌi ete ti yt uipo­hepap i e. Pyno miꞌi pote ereꞌe o morekuat pe — Areto teran wen waku kahato hap kape maꞌato yt areto kuap i. Pyno waure wo o morekuat toĩneꞌen uikai mehĩ e.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok morekuat wy ok yat pe teke hawyi — Aimꞌu raꞌyn mehĩ e. Ikahu kahato tig morekuat yat pe e. Iwato kahato tig ahenuk hap e. Pyno toꞌiro mehĩ e. Miꞌi hawyi toiwesat — Pyno waku areto teran ni maꞌato ti yt uipo­hepap i te koitywy morekuat enuk hap kape e. Etikuap kat pote e. Gaꞌatpo atipuẽti uheha­ryꞌi ikahu rakat miꞌi pote areĩneꞌen mesup iwywo e. Pyno waku ereꞌe morekuat pe — Waure wo soke ereĩneꞌen ere morekuat pe kat pote ti yt uipo­hepap i te. Mesup uheha­ryꞌi mowepit hap ete areĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi hap ete areĩneꞌen mesup e.

Miꞌi hawyi heropat haria teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok i raꞌyn morekuat kape — Yt tõꞌẽ i wyti ewyriaꞌin uhyt teꞌe­roꞌe hamo. Miꞌi hawyi toikuap yne raꞌyn iꞌatuꞌe hap — Yt uipo­hepap i te mesup e haria yn aimi­kaykay koꞌi iꞌatuꞌe hawyi morekuat ipyꞌahak kahato iꞌatuete hawyi toꞌe tomi­po­ꞌo­roria pe — Pyno eweiwat i ro wuatꞌi muꞌap wato upi wuatꞌi muꞌap hit koꞌi upi. Miꞌi hap upi eweiꞌa­tu­kaykay wuatꞌi haky­ꞌeꞌi rakaria hatek takaria uhenuk hap kape e. Waku eweiꞌa­tu­kaykay yne tawa wato piaria yt hekat rakaria i yt ipy kahato rakaria i yt ipo kahato rakaria i yt ihapytig i rakaria yt hewyry kuap i rakaria ipiit saꞌag saꞌag nakaria yt uwe mikyꞌe i koꞌi miꞌiria meikowo henuk hap kape eweiꞌa­tu­kaykay ro e morekuat teropat haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi tuwat hawyi taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­kaykay yne miitꞌin yt iwatoꞌin nakaria i yt uwe mikyꞌe i koꞌi morekuat enuk wato hap kape. Miꞌiria tõꞌẽ tõꞌẽ kahato howawi. Miꞌi hap kaipyi teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok i raꞌyn ihay moherep haria morekuat kape. — Urutunug naꞌyn ni emiky­ꞌesat ewy mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi tõꞌẽ emikaykay koꞌi iꞌatuꞌe. Typyꞌi kahato ti wen enuk hap tote tukup­teꞌen mesup maꞌato miꞌi pytkai emiꞌu iwato kahato pote yt taꞌa­tuꞌu kuap i yne iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi pote morekuat toꞌe — Are pãi e pyno waku eweiwat i ro yne yꞌy hit i koꞌi upiat gupteꞌen haria kape e. Yne tawa hit tawa hit koꞌi kape gaꞌapy piaria kape e. Miꞌiria etiꞌa­tu­kaykay meikowo hamo e. Katu­pono ti atiky­ꞌesat uiꞌyat pytꞌat nug yne miitꞌin miat hap e. Atiky­ꞌesat nyti hikꞌe miitꞌin no uiꞌyat hap e. Saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria uimi­kaykay koꞌiria uimõ­py­ꞌahak kahato uiwy­riaꞌin sese miꞌiria uiꞌy­wania pytkai yt tõꞌẽ i. Pywo pe ti rat areꞌe pyno yt karãpe i aru miꞌiria teꞌe­renuk uimiꞌu wakuat rakat ete. Yt taꞌa­tukuap i aru he hap. Yt wẽtup ok i raꞌyn ti teke kuap irane uhenuk hawe uimi­kaykay saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria koꞌi e morekuat topot­po­ꞌo­roria tehay enoi haria pe. Miꞌi hap ewy ti miitꞌin tukup­teꞌen mesup e Iesui. Tupana tiꞌa­tu­kaykay kahato koran te tenuk wato kahato hap kape e Iesui yt tehay mohey i haria pe.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toto i raꞌyn hawyi typyꞌi rakaria miitꞌin tuwat tuwat raꞌyn hupi. Miꞌi hawyi tuwe­sai­peꞌok toupiat õꞌẽ haria muꞌe hamo.

Eweipy­huꞌat teran uipot­po­ꞌo­roria uhemiit sese wo miꞌi pote woro­ho­ꞌo­ky­ꞌesat kahato. Miꞌi pote ahenoi aikotã aikotã eweikup­teꞌen uhemiit sese wo hap uimi­ky­ꞌesat ewywuat nug hap e. Uhupi ereto hap etiky­ꞌesat pote eweitoiat yne eimi­ky­ꞌesat e. Miꞌi hawyi poꞌog uikyꞌe eiwat eꞌywot kai ety kai eharyꞌi kai eheꞌaito kai eimẽ­pytꞌin kai eheykeꞌet kai eheywyt kai ehesa­kiꞌyt kai eiky­pyꞌyt kai eheinyt kai iꞌewyte eiwe­kyꞌe hap kai uikyꞌe uimi­ky­ꞌesat nug hap poꞌog eimi­ky­ꞌesat koꞌi nug hap kai. Miꞌi hawyi eweiꞌe — Uiku­ꞌuro pote uiku­ꞌuro maꞌato areto eupi eweiꞌe uhepe miꞌi hawyi miꞌi hap yn waku uhemiit no.
Maꞌato eweikenꞌẽ eiku­ꞌuro hap pupi pote miꞌi pote ariaꞌyp posak ete eiku­ꞌuro hap uiꞌewy e hap yt eweiky­ꞌesat i. Miꞌi hawyi yt eweiwat kuap i uhupi uhemiitꞌin sese wo uipot­po­ꞌo­roria wo e.

Pyno ahenoi hãꞌãkap wo aikotã waku hap. Pyno so wẽtup ok surara akag tunug neran ywaiti rakat toꞌyat. Tuꞌuka teran itote pywiat hap moryꞌa wywuat hap. Miꞌi hawyi tutunug hap eꞌyianme ti ipotpap kahato miwan ete karania upi miꞌi hap nug hamuat hap ete karania eꞌat temiitꞌin poi hamuat hap ete karania upi nu wato kyiꞌat hap ete karania upi haꞌup nug hap ete sio tekat putꞌokꞌe inug hamo sio yt hap kuap hamo.

Miꞌi hawyi tuwepe toꞌe — Pyno uiweꞌeg wo mesuwat nug hap ete e. Yt naku i atunug wẽtup ipatꞌok yn e. Waku atunug yne e. Maꞌato ahaꞌa­wynug hap yn mote miꞌi hawyi uhekat yt putꞌokꞌe i raꞌyn hawyi miitꞌin miky­ryꞌi areĩneꞌen aru e. Pyno yt atiky­ꞌesat i miꞌi tã pote waku atikuap saꞌa­wyꞌi sio uhekat putꞌokꞌe uiꞌyat ywaiti nug hamo e tuwepe. Pyno waku atunug yne kahato miꞌi pote yn miitꞌin mimõ­typot no areĩneꞌen kuap e. Katu­pono atimo­waku yne kahato maꞌato yt pote ten toꞌo­ky­ryꞌi kahato uiminug ipatꞌok hap ete e. Pyno miꞌi iãꞌãkap ewy kahato eweikup­teꞌen uhemiit no teran eweikup­teꞌen mote. Waku eweiwekuap ti sio pytꞌok­ꞌe­weiꞌe inug hamo hap ete sio yt hap kuap hamo. Miꞌi hawyi waku eweiwat uhupi e Iesui itotiaria pe — Urutuwat teran ehupi e haria pe.

Pyno wẽtup iãꞌãkap i ahenoi ehepe e. Pyno saꞌa­wyꞌi so wẽtup tawa porekuat toꞌe tuwepe — Pyno atimoma teran iraniaꞌin ywania uhewa­nĩ­kaptia uhesu­ra­raꞌin wywo e tuwepe tuwa­nẽtup so e Iesui. Miꞌi hawyi maꞌato yt atikuap i uhesu­ra­raꞌin imoma hamo sio putꞌokꞌe sio yt e so. Katu­pono uhesu­ra­raꞌin sok 10000 surara yn maꞌato uhesu­ra­raꞌin kai maꞌato uhewa­nĩ­kat­ptia esura­raꞌin 20000 hap ewy tukup­teꞌen e. Miꞌi hawyi morekuat tiꞌa­tu­kaykay tuwe­wawi tonãpin hat surara akag iweꞌeg kahato rakat — Waku apo watuwat uhesu­ra­raꞌin nywo uhewa­nĩ­kaptia moma hamo e sio apo yt e. Katu­pono ti uhewa­nĩ­kaptia tõꞌẽ kahato ahetawa moma hamo 20000 sura­raꞌin wywo maꞌato aiwat ahesu­ra­raꞌin 10000 surara yn tukup­teꞌen e. Miꞌi pote atikuap teran waku watuwat sio yt hap e. Maꞌato yt naku i eweiꞌe pote woro­ho­ꞌo­po­ꞌoro eipe uhehay wywo iꞌatue­wawi iꞌatu­po­re­kuaria kape e. Miꞌi hawyi waku watum ahekat aiwo­ꞌo­wese hap nug hamuat e so mekewat morekat tesu­rara akag me e Iesui tehay iãꞌãkap hawe itotiat — Urutuwat teran ehupi e haria pe.

Pyno mesuwat uhehay iãꞌãkap wuo ahenoi teran ehepe aikotã waku eweiwat uhupi hap uhemiitꞌin sese wanuat hap. Pyno waku miꞌi hap ewy heꞌyian­mete eiwe­wa­nẽtup niatpo kahato eito uhupiat hap ete e. Katu­pono pywo ti uwe uwe uhupi toto uwe uwe toto teran uhupi waku miꞌi hat tuwa­nẽtup kahato — Atunug aru uika­ꞌiwat miky­ꞌesat ewy yn e. Pyno miꞌi hawyi uiat uimi­ky­ꞌesat atiwaure yne uiminug neran hap koꞌi hawyi waku eweiꞌe eweiwat teran uipot­po­ꞌo­roria waku maꞌato yt mio tã eweiꞌe i eiwat teran uhupiat hap ete pote yt karãpe i waku eweikup­teꞌen uhemiit no uipotpap nug hamo e Iesui areto teran ehupi e haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe temiitꞌin me — Ewetum no ehewaure kaꞌa uhepe uiwy­riaꞌin e katu­pono uhehay pywo kahato pe areꞌe ehepe e. Yt uheso i rat eiperia aikotã ukyt ewy eweikup­teꞌen uipot­po­ꞌo­roria sese eweikup­teꞌen hawyi e. Ukyt waku kahato aimiꞌu apopyt no. Miꞌi hawyi hẽꞌẽ kahato waku kahato aimiꞌu mosẽꞌẽ hamo ukyt waku kahato e. Maꞌato toĩneꞌen ukyt yt he rakat i mesu­wa­rote uhemiit yt kan hamo i ewywuat katu­pono ukyt nop takat ewywuano tukup­teꞌen hawyi yt hẽꞌẽ hin i pote yt he i hap ewywuat hawyi yt kat hamo i e. Ukyt yt hẽꞌẽ i rakat ti yt kat hamo i e. Yt naku i wy aimikoi ete katu­pono aimikoi auka hap topy­huꞌat e. Pyno ukyt nop takat yt kat hamo i miꞌi pote miitꞌin mipugha muꞌap tote ahetama pe hawyi miitꞌin miꞌakit akit no toĩneꞌen muꞌap tote e. Miꞌi hap ewy uhemiit yt he kahato rakat i ewy e. Pyno eiwa­nẽtup o uhehay mio wuat kape uiwy­riaꞌin e. Ehewaure kaꞌa apypok kahato uhehay kape e Iesui toupiat wat haria pe muꞌap upi.

PIAT EWYWẽtup eꞌat pe putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe kahato Iesui ete yt nakuaria i sese koꞌi. Taꞌa­tukuap teran ihay haype. Iraniaꞌin tukup­teꞌen itote sero­ꞌokꞌe haria ewywuat katu­pono miꞌiria muꞌap pyhyp haria. Miꞌiria ti wuatꞌi kaipyi taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat saꞌup ikokaꞌat hap hawyi. Miꞌi saꞌup taꞌatuium more­kuaria pe Iuteu ywania ewanĩ­kaptia pe maꞌato yt taꞌatuium i yne saꞌup katu­pono saꞌup poꞌog more­kuaria miky­ꞌesat hap ok tã taꞌa­tusat miitꞌin kaipyi hawyi taꞌa­tu­patꞌok hawyi saꞌup iwato taꞌa­tu­te­roꞌok taꞌa­tue­wanuat. Miꞌi pote yt uwe miky­ꞌesat i koꞌi miꞌiria tukup­teꞌen.

Miꞌiria Iesui tiꞌa­tu­muꞌe kahato Tupana ete. Miꞌi hawyi Tupana mõtypot yat akag koꞌi putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe itote hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe — Kat poteĩ Iesui ihay yt nakuaria i wywo iꞌatuꞌe. Yt naku i ti miꞌi tã watunug iꞌatuꞌe. Iꞌewyte Tupana ehay wan haria putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe itote wy. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tu­mohit kahato Iesui — Kat poteĩ Iesui tenuk yt nakuat i sese wywo iꞌatuꞌe. Yt Tupana miky­ꞌesat ewy i Iesui tunug iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tuwe­morem Tupana mõtypot yat apykok haria akag koꞌi kape hawyi toꞌe iꞌatuepe — Uhytꞌiꞌin e woro­ho­ꞌo­muꞌe teran sehay hãꞌãkap wuo kat poteĩ Tupana tiꞌa­tu­kyꞌe kahato yt nakuaria i hap ete.

Pyno so wẽtup ok toĩneꞌen tohũ 100 Uweuria rakat apykok hat e. Miꞌi hat so wẽtup eꞌat pe toiꞌa­tu­mo­rania kahato tohũria hawyi toipuẽti 99 yn tohũria itote hawyi toꞌe — Are pãi wẽtup uihũ sig hoꞌo­wasat pãi e. Miꞌi hawyi so aikotã som atipuẽti aru uihũ howasat rakat ehakye­raꞌat hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi so tohok­ꞌiwat 99 rakat iꞌatuenuk hap tote. Miꞌi rokirẽ toto tohũ hoꞌo­wasat rakat kat hamo. Miꞌi hawyi so hoꞌo­wasat rakat kat hap ete yt ipohep hin i e.

Miꞌi tusoke ti toipuẽti raꞌyn tohũ hoꞌo­wasat hap tote. Miꞌi hawyi totat hawyi tohupit hawyi toterut i raꞌyn toꞌyat kape e. Miꞌi hat so miꞌi hawyi iwepit kahato tohũ wẽtup ok takat puẽti hap ete wẽtup yn hoꞌo­wasat rakat puẽti hap ete 99 ihũria yt hoꞌo­wasat rakaria i pytkai e.

Miꞌi hawyi putꞌok­toꞌe toꞌyat piat hawyi towy­riaꞌin toiꞌa­tu­kaykay tuwe­wawi tuwepit haypiat iꞌatupoi hamo hawyi toꞌe iꞌatuepe — Koitywy uiwepit hap eꞌat pe katu­pono uihũ hoꞌo­wasat rakat atipuẽti i raꞌyn e. Pyno toꞌiro watenuk toꞌiro wate­sa­poꞌu pyno waku aiwepit miꞌi hap ete e teka­tu­wyria pe e Iesui henoi hãꞌãkap wuo itote.

Miꞌi hawyi tomohey haria pe Iesui toꞌe — Taꞌi karãpe aihũ wati­puẽti hoꞌo­wasat rakat aimo­wepit kahato hap toĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti Tupana toĩneꞌen wẽtup ok miit hoꞌo­wasat rakat toipuẽti hawyi tuwe­mo­wepit kahato e. Pyno toiky­ꞌesat kahato ti yt nakuaria i aipok tewawiat hap e. Toiky­ꞌesat kahato miitꞌin waure wo toĩneꞌen neran taꞌa­tu­minug saꞌag koꞌi hap etiat hap e. Karãpe hoꞌo­wasat rakat wẽtup ok toipuẽti hawyi atipy piaria iꞌatu­wepit kahato Tupana wywo e. Ienuk hap iwato kahato taꞌa­tunug hap ewy e. Mekewat saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat poꞌog yt nakuat i wemorem naꞌyn Tupana ewawiat hap imowepit kahato e. Iꞌewyte tukup­teꞌen 99 rakaria ewywuaria miꞌiria ti — Uruto wakuaria e haria ewywuaria tukup­teꞌen — Yt karãpe i uruto hoꞌo­wasat rakaria wo e haria. Uruto hãpyk sese rakaria iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hap ewywuaria tukup­teꞌen 99 rakaria ewy uhehay iãꞌãkap hawuo e. Tupana tiꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato yne tohũria maꞌato wẽtup ok hoꞌo­wasat raꞌyn hawyi toikat kahato miꞌi hat e. Yt waure hin i hoꞌo­wasat hap ete e. Miꞌi hat puẽti hap hawyi poꞌog iwepit iraniaꞌin kai e Iesui — Kat pote pãi etiꞌa­tu­muꞌe yt nakuat i rakaria ehay uhyt e haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup i ahenoi teran hãꞌãkap wuo e Iesui. Ahetama pe ti ihainiaꞌin tum hary­po­riaꞌin me — Woro­ky­ꞌesat en uheha­ryꞌi wo pote atum epe mesuwat wahi 10 a imehit rakat Uru kawiat atum naꞌyn haꞌup ekyiꞌat hamuat e hap moherep hamo hap ewy taꞌa­tunug ahetama pe e. Miꞌi hap ewywuat wẽtup a taꞌat hewahi pyi hawyi toikat kahato hary­poria ahetama piat hawyi wãtymꞌi turan mote meremo teꞌaria uhu miꞌi hawyi toikat toꞌyat pe. Yt toipuẽti i hawyi tohy­wytip toꞌyat hawyi yi perup we toikat kahato mekewat iꞌa mehit rakat at hat teꞌaito wuat miium tesaꞌup wote howoity kahato rakat wahi iꞌa mehit rakat e.

Miꞌi hawyi toipuẽti raꞌyn hawyi hary­poria iwepit kahato torania i raꞌyn 10 a rakat hawyi e. Miꞌi hawyi toiꞌa­tu­kaykay raꞌyn towy­riaꞌin hary­po­riaꞌin tuwe­wawi miꞌiria pe — Toꞌiro watenuk wate­sa­poꞌu e katu­pono mesup eꞌat uiwepit hap sese toĩneꞌen katu­pono saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat uheꞌaito miium uheha­ryꞌi wuat e hap 10 a rakat wẽtup atipun nakat atipuẽti hawyi e.

Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe i itotiaria — Uruto poꞌog e haria pe. — Taꞌi yt uheso hin i ti uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin e. Aikotã hary­poria tipuẽti tewahi tomipun hawyi tuwehum iwepit kahato hap ewy ti Tupana hoꞌo­wasat rakat aipok towawiat hap ete tuwehum kahato e. Toiꞌa­tu­kaykay atipy piaria hawyi — Toꞌiro aiwepit e katu­pono wẽtup ok miit taꞌaipok uhowawi hoꞌo­wasat rakat itote e yt naku i sese nug haria miꞌiria pytkai e. Miꞌi hap ewy ti areĩneꞌen yt nakuaria i muꞌe hamo yt eimi­ky­ꞌesat ewy i pytkai e. Katu­pono Tupana tiky­ꞌesat miꞌiria aipok tuwe­wawiat hap pote e Iesui.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe — Pyno wẽtup iãꞌãkap i ahenoi Tupana tiky­ꞌesat kahato yt naku i nug haria aipok hap tuwe­wawiat hap ete. Saꞌa­wyꞌi so wẽtup ok ihainia typy ok haꞌyru rakat toĩneꞌen. Miꞌi iꞌatu­ꞌywot waku kahato rakat. Miꞌi hat so wẽtup ok haꞌyru watꞌypꞌi toꞌe toꞌywot pe — Papai yt atiky­ꞌesat i epowatꞌyp ekuꞌuro turan hawyi e maꞌato mesup taꞌyn atiky­ꞌesat e. Pyno etipatꞌok o kat koꞌi kat koꞌi uhepe epowatꞌyp uiat e katu­pono uhewyry teran wyti Papai e. Miꞌi pote toimõꞌẽ raꞌyn tekat koꞌi toku­ꞌuro hap owakai e. Miꞌi hawyi so wẽtup eꞌat hawyi — Pyno areto raꞌyn Papai e so.

Miꞌi hawyi toꞌywot miium tohytmoi yne toꞌyara wato pe hawyi toto e. Iwato kahato totioto toꞌywot ekat hawyi toto pya wẽtup tawa kape wẽtup yꞌy kape e. Miꞌi hap tote toiwe­neru kat koꞌi kat koꞌi hawyi toikyiꞌat mahy koꞌi hawyi tema­hyꞌu hary­po­riaꞌin toiꞌa­tu­kaykay kahato tuwe­wawi. Hairu hap yn tutunug at kaꞌap itote toꞌywot ekareꞌen saꞌup mo tenuk kahato itote e. Towy­riaꞌin kyiꞌat hamo toipugha kahato toꞌywot ekat yt tuweꞌeg hin i haype toipugha topiit miky­ꞌesat yt naku i nug hap upi e Iesui.

Miꞌi hap tote tehairu at kaꞌap pote toꞌywot miium iwato rakat tekat toimo­weityk yne e. Miꞌi hap eꞌat pe ti syꞌat kahato hap taꞌyn putꞌokꞌe tuete hawyi yt kat i raꞌyn miꞌu kyiꞌat hamuat haꞌup ipo pe e. Miꞌi turan yt iꞌaman hin i yne mekewat tawa ko ete yi wato hap ok tã e. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌatu­mikoi yt tuwenug kuap i hawyi yne yne iꞌatue­syꞌat e.

Miꞌi hawyi tesyꞌat sese raꞌyn hawyi toho­ꞌokat topoi hanuat. Toiky­ꞌesat topotpap hap miꞌu hit saꞌup mo. Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok yat kape toto miꞌi hat pe toꞌe — Arepotpap teran eupi uhyt e. Miꞌi hawyi — Pyno waku uhehamaut asuwai koꞌi etiꞌa­tupoi at at e tope. Miꞌi hawyi toto hamaut asuwai koꞌi apykok hamo e.

Miꞌi tote hamaut asuwai pyꞌa­setpiat toĩneꞌen turan hesyꞌat sese hap putꞌokꞌe tuete hawyi ti toꞌe tuwepe — Pyno waku ahuꞌu hamaut asuwai miꞌu ape kumana ape e. Mio tã tuwa­nẽtup hawe putꞌokꞌe hamaut asuwai kaꞌiwat hawyi toꞌe — Yt etuꞌu teiꞌo maꞌato uihũria miꞌu e.

Miꞌi hawyi hesyꞌat sese hap tuete hawyi ti tuwe­wa­nẽtup kahato topyꞌa pe — Yt uiweꞌeg hin i pãi e katu­pono areĩneꞌen hesyꞌat sese maꞌato yne uiꞌywot eropat haria teꞌe­renuk at kaꞌap kahato uiꞌywot yat pe yne eꞌat pe miꞌu puꞌi sakpoꞌe tukup­teꞌen itote e. Miꞌi hawyi ikap takaria wo uiꞌywot eropat haria tukup­teꞌen maꞌato uito uikag motꞌi rakat areĩneꞌen.
