Uꞌi he rakat hẽꞌẽ rakat ete teꞌe­renuk at kaꞌap maꞌato atuꞌu teran hamaut miꞌu kumana ape maꞌato — Yt etuꞌu teiꞌo uhehamaut miꞌi iꞌatuꞌe uhepe. Yt naku pe i areĩneꞌen mesuwe e tuwepe.

Pyno yt uiweꞌeg hin i areĩneꞌen meiũpe pãi e. Pyno waku araꞌaipok i uiꞌywot yat kape hawyi — Papai areꞌe aru tope woro­maꞌat kahato en uiminug saꞌag wo iꞌewyte ti Tupana maꞌat hano areĩneꞌen are aru tope e. Katu­pono ti ihamo ti atunug yt naku i hap are aru uiꞌywot pe uiꞌaipok hawyi e.

Pyno Papai uhewaku hap yt putꞌokꞌe i te raꞌyn esaꞌyru wat uheĩneꞌen hamo are aru Papai pe e. Miꞌi tupono waku eropat hano raꞌyn uinug Papai are aru e. Pyno miꞌi hawyi — Uhaꞌyru yt ereꞌe teiꞌo poꞌog uhepe maꞌato uheropat hat en ereꞌe ro aru uhepe papai areꞌe aru e topyꞌa pe tuwa­nẽtup hamaut asuwai pyꞌa­setpiat toĩneꞌen hap eꞌat pe.

Miꞌi hawyi ti paaꞌe sese raꞌyn itote tuwak popuo hawyi topoĩꞌãm hawyi meremo toto raꞌyn toꞌywot kape. Miꞌi turan iꞌywot taꞌa­kasa pya howawi muꞌap upiat hut turan. Miꞌi pote iꞌywot hatyꞌu kahato topyꞌa pe tosa­ꞌyru toiky­ꞌesat kahato topyꞌa pe hawyi so iꞌywot punꞌe howa kape hawyi iporokꞌat tosa­ꞌyru ete hawyi toiꞌã­pysig tosa­ꞌyru e.

Miꞌi pote haꞌyru toꞌe toꞌywot pe — Papai yt uiweꞌeg hin i e. Ekat atipun yne raꞌyn uiminug saꞌag hap ete e. Yt naku i sese atunug Tupana ehamo wẽtup hy tote e. miꞌi pote iꞌewyte epe yt naku i atunug e. Miꞌi pote yt putꞌok­ꞌare i raꞌyn emẽpyt wuat uheĩneꞌen hamo uiꞌywot e. Pyno koitywy waku areĩneꞌen eropat hano yn naꞌyn e. Maꞌato ti iꞌywot toꞌe — Yt nyti yt nyti uhaꞌyru wo kahato ereĩneꞌen ne e. Miꞌi hawyi kaykayꞌe teropat haria tehay pirik wo — Merep to eweterut ro uhaꞌyru esokpe wuat ikahu rakat hawyi ewetopag ipiit pe. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌewyte ipy sokpe eweterut ro e. Iꞌewyte eterut ro muĩꞌãpiat hekat rakat hawyi ewetopag ipuĩꞌã pe e. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe i tomiꞌu nug haria pe — Eweterut ro wẽtup wewato ahup mẽpyt aimiꞌu wo ikap takat e. Miꞌi hawyi eweiꞌauka hawyi ewetey hawyi waku watenuk kahato e. Miꞌi hawyi waku aiwepit hap sese watunug meiũpe e teropat haria pe.

Uhaꞌyru saꞌa­wyꞌi hoꞌo­wasat rakat toĩneꞌen ikuꞌuro rakat ewy maꞌato mesup uimi­puẽti toĩneꞌen i. Saꞌa­wyꞌi pya pyi aikai toĩneꞌen maꞌato ti mesup miꞌi kaipyi tuwẽtem naꞌyn guꞌuro pyi hap ewy toĩneꞌen e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi ti hoꞌo­wasat kahato rakat ewy uhaꞌyru toĩneꞌen maꞌato ti mesup uipuẽti i raꞌyn e. Miꞌi hap uimo­wepit kahato. Miꞌi pote waku mesup aiwepit kahato hap watunug ahenuk hap iwato e. Miꞌi hawyi ti teꞌe­renuk kahato raꞌyn itote haꞌyru mõtypot hamo.

Miꞌi turan ti iykeꞌet putꞌokꞌe toko pyi temiitꞌin nywo taꞌaipok topotpap hap toko kaipyi hawyi yt pya hin i turan iꞌyat kai turan toikuap pypyꞌe hap toywyt hoꞌo­wasat saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat rakat mõtypot hap ienuk hap toikuap. Toikuap toywyt mõtypot hap toꞌywot piat hawyi ti ipyꞌahak kahato hawyi yt teke teran hin i ienuk hawe. Miꞌi hawyi toiꞌa­tu­kaykay toꞌywot emiitꞌin tuwe­wawi apotoꞌe hamo — Kat poteĩ iꞌatu­wepit meikope e.

Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tu­wesat — Mehĩ mimi iꞌatuꞌe eywyt mesup tut iꞌatuꞌe. Yt ikuꞌuro hin i ti yt aiꞌywot wanẽtup hap ewy hin i. Miꞌi pote aiꞌywot iwepit kahato hawyi mesup aiꞌywot tiky­ꞌesat mesup aiwo­ꞌo­mo­wepit hap iꞌatuꞌe. Waku kahato raꞌyn hap upi ti eiꞌywot tiꞌauka tohũ mẽpyt ikap takat aimiꞌu aiwepit haypiat wuat iꞌatuꞌe. Ikãꞌã raꞌyn mimi uhyt iꞌatuꞌe pyno ereke ro mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe.

Toywyt yt naku i nug hat aipok hap toikuap hawyi poꞌog ipyꞌahak iykeꞌet hawyi yt teke teran hin i raꞌyn toꞌywot yat pe. Miꞌi hap toikuap hawyi iꞌywot toto raꞌyn howawi toꞌyat pyi ikaykay hamo — Ereke ro uhaꞌyru e. Waku aimo­wepit yne aito mesup uhaꞌyru e. Katu­pono eywyt hoꞌo­wasat rakat wyti wati­puẽti i raꞌyn mesup e tosa­ꞌyru yianme. Maꞌato — Yt rat Papai e. Yt karãpe i ti uimo­wepit hamo etiꞌauka ehũ ikap takat e. Arepotpap at at kaꞌap kaꞌap eimi­ky­ꞌesat nug hap etiat pytkai maꞌato ti yt karãpe i uiat uimõ­typot hap etunug Papai e. Emiky­ꞌesat ewy kahato atunug pytkai maꞌato ti yt waipaka i te wyti uiwy­riaꞌin wywuat uimo­wepit haypiat miꞌu wo etiꞌauka e. Maꞌato ti mekewat uheywyt ekareꞌen sem pun hat esaꞌyru aipok hap pote ienuk wato hap etunug imõtypot hamuat etunug yt karãpe i emiky­ꞌesat tutunug epiat pytkai e. Yt naku i miꞌi hap Papai e. Ekat saꞌup kaipyi ti hary­po­riaꞌin yt iweꞌeg i rakaria toiꞌa­tu­kyiꞌat kahato e. Miꞌi rokirẽ taꞌaipok hawyi aihũ poꞌog he rakat etiꞌauka maꞌato imowepit hamo poꞌog he waipaka kawiat rakat etiꞌauka imowepit hamo wewato ahup ikap takat etiꞌauka imowepit hamo. Yt naku i Papai e.

Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe iꞌywot tosa­ꞌyru yianmiat pe — Uhaꞌyru e yt mio tã ereꞌe teiꞌo e. Atikuap ewat ewaku hap miꞌi pote ti uipo­watꞌyp epo pe yne uiꞌyat uihũria uiko koꞌi uiꞌyat koꞌi torania meimuẽwat epo puo toĩneꞌen uipo­watꞌyp e. Atikuap ereĩneꞌen uiwywo wuatꞌi eꞌat pe hap e. Uhekat koꞌi yne emiky­ꞌesat ok tã toĩneꞌen ewano uipo­watꞌyp e. Miꞌi pytkai ti mesup yt naku i ereĩneꞌen ipyꞌahak eywyt ete are. Ereke ro uhaꞌyru waku watu­mo­wepit mesuwat wãtym kaꞌap katu­pono eywyt saꞌa­wyꞌi ikuꞌuro rakat ewy toĩneꞌen aiwa­nẽtup hawe maꞌato meiũ tut i raꞌyn saꞌa­wyꞌi hoꞌo­wasat kahato maꞌato mesup ti aipuẽti raꞌyn e iykeꞌet pe tosa­ꞌyru poꞌog nag nakat pe. Pyno ti uiꞌe hap ewy kahato ti e Iesui itotiaria pe. Katu­pono Tupana tuwe­mo­wepit kahato karãpe yt naku i nug haria tiꞌatoiat raꞌyn taꞌa­tu­minug yt naku i hap koꞌi hawyi teꞌe­ra­ꞌaipok Taꞌa­tu­ꞌywot Tupana kape mekewat haꞌyru hoꞌo­wasat rakat ewy e Iesui — Uruto poꞌog iraniaꞌin kai e haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui henoi hãꞌãkap wuo topot­mu­ꞌeria pe wuatꞌi nagnia ehay enoi haria pyꞌa­setpe. — Saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat ieĩneꞌen hat so hekat kahato rakat toĩneꞌen iꞌatuꞌe so e. Miꞌi hawyi so toikat kahato topotpap nug hap akag wuat hawyi toꞌe — Pyno waku ereĩneꞌen uiꞌe hap nug hap akag wo e. Atiky­ꞌesat etimo­wato uheka­reꞌen e so. Waku etipo­re­raꞌat yne uhepiat wete­weru haria kaipyi uhekat e. Miꞌi hawyi ti ipotpap taꞌyn hekat rakat ekareꞌen mowato hap ete. Maꞌato so wẽtup eꞌat pe tõꞌẽ kahato miitꞌin hekat rakat kape — Esaipepiat ti epotpap nug hat ti yt naku i sese yt hãpyk i sese taꞌa­tuꞌe hamo e. Toiꞌa­tu­mona toiꞌa­tue­roꞌok atueroꞌok ti ekareꞌen iꞌatuꞌe.

Mio tã iꞌatuꞌe hap tepiat hawyi toikaykay temiit teka­reꞌen apykok hat tuwe­wawi apotoꞌe hamo — Uhyt e iraniaꞌin uhemiitꞌin henoi kahato ti uhepe eminug uimaꞌat hap koꞌi etiat e maꞌato yt atikuap i sio pywo sio yt e. Miꞌi pote etimo­herep aikotã aikotã eminug epopera piat hap koꞌi uhyt e. Atiky­ꞌesat yne mesup miwan miat yne e maꞌato waku pytkai pote waku maꞌato pywo pote yt kan hamo i ereĩneꞌen poꞌog uipotpap nug hamuat e. Yt woro­ky­ꞌesat poꞌog i en uhemiit akag wo e.

— Pyno waku etimo­herep emiwan yne aikotã hãpyk uinug hap. Miꞌi hawyi toto toka­ꞌiwat toꞌakag maꞌat hat miꞌi hawyi toꞌe tuwepe — Are pãi aikotã aru atunug e katu­pono toikuap aru uimiwan koꞌi kaipyi tomaꞌat uhepiat hap e. Miꞌi hawyi aru yt kat i raꞌyn uipotpap hamuat toĩneꞌen hawyi uheha­ky­ꞌeꞌi aru arepy­huꞌat e. Mesup te waku maꞌato meiũran yt naku i e. Uhesaika hap yt putꞌokꞌe i te uiweko nug hamo e iꞌewyte yt areĩneꞌen neran sẽtup sẽtup e hano e tuwepe tuwa­nẽtup hawyi.

Aikotã aru atunug pãi e tuwepe. Pyno atikuap koitywy waku mesup taꞌyn atunug uiwy­riaꞌin wo kahato uiwy­riaꞌin uika­ꞌiwat piat uika­ꞌiwat ewete­weru haria e. Pyno waku atiꞌa­tu­kaykay miꞌi haria uhowawi hawyi waku atipatꞌok iꞌatu­we­te­weru hap e iꞌatu­mo­wepit hamo e. Katu­pono areĩneꞌen ne mesup uika­ꞌiwat emiit no te e. Katu­pono mũki­ꞌite uika­ꞌiwat yt uiky­ꞌesat i poꞌog naꞌyn e. Miꞌi hawyi maꞌato waku uika­ꞌiwat hekat rakat piat wete­weru haria yat pe areĩneꞌen e.
Miꞌi hawyi ikaꞌiwat hekat rakat piat wete­weru haria toiꞌa­tu­kaykay tuwe­wawi. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe wẽtup ok pe — Karania upi kẽi ewete­weru uika­ꞌiwat piat hap mehĩ e.

— Taꞌi iwato kahato tig uhyt e aikotã 100 kamũti howapy kahato hap ewy Uriweira kap muat rakat ewy uhyt e. Miꞌi hawyi toiwesat — Pyno ti waku wati­patꞌok hawyi waku 50 kamũti ikap yn uhyt e. Mio tã e pote wete­weru hat iwepit kahato tuwehum kahato. Miꞌi hawyi miwan miat toiwan 50 yn iwete­weru hap e. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tuset pehik mekewat miwan me hawyi toto.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok i toikaykay wete­weru hat — Karania upi kẽi uika­ꞌiwat piat ewete­weru hap uhyt e. — Taꞌi iwato kahato e. 100 hyt uꞌi kapiat hap ewy uhyt e. Miꞌi hawyi hekat rakat emiit akag tiwesat — Pyno waku wati­patꞌok ewete­weru hap hawyi waku etum 50 hyt yn e. Mio tã e pote wete­weru hat iwepit tuwehum kahato. Miꞌi hawyi mekewat miwan me taꞌa­tupag iwete­weru hap pakup 50 hyt kapiat yn iwete­weru hap mesup e hap. Miꞌi te weset pehik iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi tã ti tutunug at at toka­ꞌiwat hekat rakat maꞌat hat hemiit.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ewaty hap ete ikaꞌiwat tikaykay tuwe­wawi hawyi toka­ꞌiwat toꞌe temiit akag me — Are pãi pyno koitywy yne uiwe­te­weru haria ewyriaꞌin no tukup­teꞌen uimaꞌat kahato hap upi ewyriaꞌin sem etunug hawyi e. Pyno erewy­ꞌinug kahato uheka­reꞌen kaipyi e. Yt ikahu hin i eminug uhepiat hap atikuap taꞌyn e. Pyno worokuap taꞌyn eweꞌeg kahato saꞌag nug hap etiat hap e so e Iesui sehay iãꞌãkap wuo topot­mu­ꞌeria pe. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe i Iesui iꞌatuepe — Taꞌi uhytꞌiꞌin manaꞌin mesu­wa­ro­tiaria iꞌatu­weꞌeg kahato saꞌag nug kahato hap ete saꞌag nug hap kuap kahato hap ete. Maꞌato Tupana mohey haria yt iꞌatu­weꞌeg hin i Tupana potpap nug kahato hap ete e. Maꞌato mesu­wa­ro­tiaria poꞌog iꞌatukai teꞌe­ru­weꞌeg e. Iꞌypy­rypwiat ikohye­wyry rakaria ewy mesu­wa­ro­tiaria saꞌag nug hap yn taꞌa­tukuap kahato e. Miꞌi haria ewy woro­ho­ꞌo­ky­ꞌesat eipe maꞌato wakuap nug hap kuap hap ete iꞌewyte hẽtyhot puat wakuap nug hap ete e. Waku pyno eiwe­mo­weꞌeg kahato Tupana miky­ꞌesat minug kuap hap ete e.

Katu­pono mesu­wa­ro­tiaria miitꞌin tikat kahato toꞌo­po­wyro woꞌo­maꞌat hap etiat hap taꞌa­tu­ka­ꞌiwat hekat rakat maꞌat hap kaipyi taꞌa­tunug taꞌa­tu­wy­riaꞌin mesu­wa­rote e. Uiwy­riaꞌin waku atiky­ꞌesat kahato ewetunug uhekat kaipyi Tupana wyriaꞌin wuat koꞌi e. Miꞌi hawyi miꞌiria tukup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe atipy pe e. Waku wati­ꞌa­tuekyi kahato miitꞌin hekat kaipyi miitꞌin Tupana wano e.

Pyno uiwy­riaꞌin waku watunug yne aiweꞌeg hap ok tã Tupana miky­ꞌesat yne ete sio motpap wato nug hap kaipyi sio kurin motpap hap nug hap kaipyi waku wati­mõ­typot kahato Tupana aiminug koꞌi hap ete e. Karãpe aheso hap kurin miꞌi pote iꞌewyte aheso hap iwato hap watunug kuap pote Tupana yt aimohey kuap i pywo sehay nug hamo e. Maꞌato hãpyk kahato aiminug kurin yn mytkai miꞌi pote meiũran iwato rakat nug hamo Tupana aimohey kahato e. Maꞌato yt hãpyk i kurin kat aiminug kaipyi pote iꞌewyte yt aimohey hin i iwato rakat nug hamo e. Uiwy­riaꞌin eiweꞌeg wo o ehekat mõꞌẽ hap ete. Waku hãpyk kahato eweimõꞌẽ Tupana miium ehepiat koꞌi e. Ehegyiꞌat hãpyk kahato hap kaipyi ti aru Tupana eikuap hãpyk sio yt sio ehekat iwato sio kurin hap e. Maꞌato hãpyk kahato ehekat mõꞌẽ hap taꞌa­kasa toikuap hawyi meiũran poꞌog tekat toimõꞌẽ kahato ehowawi eimohey hap toikuap hawyi eimohey hap upi e Iesui. Yt kat i i tomaꞌat hap toikuap eikai hawyi poꞌog tutum ehepe teka­reꞌen hawyi iꞌewyte wuatꞌi eꞌat piat kareꞌen tutum ehepe wy e.

Uiwy­riaꞌin eiweꞌeg wo o iraniaꞌin ekat eipo piat hawyi e. Yt etiꞌa­tu­maꞌat reiꞌo iꞌatu­mi­puru taꞌa­tuekat ete e. Maꞌato miitꞌin ekat etimaꞌat epo pe toĩneꞌen mote meiũran yt kat i Tupana tum tekat ehepe yt eimohey i pote e. Miꞌi hawyi yt karãpe i hekat rakano eweikup­teꞌen yt karãpe i Tupana mipoi­tyro wo eweikup­teꞌen e Iesui.

Uiwy­riaꞌin eiweꞌeg wo o eheka­reꞌen koꞌi wywo eweikup­teꞌen e. Pyno wẽtup sehay i ahenoi teran ehepe e. Yt naku i kahato typy eika­ꞌiwat e. Niatpo kahato ti pyno typy ok aika­ꞌiwat pote e. Typy aika­ꞌiwat hap kaipyi wẽtup aika­ꞌiwat no wẽtup ahewa­nĩkap mo wẽtup aiwy ok sese wẽtup ahewa­nĩkap sese topy­huꞌat e. Katu­pono yt watunug kuap i typy ok miky­ꞌesat i koꞌi e. Wẽtup ok aipo­ꞌoro — Etunug no miꞌi pytkai wẽtup ok — Yt e. Yt wate­ropat kuap i typy ok ahetu­ꞌisa koꞌi aipo­ꞌoro haria e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato yt watunug kuap i typy Ahetu­pana wo e. Yt naku i watunug ahekat neꞌi ahetu­pana wo katu­pono miꞌi watunug hawyi ti Tupana sese yt watunug kuap i Ahetu­pana wo ahekat mowato hap kape yn aiwa­nẽtup hap hawyi e. Miꞌi hawyi Tupana yt aipo­ꞌoro kuap i towat nug hamo maꞌato ahekat kyꞌesat hap kape yn aipo­ꞌoro. Miꞌi tã neꞌi pote ti typy ahetu­pana rakano watoĩ­neꞌen.
Mio tã e pote itotiaria weka­reꞌen kyꞌe haria tero­mõ­pusu kahato Iesui Tupana ehay Musei mienoi kaipywiat enoi haria — Yt eweꞌeg hin i ti Mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe. Waku kahato ti ahekat iwato iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi pote Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Miitꞌin sehaꞌat turan ti wakuaria sese eipe eweikup­teꞌen e. Yne eiminug koꞌi ewetunug eimõ­typot hamuat hap miitꞌin ehamo e. Yt karãpe i ewetunug Tupana mõtypot hap eipyꞌa pe e. Eiwa­nẽtup hap ti Tupana tikuap kahato e. Toikuap kahato ti eipyꞌa piat eiwe­mõ­typot hap yn nug neran hap eiwa­nẽtup hap e. Miꞌi hap upi mesu­wa­ro­tiaria teꞌe­ru­wehum kahato ehete e. Maꞌato Tupana ehaꞌat turan ti yt naku i sese nug haria kahato eipe e.

Koitywy iraniaꞌin tiky­ꞌesat kahato tuwe­hytꞌok Tupana etama piat hap e. Taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato Tupana taꞌa­tu­po­rekuat no hap e. Miꞌi haria pyhyp haria kahato ti eipe e. Eweiꞌa­tu­muꞌe kahato Musei miwan iꞌewyte Tupana ehay enoi haria miwan kaipyi iꞌewyte koran wuat hetꞌok hat Iuwãu ut hap kape miꞌiria maꞌato wẽtup sehay yn henoi Tupana ut Wuatꞌi Porekuat nuat hap ete yn iꞌatuehay e.

Yne yne ti topy­huꞌat aru iꞌatuꞌe hap ewy e. Yne iꞌatu­miwan hit koꞌi aikotã aikotã aru hap koꞌi topy­huꞌat yne e. Yt wẽtup i iꞌatu­miwan kaipyi iꞌatueso hap — Tut ti aru tut ti aru iꞌatuꞌe hap yne e. Pyno yt karãpe i miꞌi hap iꞌatu­miwan ikahuro aru e. Niatpo kahato ti aru iꞌatu­miwan hit tuwe­moma poꞌog niatpo at ikahuro hap kai e. Poꞌog niatpo waikiru koꞌi yne ikahuro hap kai e. Katu­pono miꞌi iꞌatu­miwan hit toĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e.

Saꞌa­wyꞌi Musei toꞌe ainãpin hamuat — Yt etoiat teiꞌo eharyꞌi e. Etoiat hawyi yt naku i wẽtup ok etat e. Maꞌato wẽtup ok i etat hawyi yt naku i nug hano ereĩneꞌen e. Aikotã hewaire hewaire rakano ewy ereĩneꞌen Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. Yt eimi­ky­ꞌesat ewy hin i einãpin hap ehepe e. Yt etat reiꞌo hary­poria saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat heꞌaito miꞌatoiat e. Maꞌato etat pote hewaire hewaire rakat ereĩneꞌen Tupana wanẽtup hawe e Musei saꞌa­wyꞌi ahepe. Miꞌi e hap miwan yt eweiky­ꞌesat hin i maꞌato toĩneꞌen ne wuatꞌi eꞌat pe eweiky­ꞌesat sio yt e.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup sehay Iesui henoi iꞌatuepe. — Toĩneꞌen hekat rakat e. Miꞌi hesokpe ikahu kahato e. Wuatꞌi eꞌat pe yne imiky­ꞌesat koꞌi toĩneꞌen e. Ienuk hap tutunug kahato e. Yne miitꞌin itotiaria ikuap miꞌi hap ete e.

Toĩneꞌen wy itote wẽtup ok yt hekat i rakat iꞌahu kahato rakat hepihi pihi rakat Irasaru e hap het rakat e. Miꞌi ti wuatꞌi eꞌat pe iwyriaꞌin terut hawyi taꞌa­tu­ꞌatoiat hekat rakat eꞌoken­ꞌy­pyke kat ẽtup ẽtup hamo e. Mipun miꞌu ieĩpyt koꞌi soꞌoẽtup hamo hekat rakat miꞌu iwato kahato mipun kaipyi maꞌato yt tohoꞌoium i yt hegyiꞌat hin i hekat rakat pote. Miꞌi tusake syꞌat pono ikuꞌuro raꞌyn. Miꞌi hawyi ti toto raꞌyn atipy kape e.
Meiũran Irasaru ikuꞌuro raꞌyn hawyi atipy piaria tioto wakuaria ienuk ieĩneꞌen hap kape haꞌa­seꞌi Aparãu eꞌyatypiat heĩneꞌen hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi hekat rakat ikuꞌuro hawyi taꞌa­tusyp taꞌyn e.
Maꞌato aria kape toto hoꞌopot hap aria wato pe toĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi hawyi hoꞌopot hap kaipyi hekat rakat tehaꞌat ywaipe hawyi taꞌa­kasa raꞌyn Irasaru aseꞌi Aparãu eꞌyatype raꞌyn toĩneꞌen.
Miꞌi hawyi tuwẽ­powat — Aseꞌi e etipo­ꞌoro ro meikowo uhowawi Irasaru yꞌy wywo e. Waku topuĩꞌã etiat yꞌy wo uhẽku pen e. Ahoꞌopot kahato raꞌyn mesup uito aria pe e.

Yt kat i i yꞌy uiwe­ꞌyꞌu hamo e. Mio tã e pote Aparãu tiwesat — Uhaꞌyru e etiwaure raꞌyn apo eieĩneꞌen ne turan aikotã ereĩneꞌen saꞌa­wyꞌi hap waku kahato yne emiky­ꞌesat koꞌi wywo maꞌato Irasaru ieĩneꞌen yi totiat turan hoꞌopot hap yn toĩneꞌen tuete ihaky­ꞌeꞌi e.
Pyno meiũ wyti waku pe raꞌyn toĩneꞌen Irasaru maꞌato en wyti hoꞌopot hawe yn meiẽ ereĩneꞌen e.

Yt uwe i mesu­wiaria tokosap kuap ewawi iꞌewyte yt uwe i ewywuaria tokosap kuap uruewawi e. Katu­pono toĩneꞌen yi hot iwato rakat yt kat i wyti meiũpepyi muꞌap hoꞌopot hap kape e Aparãu hekat rakat pe. Miꞌi hawyi hekat rakat toꞌe i raꞌyn Aparãu me — Pyno etipo­ꞌoro ro Irasaru uiꞌywot yat kape uheywytꞌin 5 ok takaria piat henoi hamo e. Katu­pono yt atiky­ꞌesat i raꞌyn wyti miꞌiria tõꞌẽ meiũpe uhepiat hoꞌopot hap kape uiwy­riaꞌin e.
Maꞌato Aparãu tiwesat — Uhaꞌyru e tukup­teꞌen kahato eywytꞌin nãpin hanuaria itote. Waku teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup Musei potnãpin hap koꞌi kape iꞌewyte Tupana ehay enoi haria mienoi kape e.

Miꞌi hawyi hekat rakat — Yt rat e maꞌato wẽtup ok wẽtem guꞌuro pywiat hat henoi iꞌatuepe pote taren yt tõꞌẽ i meiũpe uhepiat hoꞌopot hap kape taꞌa­tuepiat hoꞌopot hamuat hap kape hawyi teꞌe­ru­we­morem Tupana kape taꞌa­tu­minug saꞌag kaipyi pote e. Meremo taꞌa­tu­minug saꞌag taꞌa­tu­ꞌatoiat hawyi Tupana taꞌa­tu­mohey miꞌi hawyi yt tõꞌẽ kuap i mesuwe taꞌa­tuepiat hoꞌopot hamuat hap kape e.

Miꞌi hawyi Aparãu toꞌe i raꞌyn — Pyno yt atipo­ꞌoro Irasaru iꞌatue­wawi katu­pono yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup i Musei mienoi kape yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup i Tupana ehay moherep haria kape pyno ti iꞌewyte yt guꞌuro kaipywiat wẽtem hat Irasaru toto henoi hamo pote i wyti teran teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup e Aparãu aria piat ieĩneꞌen hat pe e Iesui hekat rakat pe.

PIAT EWYWẽtup eꞌat pe hawyi Iesui toꞌe temiitꞌin me — Mesu­wa­rotiat eikup­teꞌen turan wyti aru ehãꞌãg haria sem putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe ehete hawyi taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat aru ehepiat uimohey hap hep hamuat yt naku i nug hamo e. Yt waku pe hin i aru miꞌiria tukup­teꞌen aru katu­pono poꞌog Tupana miꞌa­piheg koꞌi wo tukup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe aru are e. Yt waku pe hin i miꞌiria tukup­teꞌen aru aikotã wuatꞌi eꞌat piat yꞌy wato pe nu wato ete saity ete minꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe yt ahenꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe kuap i hap ewy taꞌa­tu­ho­ꞌopot aru eimaꞌat reran haria uimohey hap ehepiat hep teran haria e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti uhemiitꞌin hira­karia iãꞌãg iãꞌãg i haria ete e. Tupana miꞌa­piheg koꞌi aru tukup­teꞌen aikotã yꞌy wato piat ahaity ete nu wato ãpeꞌok etiat Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti hira­karia maꞌat saꞌag nug hamuat haria ete Tupana miꞌa­piheg koꞌi aru tukup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe hoꞌopot kahato rakaria wo teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat. Yt naku i sese eweihep uimohey hap hirakat pyꞌa pyi are.

Eweꞌeg wo eimaꞌat reran haria pupi e. Karãpe wẽtup ok ahãꞌãg yt naku i nug hamo miꞌi hawyi — Yt naku i mio tã watunug mehĩ mana waku watoꞌe aimaꞌat reran hat are maꞌato — Yt uiwepyi i mehĩ mana toꞌe ahepe — Pyno waure wo areĩneꞌen uimaꞌat hap kai mehĩ mana waku watoꞌe tope.

Yt naku i ipyꞌahak aimaꞌat haria etiat rakaria wo wato­py­huꞌat e. Waku wati­ꞌa­tu­wesat aimaꞌat haria pytkai e. Waku heꞌi­hotꞌok heꞌi­hotꞌok pe i — Yt uiwepyi i e — Yt uiwepyi i e 7 wo toꞌe i toꞌe i ahepe pote waku — Uito waure wo areĩneꞌen watoꞌe i watoꞌe i 7 wo are.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi 12 ok takaria ipotmu­ꞌeria tõꞌẽ Iesui ewawi hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe Iesui pe — Uruka­ꞌiwat uruimohey kahato poꞌog neran Tupana wuatꞌi nug hamo ete. Pyno etimo­wato o uruepiat imohey hap iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi tã iꞌatuꞌe pote Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Uiwy­riaꞌin wato­mohey Tupana pote tutunug yne aimiẽtup e. Yt uheso hin i eimi­mohey yt iwato hin i pytkai ehãꞌãg no imohey hawyi tutum eimi­mohey ok tã e. Gaꞌapy pe ti toĩneꞌen ariaꞌyp koro koꞌi poꞌog torania kai maꞌato iãꞌỹi kurin kahato hap ok tã yt heremo hin i hap ewy wasere upi topopy rakaria iãꞌỹi tuwe­mo­herep mekewat ariaꞌyp koro koꞌi e. Waku miꞌi iãꞌỹi ewy eweimohey Tupana. Aimi­mohey watikoi hawyi iwato topy­huꞌat aru kurin kahato saꞌa­wyꞌi pytkai katu­pono Tupana ti aimiẽtup nug hat pote e. Tupana mohey hap wywo eweiꞌe Wasere yp pe — Motoro gaꞌapy pyi hawyi erekoi ro ihyemuiꞌa wato tote watoꞌe hawyi Tupana mohey hap wywo pote meremo tutunug aiꞌe hap ewy e. Miꞌi hawyi Wasere yp toto meremo hawyi ihyemuiꞌa wato pyꞌa­setpe tuwekoi itote hap ewy eweimohey Tupana hawyi are. Taꞌi yt aiminug kuap i koꞌi Tupana tunug kuap meremo e Iesui ahepe.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup sehay i tohenoi — Karãpe wata­ꞌaipok i aiꞌyat kape ahesyꞌat kahato hap wywo hawyi meremo watoꞌe aheropat haria pe — Arewei hawyi meremo uipoi ro hawyi meremo uheꞌyni ãti ro. Arenuk kahuro hawyi waku areket uhero pote watoꞌe aheropat haria aiꞌyat piaria ahetama pe more­kuaria watoĩ­neꞌen pote. Yt karãpe i watoꞌe aheropat hat pe — Mesup atunug eimiꞌu hawyi waku erewei hawyi woro­ho­ꞌopoi yt watoꞌe i aheropat haria pe e. Mio tã watoꞌe — Ewetunug no uimiꞌu hawyi arenuk teran watoꞌe aheropat haria pe. — Aresa­po­hyꞌu hawyi areket hawyi waku watoꞌe ahetama pe more­kuaria aito pote. Uheropat hap kahu hawyi waku eweinuk eweiket watoꞌe. Yt karãpe i more­kuaria koro koꞌi teꞌe­roꞌe taꞌa­tue­ropat haria pe — Eiperia poꞌog uikai uheropat kahato haria eiperia pote yt iꞌatuꞌe i katu­pono morekuat ekat kaipyi tukup­teꞌen mote. Taꞌi morekuat miꞌu kaipyi teꞌe­renuk teꞌe­ro­sa­poꞌu. Morekuat sokpe kaipyi teꞌe­ru­we­painug. Taꞌi morekuat saꞌup ete iꞌatu­potpap pote — Waku kahato eipe yt iꞌatuꞌe i more­kuaria taꞌa­tu­potpap nug haria pe ahetama pe e Iesui.

Pyno waku kahato wato­py­huꞌat Tupana eropat kahato haria wo are. Waku Tupana miky­ꞌesat ewywuat yn watunug are. Waku watu­we­potpap kahato imikyꞌsat nug hap ete aikotã morekuat eropat haria akag koꞌi ewy. Yt naku i watoꞌe Tupana pe — Yt ewese hin i kat pote yt karãpe i uheropat yt karãpe i uimi­ky­ꞌesat ewy etunug iꞌewyte yt karãpe i uipoi yt naku i watoꞌe Tupana pe. Poꞌog waku watoꞌe Tupana pe — Arehum ewawi pote eropat hano areĩneꞌen waku watoꞌe Tupana pe. — Atunug neran poꞌog hãpyk emiky­ꞌesat koꞌi katu­pono yt naku i te areĩneꞌen emiky­ꞌesat nug hap ete waku watoꞌe Tupana pe e Iesui temiitꞌin me.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toto hãpyk kahato yi Karireia yi Samaria sakpo tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape.

Miꞌi hawyi muꞌap upi Iesui toto wẽtup tawa hit kapiat turan 10 ok takaria hepihi pihi rakaria tõꞌẽ howawi. Taꞌa­tu­ꞌahu pote yt tukup­teꞌen kuap i iraniaꞌin wywo. Iꞌatupe nem mote pya Iesui kai teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat hawyi teꞌe­ro­wẽ­powat haty wo — Uruꞌakag erahaꞌat ro uruewawi hawyi urueha­kye­raꞌat iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui taꞌa­kasa iꞌatue­wawiat hawyi toikuap iꞌatuehay hawyi toꞌe iꞌatuepe — Eweiwat ro paꞌi koꞌi kape eipiit moherep iꞌatuepiat hamo ehehãite hap moherep hamo e iꞌatuepe. Tohenoi hawyi hepihi pihi rakaria tuwat raꞌyn paꞌi koꞌi kape yt taꞌa­tue­hãite hin mywo i te tuwat maꞌato muꞌap upiat tuwat hap tote iꞌatue­hãite raꞌyn taꞌa­tue­he­pihi kãꞌã raꞌyn iꞌatupe kahuria raꞌyn.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok taꞌaipok Iesui kape hawyi toꞌe tehay pirik wo — Waku kahato Tupana pe katu­pono mesup taꞌyn uimoe­hãite i raꞌyn e. Putꞌok­toꞌe Iesui ete hawyi porog myi ihay — Waku kahato uhete etunug Uika­ꞌiwat e. Uimoe­hãite raꞌyn En e Iesui pe. Miꞌi miit aipok hat yt Iesui ywania kaipywiat hat i maꞌato yi Samaria ywania kaipywiat sut hat. Samaria ywania yt taꞌa­tu­kyꞌe hin i Iesui ywania pytkai meiũwat Iesui mimoe­hãite tuwe­pỹ­ꞌã­tutuk — Waku kahato En e hamo.

Miꞌi hawyi mekewat Iesui mimoe­hãite yi Samaria kaipy­wiaria Iesui py ywytpe hawyi Iesui toꞌe tope — Pyno 10 ok takaria atiꞌa­tu­moe­hãite mesup maꞌato en yn eraꞌaipok uhowawi epihi kãꞌã moherep hamo — Waku e hamo e. — Aikope pyno iraniaꞌin 9 ok takaria uimi­moe­hãite koꞌi aikope tuwat miꞌiria kat poteĩ yt tõꞌẽ i uhowawi — Waku taꞌa­tuꞌe uhepiat hamo e. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe — Waku eraꞌaipok eꞌyat kape mehĩ e. Mesup waku pe ereĩneꞌen i raꞌyn katu­pono uimohey hawyi emoehãite hap toĩneꞌen mesup e Iesui tomi­mo­hãite pe. Series,

Miꞌi hawyi tõꞌẽ miitꞌin Iesui maꞌat reran hanuaria meimuẽwat Tupana ehay miwan etiat kuap kahato rakaria. Miꞌi hawyi — Mehĩ iꞌatuꞌe uruikuap teran ehay iꞌatuꞌe. Karãpe aru putꞌokꞌe mesuwat yi tote Tupana Aipo­rekuat nuat hap iꞌatuꞌe. Aikope aru pyno tuwe­mo­herep Aipo­typot no Tuapana iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pywo ti rat yt heremo i hap ewy Tupana topy­huꞌat yi Porekuat no tuwe­mo­herep mesu­wa­ro­tiaria pe e. Yt uwe i ikuap are e. Yt naku i eweiꞌe — Meiẽ Tupana toĩneꞌen aipo­rekuat nuat. Yt naku i eweiꞌe — Eweiꞌa­kasa ro iuẽpe toĩneꞌen naꞌyn Tupana aipo­rekuat nuat yt naku i mio tã eweiꞌe katu­pono yt heremo i tuwe­mohep Eipo­rekuat nuat e iꞌatuepe. Taꞌi eipy­ꞌa­setpe yt heremo i hap ewy tuwe­mo­herep Tupana Eipo­rekuat nuat mesup maꞌato yt heremo hin i ehepe e tuwepe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe topot­mu­ꞌeria pe tomohey haria pe — Uiwy­riaꞌin e mesup taꞌyn Tupana toĩneꞌen Eipo­rekuat nuat eipy­ꞌa­setpe e. Mesup taꞌyn Eheykeꞌet toĩneꞌen eiwywo heremo kahato hap ewy maꞌato yt motꞌi i areĩneꞌen eiwywo e. Areto hawyi ti aru ehehatꞌat kahato — Waku kahato saꞌa­wyꞌi karãpe Aheykeꞌet Aikywyt toĩneꞌen aiwywo hap eweiꞌe aru uhepiat e. Waku kahato nimuat Aiwy toĩneꞌen aiwywo hap eꞌat eweiꞌe aru uhepiat e. Ehehatꞌat kahato mekewat eꞌat hawyi — Wati­ky­ꞌesat kahato wẽtup eꞌat poꞌog Aheykeꞌet wywo Aikywyt wywo i raꞌyn hap wati­ky­ꞌesat eweiꞌe aru uhepiat pe eiwo­ꞌope maꞌato miꞌi hawyi ti aru yt uipuẽti hin eipe hawyi uhehatꞌat kahato are e Iesui.

Miꞌi hap eꞌat pe aru iraniaꞌin teꞌe­roꞌe ehepe eimaꞌat hamo — Pywo ti rat taꞌaipok taꞌyn Aheykeꞌet Aikywyt kuepe raꞌyn toĩneꞌen i raꞌyn iꞌatueso ehepe. — Pyno toꞌiro Aheykeꞌet Aikywyt ewawi iꞌatuꞌe aru ehepe iraniaꞌin eimaꞌat hamo maꞌato yt eweiwat reiꞌo miꞌiria upi uikat hamo katu­pono yt pywo pe i mio tã iꞌatuꞌe ehepe maꞌato eimaꞌat hamo mio tã iꞌatuꞌe ehepe aru e.

Katu­pono Uito Miitꞌin Eykeꞌet ut hap eꞌat pe turan merep e hap ewy ariot atipy kaipyi are e. Heremo sese hap ewy ariot atipy kaipyi are e. Wuatꞌi mikuap ewy uhẽtyhot kahato puo ariot Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Potypot no ariot aru atipy kaipyi e Iesui tomohey haria sese pe.

Maꞌato koitywy mesu­wa­ro­tiaria yt uimohey haria i tukup­teꞌen e. Pywo ti rat koran te ti mesu­wa­ro­tiaria iraniaꞌin Eheykeꞌet Eikywyt pun haria teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat are e. Yt taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat hin i uimohey hap pãi e. Ahoꞌopot kahato irane taꞌa­tu­mi­ky­ryꞌi hap upi e.

Pyno areto hawyi araꞌaipok i mesuwe i raꞌyn e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi sese te mekewat iꞌaman at kaꞌap 40 eꞌat piat hap turanuat mekewat ahaꞌa­seꞌi pot Nuꞌe toĩneꞌen hap eꞌat piat turanuat yt uwe i ahaꞌa­seꞌi pot Nuꞌe mohey hat toĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti aru miitꞌin tukup­teꞌen wyti aru Eheykeꞌet ut hap eꞌat pe wyti aru are e.

Nuꞌe ieĩneꞌen hap eꞌat turan teꞌe­renuk hap koꞌi kape yn taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup mesuwat yi tote are e. Mahy u hap kape yn teꞌe­ru­we­wa­nẽtup at kaꞌap e. Taꞌi iꞌatu­wary wary kahato itote e. Woꞌo­waire waire hap kape yn taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup e. Yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup hin i mekewat Tupana ehay Nuꞌe mimo­herep kape iꞌaman koro tut irane e hap kape yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup teran hin i saꞌa­wyꞌi e. Miꞌi hawyi Nuꞌe teke raꞌyn mekewat yara wato sese pe toꞌyat piaria wywo hawyi iꞌaman koro kahato raꞌyn Tupana e hap ewy raꞌyn hawyi yꞌy wato taꞌam kahato yi tote hawyi yꞌy koro hap ewy yn toĩneꞌen yi tote hawyi yt imohey i haria yꞌy koro tiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato torania mesuwat yi totiaria e miwan me e. Miꞌiria ewywuat aru tukup­teꞌen miitꞌin uhut hap eꞌat pe e Iesui.

Taꞌi saꞌa­wyꞌi sese Tupana toꞌe aseꞌi Iro pe — Eiwe­nõꞌẽ ro tawa wato Sutuma pyi katu­pono atiꞌa­tuwuk tawa Sutuma piaria iꞌatu­minug saꞌag upi e. Mekewat eꞌat pe Iro tuwẽtem turan miꞌi hap eꞌat pe Tupana tiwuk taꞌyn itotiaria e miwan me e. Mekewat eꞌat pe teꞌe­renuk at kaꞌap hap koꞌi kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup e. Iꞌatuꞌyat nug hap kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup e. Taꞌa­tueko nug hap kape yn taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup e. Teꞌe­ru­we­sapo mahy u hap koꞌi kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­ꞌa­tunug e. Wene­ruꞌi wene­ruꞌi hap ete woꞌo­waire waire hap kape yn taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup hawyi Iro tuwẽtem naꞌyn mekewat tawa pyi toꞌyat piaria hupi hawyi aria raꞌyn hewo hewo itote atipy kaipyi hawyi yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup teran i Tupana e hap kapiaria wuk hamo e miwan me e. Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti aru mesu­wa­ro­tiaria tukup­teꞌen aru araꞌaipok hap eꞌat pe.

Maꞌato mekewat eꞌat pe karãpe Iroꞌin tuwẽtem naꞌyn tawa saꞌag Sutuma pyi hawyi aria hewo hewo raꞌyn atipy kaipyi nukara ewywuat koꞌi Tupana minug. Miꞌi haria tawa Sutuma piaria Tupana ehay pun haria aria miꞌu wo yn tukup­teꞌen e.

Miꞌi hap ewy kahato ti aru miitꞌin tukup­teꞌen Eheykeꞌet ut hap eꞌat pe hamuat turan acre e. Yt uwe i Tupana ehay kape teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup mekewat eꞌat pe e. Taꞌa­tu­minug koꞌi kape yn teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup e. Uhut hap kape yt teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup hin i mekewat eꞌat pe hawyi ariot e Iesui ahepe.

Mekewat uhut hap eꞌat pe eweinõꞌẽ ro tawa Ieru­sarẽi myi meremo are e. Eheꞌyni toĩneꞌen eiꞌyat pe pote yt eweiꞌaipok i eheka­reꞌen koꞌi sat hamo are e. Meremo eweinõꞌẽ ro tawa Ieru­sarẽi myi are e. Eiko totiat eweikup­teꞌen mote uhut turan mote yt eweiꞌaipok teiꞌo eiꞌyat kape ehekat sat hamo e.

Aseꞌi Iro eharyꞌi taꞌaipok teran tawa Sutuma kape hawyi tehaꞌat tawa Sutuma kape taꞌaipok teran haype hawyi nu ukyt kawiat mana Iro eharyꞌi topy­huꞌat itote e. Pyno yt eweiꞌaipok teiꞌo tawa Ieru­sarẽi kape Iro eharyꞌi ewy are katu­pono tuwe­nõꞌẽ tawa Sutuma pyi turan Tupana toꞌe Iroꞌin me — Yt eweiwe­haꞌat teiꞌo tawa kape eweiwe­nõꞌẽ hawyi e maꞌato Iro eharyꞌi tehaꞌat i raꞌyn tosaipe hawyi ipiit nu ykyt kawiat topy­huꞌat ihaꞌat turan hawyi e. Toikyꞌe kahato toieĩneꞌen hap Sutuma totiat pote e.

Pyno eheĩneꞌen hap mesu­wa­rotiat eweikyꞌe kahato eweiꞌa­pykok kahato pote yt putꞌok­ꞌe­weiꞌe i eheĩneꞌen hap eheha­kye­raꞌat wuatꞌi eꞌat piat hamo are e. Maꞌato yt eweikyꞌe kahato i eheĩneꞌen hap mesu­wa­rotiat pote maꞌato Tupana miky­ꞌesat ewywuat hap upiat eweiwa­nẽtup hawyi pywo pe ti eweipuẽti wyti aru eheĩneꞌen hap sese eheha­kye­raꞌat hap hamuat e Iesui ahepe.

Mekewat wãtym me Eheykeꞌet Eikywyt ut hap eꞌat pe turan tukup­teꞌen aru typy ok teꞌe­roket neꞌi wyti aru getap wiat toꞌo­kipy pe e. Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok yt uwe i raꞌyn Tupana tioto hawyi maꞌato wẽtup yt uimohey hat i pote Tupana toiat raꞌyn itote e.

Mekewat eꞌat pe turan uhut hap eꞌat typy hary­poria wemi­ꞌutok haria tukup­teꞌen irane hawyi wẽtup hary­poria yt uwe i wyti aru Tupana tioto hawyi maꞌato wẽtup ok totoiat raꞌyn itote yt uimohey hat i pote e. Iꞌewyte wyti aru typy ihainia taꞌa­tuko tote tukup­teꞌen wẽtup ok wyti aru yt uwe i raꞌyn Tupana tioto hawyi maꞌato wẽtup ok totoiat itote mekewat eꞌat pe e. Yt uimohey hat i wyti aru totoiat e Iesui ahepe.

Miꞌi hawyi iwyriaꞌin apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe — Urupo­rekuat iꞌatuꞌe aikope aikope aru eriot eut hap eꞌat pe iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi toiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pyno mekewat uhut hap eꞌat pe putꞌokꞌe hawyi meremo eweikuap uhut hap are. Taꞌi karãpe watꞌa­kasa Uruwu koꞌi teꞌe­re­popy hawyi meremo watikuap iꞌokpuk takat toĩneꞌen itote iꞌatu­miꞌu wo teꞌe­ru­wa­ꞌa­tunug kahato itote pote e. Taꞌi yt niatpo hin i watikuap aikope toĩneꞌen hap. Miꞌi hap ewywuat yt niatpo hin i eweikuap aikope ariot hap e Iesui topot­mu­ꞌeria pe ahepe.

Miꞌi hawyi poꞌog Iesui henoi tehay iãꞌãkap wuo — Uiwy­riaꞌin e waku ahehay kahato Tupana kape e. Waku yt aipohep hin i maꞌato wahẽtup hẽtup hap pyi e. Tupana yt tum i aimiẽtup hawyi waku wahẽtup i e. Yt naku i ahehay yi kape yt hum i ahepe hawyi e. Pyno ahenoi teran uhehay hãꞌãkap wuo aikotã waku wahenoi Tupana kapiat wahẽtup aimi­ky­ꞌesat koꞌi hap etiat e.

Pyno saꞌa­wyꞌi so wẽtup tawa piat toĩneꞌen morekuat esurara akag koro iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi miit topy­huꞌat morekuat muꞌe hat uwe waku uwe yt naku i e hanuat iꞌatuꞌe e. Miꞌi miit maꞌato ti yt Tupana mohey hin i hat iꞌewyte yt toiꞌa­tu­kyꞌe hin i miitꞌin iꞌatuꞌe so e.

Iꞌewyte hiwu toĩneꞌen wy mekewat tawa tote iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi ti toto mekewat surara akag kape katu­pono toiky­ꞌesat topo­wyro hap. Miꞌi hawyi topo­wyro hap tohẽtup mekewat surara akag me — Uipo­wyro ro e katu­pono tukup­teꞌen kahato miitꞌin yt iꞌatu­wese rakaria uimaꞌat kahato rakaria e tope. Pyno wãiꞌere ro uhewa­nĩ­kaptia pe mimi e so. Miꞌi hawyi eweimo­hãpyk o iꞌatu­minug saꞌag uhetiat hap e morekuat emiit akag me.

— Maꞌato so mekewat morekuat surara akag yt ipowyro teran hin i haype mekewat hiwu iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi pote yt toiwesat i tohẽtup hawyi iꞌatuꞌe so. Miꞌi hawyi yne eꞌat pe yne wãtym me toto i hẽtup hẽtup kahato hamo maꞌato yt kat i tutum ipowyro hap iꞌatuꞌe so. Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup eꞌat pe — Are pãi e tuwepe mekewat surara akag hawyi so — Yt arekenꞌẽ i Tupana pupi e. Iꞌewyte iraniaꞌin mupi yt arekenꞌẽ hin i maꞌato mesuwat hiwu pupi arekenꞌẽ kahato katu­pono yt areket kuap i mekewat hiwu tut at kaꞌap hẽtup hẽtup hamo pote e. Yt naku i uhete pote atum pãi imiky­ꞌesat ewy hawyi yt tut i uhowawi e tuwepe iꞌatuꞌe so e. Taꞌi uimo­sero mosero kahato rat mekewat hary­poria hiwu tehay wo e so. Miꞌi pote atipo­wyro hawyi yt tut i e so tuwepe. Wuatꞌi eꞌat pe tut wuatꞌi wãtym me tut pote atum imiky­ꞌesat ewy hawyi yt tut i e so e Iesui tehay iãꞌãkap wuo. Series,
— Pyno eiwe­wa­nẽtup to mekewat hiwu miẽtup uhehay iãꞌãkap kape e. eiwe­wa­nẽtup to mekewat surara akag ehay kape e.

— Pywo ti rat Tupana yt mekewat surara akag saꞌag ewy hin i katu­pono Tupana tikyꞌe kahato temiitꞌin yne hawyi tutunug neran yne aimiẽtup towawiat hap are e. Pywo ti rat toiky­ꞌesat kahato ahẽtup hẽtup kahato hap sio ihotꞌok puo sio wãtym muo hap e. Taꞌi waku wahẽtup tope at kaꞌap yt aipohep hin hẽtup hẽtup hap etepyi e. Taꞌi meremo Tupana timo­hãpyk aru iraniaꞌin minug saꞌag ahetiat koꞌi wahẽtup hawyi e temiitꞌin me. Taꞌi areĩneꞌen Eheykeꞌet Uito miꞌi pote uhut hap eꞌat turan atiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­piheg kahato iraniaꞌin minug saꞌag uimohey haria etiat e. Taꞌi uimohey sese haria ihay kahato rakaria Tupana mohey hawuo are e. Miꞌi ewywuat Uiꞌywot mohey haria atiꞌa­tukat kahato e. Uhut hap eꞌat pe miꞌiria ewywuat atiꞌa­tukat kahato sio toĩ sio yt hap e. Are pãi yt atikuap i te sio tukup­teꞌen aru Tupana wywo ihay rakaria uimohey sese haria mekewat uhut hap eꞌat pe hap yt atikuap i te e Iesui temiitꞌin me ahepe.
PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi wẽtup sehay iãꞌãkap wuo Iesui henoi miitꞌin me katu­pono tukup­teꞌen itote — Uruto poꞌog wakuaria torania kai e haria yt iraniaꞌin atukyꞌe hin i haria.

Miꞌi haria pe Iesui henoi — Saꞌa­wyꞌi so typy ihainiaꞌin tuwat raꞌyn Tupana mõtypot hap yat kape taꞌa­tuehay Tupana wywuat hamo e. Wẽtup ok Tupana ehay moherep hat miꞌi — Poꞌog uito iraniaꞌin kai e tuwepe hat e. Miꞌi hawyi so wẽtup ok yt naku i kahato rakat katu­pono ipotpap ahewa­nĩ­kaptia porekuat emiit no aheka­reꞌen pore­raꞌat hamuat wuatꞌi muꞌap upi hanuat miꞌi e.

Miꞌi hawyi so mekewat — Uito waku kahato rakat e hat putꞌokꞌe Tupana mõtypot hawe hawyi teke aikope paꞌi yn teke hawe pya kahato pyi iraniaꞌin yt naku i nug haria kai hawyi ihay se hap ewy Tupana kape — Waku sese kahato atunug e so uito poꞌog waku iraniaꞌin kai e so tuwepe tuwa­nẽtup hawe e. Arehum ewawi uiwaku hap upi e so. Uito yt iraniaꞌin ewy hin i iꞌatu­minug saꞌag hap ete e so. Uito waku kahato nug hat yn e so. Are pãi e uito ti yt miitꞌin maꞌat hat ewy hin i e. Uito yt areĩneꞌen i wuatꞌi hary­poria wywo ehat i e. Waku kahato uito pãi e so. Tupana e so toĩneꞌen mesuwe eꞌyat pe wẽtup ok miit yt naku i sese nug hat e so. Miꞌi miit ahewa­nĩ­kaptia esura­raꞌin powyro hat hawyi aheka­reꞌen toipo­re­raꞌat ahewa­nĩ­kaptia porekuat ekat no e so. Yt karãpe i atiꞌa­parap miꞌi miit ewywuat e so tuwepe Tupana mõtypot yat pe e. Taꞌi waku kahato atunug yne ete e. Pywo ti rat typy eꞌat 7 eꞌat turan yt kat i hin i atuꞌu miꞌu emõtypot hamuat haype e so. Waku kahato atunug katu­pono uhegyiꞌat kahato katu­pono uiko kaipyi uhekat kaipyi atimõꞌẽ 10 kaipyi wẽtup aterut ewawi Tupana hawyi 9 yn atioto uiꞌyat kape e. Iwato kahato atiꞌa­tu­mõꞌẽ uihũria kaipyi wẽtup 10 kaipyi atum e so Tupana pe e maꞌato miꞌi tã toꞌe Tupana pe wuatꞌi miitꞌin tikuap tehay hamuat hap toiky­ꞌesat e.

Miꞌi hawyi mekewat yt naku i nug hat mekewat wanĩ­kaptia powyro hat wuatꞌi ekareꞌen pyhyp hat pya kahato iraniaꞌin waku nug haria kai toĩneꞌen okenꞌypy ete. Yt tehaꞌat hin i atipy kape Tupana ewawi tehay hamo maꞌato yi kape yn teheꞌat hawyi tuwe­ꞌahyk ahyk tuwe­mõti Tupana wywo tehay hamuat haype. — Yt uiꞌa­piheg neiꞌo uiminug saꞌag upi e. Atikuap taꞌyn uito yt naku i kahato rakano areĩneꞌen wen maꞌato uheha­kye­raꞌat En hap atiky­ꞌesat e Tupana pe paatoꞌe haype e so e Iesui.

Pywo pe areꞌe ehepe mekewat paaꞌe tominug saꞌag koꞌi ete mekewat — Atoiat teran uiminug yt naku i e hat yn taꞌaipok toꞌyat kape waku pe Tupana wanẽtup hawe are katu­pono Tupana tiwaure yne iminug saꞌag koꞌi pote maꞌato mekewat — Uito poꞌog poꞌog iraniaꞌin kai e hat ete Tupana yt tiwaure kuap i iminug yt naku i koꞌi hap kai katu­pono — Uito yt atunug i yt naku i e hat toĩneꞌen mote e. Miꞌi hat ewywuat kahato eweikup­teꞌen katu­pono — Uruto poꞌog waku torania kai e haria eweikup­teꞌen e Iesui tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe itotiaria pe. Pywo ti rat areꞌe ehepe uwe uwe tuwe­mo­wato topyꞌa pe tuwa­nẽtup hawe — Uito poꞌog waku iraniaꞌin kai e hap wywo miꞌi hat wy ti aru Tupana mimohit kahato rakano topy­huꞌat wuatꞌi eꞌat pe wen uwe uwe paaꞌe topyꞌa pe tuwa­nẽtup hawe tominug saꞌag hawyi — Uheha­kye­raꞌat Tupana pe toꞌe hat miꞌi hat toĩneꞌen Tupana mimõ­typot no toĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe are e Iesui wuatꞌi miitꞌin me.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi wẽtup eꞌat pe miitꞌin terut taꞌa­tu­mẽ­pytꞌin Iesui ewawi katu­pono taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato taꞌa­tu­mẽ­pytꞌin poityro hap Iesui po kaipywiat hap. Taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat iꞌatue­waku Iesui piat hap. Miꞌi hawyi tõꞌẽ howawi wen maꞌato Iesui emiitꞌin wãiꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe hira­karia erut haria pe.

Maꞌato Iesui ihay pirik temiitꞌin me — Kat poteĩ eweiꞌa­tu­pyhyp hira­karia uhowawi haria e. Wãi neiꞌo are e katu­pono atiꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat kahato hira­karia uhowawiat hap e. Yt eweiꞌa­tu­pyhyp teiꞌo hira­karia iꞌatuepap uhowawiat hap upi are e topy­ꞌahak hap wywo temiitꞌin me. Yt eweiꞌa­tu­pyhyp teiꞌo hira­karia katu­pono hira­karia timohey kahato Tupana are e. Taꞌi hira­karia tuwe­hytꞌok teran kahato Tupana etama pe e. Tupana mohey kahato haria kahato ti hira­karia miꞌi pote ti aru miꞌiria ewywuat rakaria yn wyti aru tukup­teꞌen Tupana etama pe e. Mesuwe karãpe Tupana topy­huꞌat Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Porekuat no hap eꞌat pe turan miꞌiria pe — Atum aru uhetama sese ehepe e. Atum aru mesuwat yi yne hira­karia ewywuat uimohey haria pe e Tupana e.

— Pywo pe ti eweiwat teran aikope Tupana toĩneꞌen morekuat no hap kape pote hira­karia tiky­ꞌesat tuwe­hytꞌok hap ewy o eweiwat o are e. Maꞌato yt pote yt eweiwat kuap i e. Eweiwat ro Tupana mohey kahato hawuo hira­karia imohey kahato haria ewywuat pote ti aru putꞌok­ꞌe­weiꞌe aikope Tupana toĩneꞌen hap tote e Iesui topot­mu­ꞌeria pe taꞌa­tu­pyhyp hira­karia howawi turan.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok Iuteuria ywania akag hekat kahato rakat apoꞌe Iesui pe — Uimuꞌe hat e waku kahato En e. Pyno uimuꞌe ro kat som waku atunug uheĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat piat hap kyiꞌat hamo e. Atiky­ꞌesat kahato areĩneꞌen Tupana wywo wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e. Pyno kat som waku atunug miꞌi hap puẽti hamo apoꞌe Iesui pe. — Waku sese kahato en e Iesui pe.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe — Kat poteĩ — Waku sese kahato En ereꞌe uhepiat pe e. Tupana yn ni waku sese hap watikuap e. Uito apo areĩneꞌen Tupana wo ewanẽtup hawe e.

Pyno etikuap apo Tupana piat ainãpin hap koꞌi e. Etikuap aikotã Tupana ainãpin Musei miwan miat apo. Mio tã e — Yt naku i wẽtup ok wywo wẽtup ok wywo eharyꞌi eꞌaito e miwan me e. Yt naku i etiꞌauka miit e miwan me e. Yt naku i sero­ꞌok­ꞌere e miwan me e. yt naku i eso e. Etimõ­typot ro eꞌywot ety e miwan me e. Mio tã e hap koꞌi etikuap apoꞌe mekewat hekat rakat pe mekewat miit akag me.
Miꞌi hawyi toiwesat — Taꞌi atiꞌa­tukuap yne mekewat Tupana piat ainãpin hap koꞌi mehĩ e. Taꞌi uihire pyi te ti atunug yne yne mio tã e hap koꞌi e Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe tope — Waku mehĩ wen maꞌato wẽtup mo yt etunug i te e. Miꞌi hap etunug hawyi waku pe ereĩneꞌen Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. Pyno ereto ro eꞌyat kape hawyi ekat iwato kahato hap etiꞌa­tu­mõꞌẽ yne yt hekat i rakaria pe miitꞌin haky­ꞌeꞌi rakaria pe satek takaria pe e. Etiꞌa­tu­mõꞌẽ yne hawyi waku eraꞌaipok uhowawi uhemiit no uhupiat eto hamo e Iesui mekewat miitꞌin akag me mekewat hekat kahato rakat pe. Mio tã etunug pote etipuẽti ekareꞌen sese wuatꞌi eꞌat piat mesuwe karãpe Tupana toĩneꞌen mesuwe wuatꞌi porekuat nuat hap eꞌat pe e Iesui mekewat hekat kahato rakat pe.

Maꞌato mio tã e Iesui hawyi mekewat miit yi kape yn tehaꞌat hawyi paaꞌe kahato katu­pono iwat heka­reꞌen iwato kahato hap toiꞌa­tu­kyꞌe kahato pote yt toimõꞌẽ teran i tekat sem hatek takaria pe yt hekat i rakaria pe pote.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tehaꞌat kahato mekewat hekat kyꞌe kahato hat ewawi hawyi toikuap taꞌyn paaꞌe kahato hap hawyi toikyꞌe kahato hawyi toꞌe itotiaria pe — Are pãi e niatpo kahato ti rat weka­reꞌen kyꞌe kahato haria tuwe­hytꞌok aikope Tupana toĩneꞌen Morekuat no hawe are e Iesui.

Taꞌi niatpo kahato yt hegyiꞌat i rakat teke atipy pe e. Niatpo kahato wateke atipy pe ahekat iwato wywo e. Niatpo kahato aikotã aihũ iwato kahato rakat mekewat Kameru e hap het rakat teke awi ehapo kaꞌa puo maꞌato sakpo niatpo sese ewy wekat iwato kahato kyꞌe kahato rakaria teke atipy pe e. Niatpo aihũ Kameru iwato kahato rakat teke awi ehapo sakpo poꞌog poꞌog niatpo tuwe­hytꞌok Tupana etama pe — Uhekat ti uhetu­pana wo toĩneꞌen e hat e Iesui.
Mio tã toꞌe hawyi wanẽtup haria itotiaria teꞌe­roꞌe tope — Pyno yt uwe i teke kuap atipy pe hekat rakat iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope.

Maꞌato Iesui toꞌe — Pywo miitꞌin yt uwe i teke kuap atipy pe e. Tupana yn tieha­kye­raꞌat kuap miitꞌin e. Pywo pe ti rat miitꞌin yt tikyiꞌat kuap i ereke hap atipy pe e. Maꞌato Tupana yn miitꞌin ehakye­raꞌat kuap e. Yt kat i niatpo Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. Miitꞌin yt minug kuap koꞌi i yt niatpo hin i Tupana pe e. Tupana tieha­kye­raꞌat kuap miitꞌin hekat rakaria pytkai e.
Miꞌi hawyi Peteru toꞌe — Urumuꞌe hat uruto ti uruiꞌatoiat raꞌyn uruꞌyat koꞌi urueꞌyara uruekat uruepotpap uruko eupiat tuwat hamo ehay moherep hamo e.

— Pywo kahato ti eꞌe hap Peteru e. Woro­ho­ꞌokuap kahato eipe e. Atikuap aikotã saꞌa­wyꞌi eweitoiat yne uhupiat tuwat hamo hap e. Waku kahato ti rat eipe e. Pywo ti rat uwe uwe eipe ewy uikyꞌe poꞌog poꞌog toꞌyat kai toty kai teha­ryꞌi kai toywytꞌin kai tomẽ­pytꞌin kai topotpap kai hawyi toto uhehay Tupana piat Aipo­rekuat nuat e hap moherep hamo miꞌi hat eipe ewywuaria wyti aru waku pe tukup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe atipy pe e Iesui Peteru pe ahepe. Kat koꞌi kat koꞌi eweitoiat uhehay sytpok hamo wuatꞌi ywania enoi hamuat miꞌi koꞌi eimi­ꞌatoiat koꞌi atum aru ehowawi i raꞌyn mesuwe maꞌato poꞌog poꞌog atum eimi­ꞌatoiat saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat koꞌi kai e. Taꞌi eimi­ꞌatoiat koꞌi saipepiat uimiium koꞌi poꞌog poꞌog iwato poꞌog ikahu atum ehepe eweiwat uhupi hawyi iꞌewyte eheĩneꞌen hap Tupana wywo wuatꞌi eꞌat piat hap ikahu kahato hap atum ehepe e Iesui ahepe topot­po­ꞌo­roria pe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi temiitꞌin Iesui tere­poꞌok miitꞌin typyꞌi rakaria tokpyi enoi tepiat hamo. — Uheka­tu­wyria watuwat mesup tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape e. Itote ti aru uiꞌauka irane aikotã saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­tewuat Tupana ehay moherep haria miwan miat e hap ewywuat wyti taꞌa­tunug saꞌag yne uhete Eheykeꞌet ete e.

Itote ahewa­nĩ­kaptia ywania esura­raꞌin po pe raꞌyn uipag uiꞌauka hamo itote irane e Iesui. Yt naku i taꞌa­tunug uhete e. Miꞌiria teꞌe­ru­weu­kaꞌi kahato uhete taꞌa­tu­mi­ky­ryꞌi uhete hawyi kuitu kuitu­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe uipiit ete uimohit haype irane itote e. Uito Wuatꞌi Miitꞌin Eykeꞌet pytkai uipun aru itote are e. Yt uimõ­typot hin i itote e. Uipak pak kahato itote hawyi aru uiꞌauka saꞌag neꞌi aru maꞌato miꞌi pytkai myeꞌym eꞌat hawyi arẽtem aru uiku­ꞌuro sese hap pyi e. Guꞌuro pyi araꞌaipok ehowawi i raꞌyn. Uiꞌasyp pytkai arẽtem i raꞌyn aru uiꞌasyp hap kaipyi e.
Tuwetiat tohenoi maꞌato hemiitꞌin yt ikuap hin i imienoi koꞌi yt hotꞌokꞌe i pote yt taꞌa­tukuap kuap i iꞌe hap pote.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui toto temiitꞌin wywo tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape. Miꞌi hawyi putꞌok­ꞌia­tuꞌe tawa Ieriko ete. Miꞌi tote toĩneꞌen apyk pe muꞌap ẽpeke ete yt iha pytig i rakat muꞌap tote. Itote pyi tohẽtup kahato miitꞌin miium koꞌi teko ewy.
Miitꞌin typyꞌi rakaria õꞌẽ hap toikuap hawyi tohẽtup taꞌyn — Kat hamo som miitꞌin typyꞌi rakaria tõꞌẽ e apoꞌe muꞌap upiaria pe yt iha pytig i hat.
Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tu­wesat — Taꞌi Mekewat Miit tawa Nasare kaipywiat wyti tut meikowo mekewat Iesui e hap het rakat iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­henoi yt iha rakat i pe.
Miꞌi hawyi mekewat yt iha rakat i tikuap hawyi tuwẽ­powat Iesui kape tehay pirik wo — Uipo­wyro ro uipo­wyro ro Morekuat Tawi Emiariru uheha­kye­raꞌat ro En e.

Maꞌato iraniaꞌin muꞌap upiaria — Wãi neiꞌo iꞌatuꞌe. Yt naku i ehay pirik hap iꞌatuꞌe. Epoꞌinik to iꞌatuꞌe wen maꞌato poꞌog neꞌi tuwẽ­powat haty wo kahato hamo — Morekuat Tawi Emiariru uheha­kye­raꞌat En e.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui topy­huꞌat itote muꞌap tote hawyi toꞌe — Eweterut ro uhowawi iwẽpapꞌi kahato hat e muꞌap upiaria pe. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tuerut mekewat sẽtupꞌe hat.
Putꞌokꞌe Iesui yatype hawyi apoꞌe Iesui — Kat e hap etiky­ꞌesat uipo pyi mehĩ apoꞌe tope. Mio tã e pote — Mehĩ e uimoe­ha­pytig i hap epiat hap atiky­ꞌesat kahato pãi e Iesui pe.

— Pyno waku raꞌyn emiky­ꞌesat ewy atunug e Iesui. Pyno waku raꞌyn ereĩneꞌen e. Mesup taꞌyn atum epe emiẽtup ewywuat e. Eraꞌa­kasa ro are katu­pono uimohey kahato hap emoehãite hap topy­huꞌat e Iesui yt iha i rakat pe.

Mio tã toꞌe Iesui hawyi meremo iha i raꞌyn meremo waku i raꞌyn iha ete ihapytig hap waku hap wywo toĩneꞌen kahato. Taꞌa­kasa kuap i raꞌyn hawyi — Waku kahato En Tupana waku kahato En katu­pono waku i raꞌyn uheha e itote tehay se kahato hap ewy tuwehum kahato Tupana kape. Miꞌi hawyi muꞌap upi toto raꞌyn Iesui upi tawa Ieriko kape iwepit kahato hap wywo toto — Waku kahato En waku kahato En yn toꞌe Tupana pe itote. Iꞌewyte iraniaꞌin Iesui minug wakuat kapiat akasa haria teꞌe­ru­wehum yn kahato Tupana ete itote muꞌap upi Iesui toto tawa Ieriko kape turan.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui teke raꞌyn tawa Ieriko pe. Miꞌi hawyi tawa Ieriko sakpo toto mekewat tawa puꞌap upi tuwat. Miꞌi tawa pe toĩneꞌen hekat kahato rakat Sakeu e hap het rakat itotiat. Miꞌi miit ri yt naku i kahato rakat toĩneꞌen iraniaꞌin wanẽtup hawe katu­pono ipotpap Iuteu ywnia wanĩ­kaptia esura­raꞌin powyro toꞌy­wania ekareꞌen pyhyp hamo. Toikat kahato miitꞌin kaipyi iꞌatuekat patꞌok hap wanĩ­kaptia porekuat saꞌup mo. Wanĩ­kaptia porekuat powyro kahato rakano toĩneꞌen mote tuwe­mo­wato kahato teka­reꞌen ete tawa Ieriko tote. Miꞌi hawyi Sakeu taꞌa­kasa teran kahato Iesui kape maꞌato yt itypore i sese rakat pote yt taꞌa­kasa kuap i miitꞌin tok piat sakpo Iesui kape.
Miꞌi pote punꞌe iraniaꞌin eꞌyianme wẽtup ariaꞌyp muꞌap upiat kape hawyi meremo taꞌam haga tote ywaipe pyi tehaꞌat kahato Iesui ewawi taꞌa­kasa teran haype.
Putꞌokꞌe Iesui ariaꞌyp ypyke hawyi tehaꞌat kahato ywaiti hawyi toꞌe — Uhyt Sakeu e eraꞌapyk to uhowawi uhyt e. Mesuwat eꞌat pe at areĩneꞌen neran ewywo eꞌyat pe mehĩ e.
Miꞌi hawyi meremo taꞌapyk hawyi iwepit hap wywo — Hẽ to uhyt e. Waku kahato ereĩneꞌen uiꞌyat pe e Iesui pe.

Maꞌato iraniaꞌin tikuap Sakeu yat kapiat Iesui to hap hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope — Yt naku i Iesui iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono ahewa­nĩkap yat kape toto iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope yt nakuat i kahato rakat yat kape Iesui toto raꞌyn yt Tupana miky­ꞌesat ewy i tutunug iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­py­ꞌahak hap wywo.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toto mekewat muꞌap pyhyp hat upi mekewat Sakeu e hap het rakat upi iꞌyat kape. Putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe itote hawyi teꞌe­renuk hap upi mekewat Sakeu toꞌe Iesui pe — Uhyt e ipatꞌok uhekat yne ti rat atimõꞌẽ mesup yt hekat i rakaria pe e. Pywo ti rat miitꞌin ekareꞌen pyhyp hap koꞌi miitꞌin maꞌat hap koꞌi atum mesup iꞌatuepe e katu­pono atimo­hãpyk teran yne uiminug saꞌag koꞌi uheroꞌok hap koꞌi atipo­re­ra­ꞌaipok teran mesup uimisat koꞌi yne muꞌap upiaria po pyi miitꞌin ekat koꞌi e. Wẽtup ok hyt uꞌi atat uimi­po­hari poꞌog atum 4 hyt uꞌi atipo­re­ra­ꞌaipok tuwe­wawi atum e. Atupo­hari hap koꞌi yt naku i hap ewy atum yne i raꞌyn uimi­maꞌat koꞌi pe e. Mekewat wẽtup hap ete uimi­po­hari koꞌi ete atipo­re­ra­ꞌaipok 4 hap ewywuat ipakup takat koꞌi uimi­maꞌat koꞌi pe e. Pyno atiꞌa­tu­ꞌatoiat teran uiminug saꞌag yne hawyi waku yn atunug neran miꞌi hawyi e Iesui pe Sakeu.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe iraniaꞌin me tawa Ieriko piaria pe — Uruto poꞌog waku iraniaꞌin kai e haria eipe e. Mesup taꞌyn Tupana mieha­kye­raꞌat no topy­huꞌat Mehĩ Sakeu e. Mesup taꞌyn ti rat Ahaꞌa­seꞌi Aparãu emiariru sese toĩneꞌen mehĩ Sakeu katu­pono mesup taꞌyn mehĩ Sakeu waku pe toĩneꞌen Tupana wanẽtup hawe e. Mesup taꞌyn Tupana mieha­kye­raꞌat no topy­huꞌat iꞌewyte yne iꞌyat piaria waku pe toĩneꞌen e. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe mehĩ Sakeu pe — Pyno waku pe raꞌyn mehĩ e mesup taꞌyn Tupana mieha­kye­raꞌat ereĩneꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e Iesui mehĩ Sakeu pe. Pywo ti Uito Eheykeꞌet ariot mesuwat mytyp kape hoꞌo­wasat rakaria kat hamo ariot e. Taꞌi hoꞌo­wasat rakaria ehakye­raꞌat hamo ariot miitꞌin kat hamo e. Maꞌato — Uruto poꞌog iraniaꞌin kai e haria yt atimo­waku kuap i katu­pono — Uruto waku raꞌyn iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi pote yt naku i rakaria wywo uhewyry iꞌatu­muꞌe Tupana kuap hamo e Iesui tawa Ieriko piaria pe — Uruto poꞌog iraniaꞌin kai e haria pe.  PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi miitꞌin tuwat tuwat tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌatuehay kahato muꞌap upi — Pywo ti rat Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Aipo­rekuat nuat tut irane ahewa­nĩ­kaptia akit hamo hawyi waku pe watu­kup­teꞌen i raꞌyn aikotã saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat hap eꞌat piat hap ewy iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope muꞌap upi.

Miꞌi hawyi yt pya i tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kai turan Iesui tiꞌa­tu­muꞌe muꞌap upiaria tehay iãꞌãkap wuo — Saꞌa­wyꞌi so wẽtup tuꞌisa waku rakat hekat kahato rakat wuatꞌi etama piaria mikuap toto raꞌyn tetawa kaipyi morekuat koro kape. — Atiky­ꞌesat wuatꞌi tuꞌi­saria akag wo uinug uruetama pe e hap wywo toto e so.

Maꞌato toto morekuat koro kapiat hap owakai toiꞌa­tu­kaykay raꞌyn toeropat haria akag koꞌi 10 ok takaria tuwe­wawi hawyi so — Areto raꞌyn Morekuat koro kape hawyi atiky­ꞌesat uiꞌairo temiit akag wo mesuwat ahetama piaria wuatꞌi tuꞌi­saria akag wo e so. Pyno areto turan atiky­ꞌesat uhekat eipo pe areto turan imowato hamo e so. Pyno atimõꞌẽ uhekat eipo pe hawyi waku areto maꞌato Morekuat koro uinug wuatꞌi tuꞌi­saria akag wo ahetama piat hawyi tutum uhepe tomiwan uimo­wato hap hawyi meremo araꞌaipok mesuwe hawyi atiky­ꞌesat uimiium ehepiat mowato kahato hap e so temiit 10 ok takaria pe. Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok pe tuereto tutum nu mehit kahato rakat tekat kahato hap hawyi — Pyno areto raꞌyn mesup e. Miꞌi hawyi areĩneꞌen morekuat koro yat pe mekewat tama koro pe hawyi miꞌi turan eweiꞌa­tu­mo­wato kahato o uhekat mesuwe e so. Miꞌi hawyi iwato toimõꞌẽ iꞌatuepe nu mehit rakat hawyi toto tetawa pyi.

Toto raꞌyn tetama pyi turan hawyi so itotiaria tuꞌi­saria teꞌe­ru­wa­ꞌa­tunug hawyi so meremo tuwat morekuat koro kape wẽtup muꞌap upi poꞌog meremo tuwat at kaꞌap hap ewy. Miꞌi hawyi so putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe mekewat tuꞌisa yianmete hawyi so — Morekuat iꞌatuꞌe tut wyti aru wẽtup ok miit uruetama pyi yne mikuap takat iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi miit tiky­ꞌesat kahato uruetu­ꞌisa akag wo uruetama pe wen maꞌato yt uruiky­ꞌesat i rat meiẽwat miit uruetu­ꞌi­saria akag wo iꞌatuꞌe so. Yt naku i etiꞌairo miꞌi miit wuatꞌi tuꞌi­saria akag wo uruetama pe iꞌatuꞌe so.

Pyno mekewat wuatꞌi miitꞌin miky­ꞌesat hekat rakat etama puat gupteꞌen haria yt tikyꞌe hin i mekewat tuꞌisa e. Maꞌato mekewat morekuat eporekuat koro rakat tikyꞌe kahato hawyi — Woronug naꞌyn en uhemiitꞌin sem mesuwat yi totiaria porekuat no e tope. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌaipok taꞌyn tetama kape morekuat koro miꞌairo wo wuatꞌi miitꞌin porekuat no. Miꞌi hawyi so itote hawyi toiꞌa­tu­kaykay raꞌyn tuwe­wawi temiit 10 ok takaria teropat haria aikotã iꞌatu­potpap hap moherep hamo aikotã tomiium saꞌawyi taꞌa­tu­mo­wato hap kuap hamo.

Miꞌi hawyi saꞌa­wyiwuat putꞌokꞌe hawyi toꞌe morekuat pakup we — Saꞌawyi wẽtup eiam howapy nu mehit rakat hekat kahato rakat etum uhepe e. Koitywy 10 eiam howapy nu mehit rakat hekat kahato hap ewy aterut ewawi Uika­ꞌiwat e.

Miꞌi hawyi mekewat Tuꞌisa Wato pakup iwepit kahato hawyi toiwesat — Waku kahato etunug uhekat wywo areto hap turan e. Uhemiit kahato en uhyt e so. Waku rakat rasig en e. Pyno eweꞌeg kahato uhekat wywo pote mesup woronug en uhemiit koro wo 10 uhetawa pe e temiit wakuat pe.
Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok teke henoi hamo — Pyno saꞌa­wyꞌi etoiat uipo pe wẽtup eiam nu mehit rakat hekat rakat e. Koitywy 5 eiam howapy atum epe uika­ꞌiwat e.

Miꞌi hawyi morekuat toꞌe mekewat temiit pe — Waku pyno etunug mehĩ e. Yt uimaꞌat hin i pote mesup atum epe 5 tawa koꞌi iꞌatu­po­ꞌoro epiat hamo e. Waku ereĩneꞌen itote iꞌatue­tu­ꞌisa akag wo e morekuat pakup temiit wakuat pe.

Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup i teke towat etiat enoi hamo — Heno uika­ꞌiwat meiũ ti emiium ok tã e. Saꞌa­wyiwuat emiium ewywuat atum epe e. Uhesokpe ikahu rakat pe atiꞌa­pykok kahato mesuwat emiium hekat rakat e. Koitywy toĩneꞌen ne yne mesuwat sokpe pe emiium iwato hap ok tã. Pywo arekenꞌẽ epupi pote waku pe kahato atunug iheg me mekewat nu imehit kahato koꞌi e. Atiꞌa­pykok kahato katu­pono worokuap kahato en uhyt e. Atikuap wy eweꞌeg kahato hap kaipyi yt ewat i pytkai etiꞌa­tu­po­re­raꞌat ekat koꞌi e. Iꞌewyte yt emikoi i pytkai ehoꞌohep kuap iraniaꞌin ko koꞌi hap atikuap e. Taꞌi uruikuap kahato en aikotã ereĩneꞌen iweꞌeg kahato epotpap nug hap ete ekat mowato hap ete e. Miꞌi pote emiium atisyp yi pe hawyi mesup atum yne i raꞌyn epe e.

Miꞌi hawyi ikaꞌiwat toꞌe tope topy­ꞌahak popuo — Uhemiit saꞌag kahato wo ereĩneꞌen pãi are e. Yt naku i kahato etunug uhekat wywo e. Uipy­ꞌahak hap etikuap pytkai uhekat yt etiꞌa­tu­mo­wato hin i e. Yt uiat i pytkai atipo­re­raꞌat ereꞌe uhepe. Iꞌewyte yt uimikoi pytkai i ahoꞌohep taꞌyn ereꞌe uhepe. Pyno erekenꞌẽ uipupi hawyi kat pote kahu uhekat kahato hap yt etimo­wato i en wẽtup ok potpap nug hap kai e. Kat pote yt etipuru i wẽtup ok pe uhekat mowato hamo e temiit iperup takat pe. Series,
Miꞌi hawyi morekuat pakup toꞌe tesu­ra­raꞌin me — Eweitat ro meiũwat uhekat uhemiit yt iweꞌeg i rakat po pyi hawyi ewetum no ipo piat uimiium uhemiit wakuat pe hekat poꞌog mowato hamo e.
Miꞌi hawyi hesu­ra­raꞌin teꞌe­roꞌe morekuat pakup we — Uruka­ꞌiwat iꞌatuꞌe iwato kahato raꞌyn ipo pe toĩneꞌen 10 eiam howapy raꞌyn toĩneꞌen naꞌyn ipo pe kat pote pyno etum moꞌog tope iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi hawyi morekuat pakup toꞌe tesu­ra­raꞌin me — Pywo pe ti uhekat mowato hat pe poꞌog poꞌog atum aru saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat kai e. Maꞌato yt iweꞌeg i rakat pe uhekat mohit hat pe mio tã are — Saꞌa­wy­ꞌiwuat iwato kahato atum epe maꞌato mesup yt kat i poꞌog atum epe e. Miꞌi hawyi mekewat kurin epo piat ewanuat tuweityk taꞌyn hawyi yt kat i topy­huꞌat epo pe aru e morekuat pakup temiit yt iweꞌeg i rakat pe tekat tomiium yt imowato i hat pe.

Miꞌi hawyi meimuẽwat saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria morekuat pakup wanĩ­kaptia — Yt uruiky­ꞌesat i miꞌi miit urupo­rekuat nuat e haria toiꞌa­tu­po­ꞌoro tesu­ra­raꞌin here­poꞌok tewawiat hamo. Taꞌa­tuerut hawyi mio tã e iꞌatuepe — Pyno saꞌawꞌi yt uiky­ꞌesat hin i uito eipo­rekuat no e. Miꞌi hawyi ehehay saꞌag kahato uhetiat hap atikuap taꞌyn e. Yt naku i kahato eipe uiwa­nẽtup hawe e. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe tesu­ra­raꞌin me — Meremo meiũpe raꞌyn uhowakai te eweiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka ro miꞌiria e so mekewat morekuat pakup itote e Iesui tehay iãꞌãkap wuo. Tuwepiat ihay tehay pun haria pe — Yt naku i Iesui Aika­ꞌiwat no e haria pe.
PIAT EWYMio tã e tohenoi hawyi Iesui toto i raꞌyn muꞌap upi mekewat tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape temiitꞌin sem eꞌyianmete toto.

Putꞌokꞌe mekewat mikoi ypia pe mekewat Uriweira ypia koꞌi eꞌyityꞌok totiat mekewat yi yt pya i tawa hit Pewake kai tawa hit Petania kai hawyi Iesui henoi typy ok temiitꞌin me. Mio tã toꞌe — Eweiwat ro meiẽwat tawa hit kape hawyi putꞌok­ꞌe­weiꞌe itote hawyi eiwe­hytꞌok tawa hit pe turan aru iꞌatuhũ hit Iumenta mẽpyt eweipuẽti itote e. Miꞌi iꞌatuhũ atiky­ꞌesat mesuwe katu­pono iꞌok pe tote uhewyry teran tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape e. Maꞌato yt uwe i te hewyry mekewat iꞌatuhũ hit okpe tote are e. Pyno eweiꞌa­sai­typok iꞌatuhũ hawyi meikowo eweterut uhowawi uihũ wo e.

Itotiaria tikuap teran aru kan hamo iꞌatuhũ asaity eweipok e pote waku eweiꞌa­tu­wesat miꞌiria — Taꞌi Aika­ꞌiwat Iesui tiky­ꞌesat wyti eihũ waku eweiꞌe apoꞌe haria pe e Iesui temiitꞌin typy ok takaria pe.

Tuwat raꞌyn meimuẽwat tawa hit kape hawyi Iesui toꞌe hap ewywuat kahato taꞌa­tu­puẽti putꞌok­ta­ꞌa­tuꞌe itote hawyi. Iꞌatuhũ taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­sai­typok turan putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe mekewat hũ kaꞌi­waria hawyi — Kan hamoĩ uruhũ eweiꞌa­sai­typok hamuat apota­ꞌa­tuꞌe.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui emiitꞌin iꞌatu­wesat — Aika­ꞌiwat Iesui tiky­ꞌesat kahato ti eihũ iꞌatuꞌe Iesui mipo­ꞌo­roria.

Miꞌi hawyi — Pyno waku eweitioto ro iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tu­ꞌe­roto Iumentu hit Iesui kape. Pukꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui kape hawyi taꞌa­tu­po­rokpun naꞌyn taꞌa­tue­sokpe koꞌi mekewat hũ okpe tote hawyi taꞌa­tu­mo­ꞌapyk taꞌyn Iesui ihũ hit okpe tote. Miꞌi hawyi muꞌap upiaria tipo­rokpun taꞌa­tue­sokpe muꞌap tote Iesui to hap owakai ipuꞌap ikahu rakat nug hamo morekuat ewywuat muꞌap nug hamo imõtypot haype taꞌa­tunug.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui ipotꞌapyk mekewat yityꞌok Uriweira ypia piat kaipyi tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kape hawyi toto mekewat muꞌap miitꞌin minug upi toto tohũ hit tote apyk pe ipotꞌapyk. Yt pya hin i tawa wato Ieru­sarẽi kai turan typyꞌi rakaria hupiaria sem — Waku kahato En Tupana iꞌatuꞌe. Waku kahato Emiꞌairo Urupo­rekuat nuat iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tuehay pirik wo. Meiũwat Miit timo­herep kahato Tupana esaika hap yt uwe mesu­wa­rotiat minug ewy i tutunug uruehamo iꞌatuꞌe kahato itote. En Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro sese iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono uruta­ꞌa­kasa raꞌyn eminug koꞌi Emipo­ꞌoro mimo­herep koꞌi iꞌatuꞌe iꞌatu­wepit kahato haype. Miꞌi pote urutu­wehum kahato ewawi Tupana iꞌatuꞌe.
Miꞌi taꞌa­tunug kahato itote hawyi woꞌo­muꞌe haria itotiaria teꞌe­roꞌe Iesui pe — Woꞌo­muꞌe hat iꞌatuꞌe etiꞌa­tu­mo­po­ꞌinik to epotmu­ꞌeria iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pyno miꞌiria iꞌatu­po­ꞌinik uimõ­typot hap ete pote meremo aru mesuwat nu koꞌi muꞌap upiat teꞌe­ru­wẽ­powat uimõ­typot hap — Tut ri tut ri Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Wuatꞌi Ywania Ehakye­raꞌat Hanuat iꞌatuꞌe aru nu koꞌi are e Iesui tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe.
Miꞌi hawyi porap putꞌokꞌe Ieru­sarẽi me hawyi Iesui tehaꞌat tawa wato kape hawyi tuwak popuo toꞌe — Ieru­sarẽi miaria Ieru­sarẽi miaria ariot raꞌyn maꞌato yt uikuap i eiperia e.

Mesup taꞌyn aterut teran ehowawi wuatꞌi eꞌat piat eimo­wepit hap wen maꞌato yt heremo i pote yt eweikat i uimierut e tuwak popuo. Taꞌi Tupana uipo­ꞌoro eheha­kye­raꞌat hamo hawyi eiwo­ꞌo­wese hap wywo eweikup­teꞌen e maꞌato yt eweiky­ꞌesat i pote miꞌi hawyi uimienoi eiwo­ꞌo­wese hap etiat yt heremo i raꞌyn toĩneꞌen e. Migꞌi wo raꞌyn toĩneꞌen yt eweiky­ꞌesat i hawyi e.

Uimohey hap pun haria eipe pote ti aru ehewa­nĩ­kaptia esura­raꞌin sem tõꞌẽ tõꞌẽ kahato irane eimoma hamo are e. Putꞌok­ta­ꞌa­tuꞌe ehetawa wato ete hawyi yne muꞌap taꞌa­tu­pyhyp ehetawa kapiat e. Miꞌi hawyi eimiꞌu yt kat i toĩneꞌen aru e. Miꞌi hawyi yt eiwe­nõꞌẽ kuap i ehetawa pyi. — Miꞌi hawyi ehetawa wato pe tuwe­hytꞌok kahato ehewa­nĩ­kaptia sura­raꞌin sem wẽtup ywania eiwu­ꞌuka hamuat eimoma yne hamuat aru e. Taꞌa­tu­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka torania ehetawa piaria mekewat eꞌat pe aru e. Iꞌewyte ehetawa piaria topap topap yne e. Eiꞌyat koꞌi taꞌa­tu­puruk yne wyti aru e. Yt wẽtup i nu ehetawa piat tukup­teꞌen aru eiꞌyat nug hap katu­pono itote taꞌa­tu­pugha yi kape yne eiꞌyat koꞌi e. Hewo hewo yne nu wato koꞌi yi kape aru are e. Pywo ti rat eimoma hap yn topy­huꞌat aru e. Tupana miꞌa­piheg koꞌi eweipy­huꞌat aru kat pote Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Eheha­kye­raꞌat hanuat mohey hap pun haria eipe pote e Iesui tuwak popuo maꞌato eipe ti yt eweikuap i Tupana heĩneꞌen eipy­ꞌa­setpiat hap e tuwak popuo tetawa Ieru­sarẽi piaria pe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui teke raꞌyn tawa Ieru­sarẽi me hawyi Tupana mõtypot yat koro pe teke hawyi toiꞌa­tu­sopo kahato kareꞌen weneru wene­ruꞌi haria itote. Miꞌi hawyi toꞌe wuatꞌi weneru haria pe — Wãi neiꞌo e yt ewetunug ne Tupana mõtypot yat kat weneru kat weneru hap netap e. Saꞌa­wyꞌi mio tã e Tupana tehay moherep haria miwan me — Uiꞌyat yi tote atiky­ꞌesat wuatꞌi ywania uhowawiat uiwywuat iꞌatuehay hamuat hap atiky­ꞌesat uiꞌyat e Tupana saꞌa­wyꞌi Isaia  pe. Maꞌato eipe ti sero­ꞌokꞌe haria yat no ewetunug naꞌyn e Iesui wuatꞌi kat weneru haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi mekewat eꞌat koꞌi turan wuatꞌi eꞌat pe turan Iesui tiꞌa­tu­muꞌe miitꞌin Tupana mõtypot yat koro piaria. Maꞌato paꞌi akagnia miwan enoi haria iꞌewyte tawa piaria akagnia iꞌauka teran kahato haype itote.
Miꞌi hawyi hewa­nĩ­kaptia tiꞌa­tukat kahato aikotã waku Iesui auka hap maꞌato yne itotiaria iꞌatupap kahato Iesui ehay upi pote yt taꞌa­tu­puẽti i muꞌap iꞌauka hamuat.

PIAT EWYWẽtup eꞌat pe Iesui toĩneꞌen Tupana mõtypot yat pe turan toiꞌa­tu­muꞌe kahato itotiaria tehay wakuat Tupana etiat. Miꞌi turan putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe howawi paꞌi akag koꞌi miwan ehay enoi haria wywo iꞌewyte nagnia akag koꞌi wywo.

Miꞌi hawyi apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe — Uweĩ epoꞌoro gaꞌatpo meketã nug hamo Tupana mõtypot yat pyi uruemiitꞌin sopo hamo iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pyno ahenoi aru ehepe wen maꞌato saꞌa­wyꞌi ewehenoi uhepe uwe ipoꞌoro Iuwãu woꞌo­setꞌok hamo sio Tupana sio miitꞌin e Iesui. — kat pote ti rat etiꞌa­tu­sytpok miitꞌin gaꞌatpo Tupana mõtypot yat pyi iꞌatuꞌe. Yt naku i miꞌi tã etunug yt uruehay upi i iꞌatuꞌe. Pyno uwe kahu epoꞌoro hat miꞌi tã nug hamuat iꞌatuꞌe sio more­kuaria sio ewepyi miꞌi saꞌag hap etunug iꞌatuꞌe.
Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pyno ahenoi aru ehepe uwe uipo­ꞌoro Tupana mõtypot yat apykok hamo maꞌato saꞌa­wyꞌi atiky­ꞌesat uiwesat hap ehepiat e.

Pyno uiwesat ro — Uwe sese ahetꞌok hat Iuwãu poꞌoro hat apo toĩneꞌen sio Tupana tipo­ꞌoro Iuwãu sio miitꞌin tipo­ꞌoro ahetꞌok hap nug hamo apoꞌare e. Uiwesat ro miꞌi hawyi woro­ho­ꞌo­wesat wy uwe uipo­ꞌoro Tupana mõtypot yat hywytip hamo e tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe.

Miꞌi hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope — Aikotã som waku wati­wesat Iesui katu­pono iꞌatu kahato mesuwe ahetꞌok hat Iuwãu mõtypot kahato rakaria iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Pyno — Tupana ipoꞌoro hat watoꞌe pote apoꞌe irane ahepe Iesui — Kat poteĩ pyno yt eweimohey i te urumi­mohey Iuwãu toꞌe aru ahepe iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Maꞌato — Tuwepyi tuwe­po­ꞌoro Iuwãu watoꞌe mesuwe pote mesuwat iraniaꞌin sem Iuwãu kyꞌe haria meremo aiꞌauka wyti aru taꞌa­tu­py­ꞌahak popuo iꞌatuꞌe. Katu­pono miꞌiria — Tupana ehay moherep hat koro Iuwãu iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono taꞌa­tu­mohey kahato te imienoi iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope.

Mio tã iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope hawyi taꞌa­tu­wesat raꞌyn Iesui apoꞌe hap — Yt uruikuap i kahato te uwe sese Iuwãu poꞌoro hat iꞌatuꞌe. Uwe ehay pyi Iuwãu tut miitꞌin setꞌok hamo hap yt uruikuap kahato i te iꞌatuꞌe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Are pãi kat pote yt uiwesat i e. Pyno yt uiwesat i pote uito eipe ewywuat yt woro­ho­ꞌo­wesat i rat uwe hay upi atiꞌa­tu­sytpok mesu­wepyi Tupana mõtypot yat piat yt naku i nug haria e Iesui paꞌi kororia pe miwan ehay moherep haria pe nagnia akagnia pe. Miꞌi hawyi yt kat i toꞌe iꞌatuepe Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Iesui.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi hãꞌãkap wuo Iesui henoi Tupana mõtypot yat koro piaria pe tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe — Wẽtup eꞌat pe so wẽtup yi wato kaꞌiwat warana koi hat tiꞌa­tukoi kahato tewa­rana ypia koro yi wato hap ok tã toikoi. Waku raꞌyn hawyi so toipuru tewa­rana ypia toꞌy­wania pe hawyi toꞌe — Waku etiꞌa­tu­ꞌa­pykok uheꞌyi e hawyi eweium no uhepe saꞌup wuatꞌi ewaty pe warana eweiwe­neru hawyi e warana ypia kaꞌiwat hawyi toto raꞌyn pya wẽtup tama kape hawyi toĩneꞌen motꞌi itote e.

Meiũran mekewat warana ypia haat raꞌyn hawyi mekewat warana ypia kaꞌiwat tipo­ꞌoro temiit pya pyi mekewat warana ypia apykok haria pe towanuat warana sat hamo hoꞌohep hap kaipyi. Maꞌato hemiitꞌin warana ypia apykok haria yt iꞌatu­wese hin i hawyi yt hoꞌoium i haype hawyi imipo­ꞌo­roria pe taꞌa­tuehay saꞌag hawyi taꞌa­tu­pokpok hawyi taꞌa­tu­po­ꞌoro i raꞌyn yt kat i hin i iꞌatupo pe wywo e. Miꞌi hawyi warana ypia kaꞌiwat wẽtup ok i raꞌyn toipo­ꞌoro raꞌyn towa­rana ypia piat ipotpap takaria kape warana koꞌi towanuat saꞌup sat hamo iꞌatu­mi­po­ꞌok­suꞌat hamo maꞌato iꞌewyte yt kat i taꞌa­tu­ha­ꞌupium tope maꞌato yt iꞌatu­wese hin i imipo­ꞌoro ete hawyi taꞌa­tu­pokpok imipo­ꞌo­roria saꞌa­wy­ꞌi­wuaria ewy hawyi taꞌa­tu­po­re­ra­ꞌaipok yt kat i wywo i e.
Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok temiit warana ypia kaꞌiwat tipo­ꞌoro i raꞌyn maꞌato miꞌi miit miꞌi hare taꞌa­tu­ꞌahyk ahyk hawyi taꞌa­tupun naꞌyn warana ypia pyi e.

Miꞌi hawyi warana ypia kaꞌiwat tuwa­nẽtup — Aikotã waku atunug uimi­po­ꞌo­roria pun haria ete e tuwepe hawyi toꞌe tuwepe — Pyno atikuap taꞌyn aikotã waku atunug e tuwepe taꞌi Uhaꞌyru sese uimi­kyꞌe kahato atipo­ꞌoro hawyi ti aru taꞌa­tu­mõ­typot miꞌi miit uimi­po­ꞌoro katu­pono Uhaꞌyru sese miꞌi uimi­po­ꞌoro pote e tuwa­nẽtup hawe.

Miꞌi hawyi toipo­ꞌoro raꞌyn wen maꞌato tewa­rana ypia apykok haria teꞌe­ra­ꞌa­kasa hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope — Toꞌiro waku wati­ꞌauka mesuwat yi warana ypia koro kaꞌiwat saꞌyru iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Taꞌi pãi wati­ꞌauka haꞌyru hawyi ti aru haꞌyru ywot ikuꞌuro hawyi yt kat i ipowatꞌyp hawyi mesuwat yi yne aiwanuat tukup­teꞌen hawyi hekat rakaria wo watoĩ­neꞌen iꞌatuꞌe saꞌag. Pyno toꞌiro warana ypia koro kaꞌiwat pakup auka hamo hawyi ikuꞌuro hawyi yne iꞌywot ekat sem topy­huꞌat aipo pe raꞌyn iꞌatuꞌe teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope.

Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tusat haꞌyru hawyi taꞌa­tu­pugha saꞌag ipiit iꞌywot mikoi ypia pyi hawyi itote taꞌa­tu­ꞌauka saꞌag neꞌi haꞌyru e Iesui hãꞌãkap wuo tuwepiat ihay tewa­nĩ­kaptia pe. Miꞌi hawyi Iesui apoꞌe iꞌatuepe — Uiwesat ro kat pyno aru kat pyno aru haꞌyru ywot tunug aru tomikoi ypia apykok haria saꞌag ete e.

Miꞌi hawyi yt iwesat i. Miꞌi pote Iesui toꞌe toꞌauka teran haria pe — Pyno ahenoi ehepe kat som tutunug mekewat Morekuat akag tosa­ꞌyru auka haria ete e taꞌi meremo tut tesu­ra­raꞌin sem wywo hawyi toiꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato Tosa­ꞌyru auka haria hawyi tutum aru tewa­rana ypia eꞌyi wato wẽtup ywania po pe raꞌyn hawyi toipag teꞌyi wato tomikoi warana ypia koro wẽtup ywania po pe iꞌapykok hamo e Iesui toꞌy­wania pe tehay pun haria pe. Miꞌi hawyi itotiaria tikuap Iesui ehay iãꞌãkap hawyi — Yt naku i kahato ehay aiꞌy­wania ete Uhyt iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tehaꞌat tewa­nĩ­kaptia ewawi hawyi toꞌe — Pyno topy­huꞌat aru uiꞌe hap ewy aikotã Tupana toꞌe saꞌa­wyꞌi tehay miwan miat puo ewy e. Mio tã toꞌe — Waku ewetunug uimõ­typot yat Mesuwat Nu ikahu rakat iheg nakat kawiat e Tupana tomi­ꞌai­roria pe toꞌyat nug haria pe wen maꞌato — Yt naku i kahato Miꞌi Nu Tupana Miꞌairo iꞌatuꞌe hawyi inug haria yt tiky­ꞌesat i maꞌato — Miꞌi Nu poꞌog hesaika tora­niaꞌin kai poꞌog ikahu uimõ­typot yat nug hamo e Tupana tomiwan me e Iesui tuwepiat. maꞌato miꞌi pytkai eweipugha Tupana Miꞌairo e Iesui tomohey hap pun haria pe.

Uwe uwe yt tiky­ꞌesat i Mekewat Nu Tupana Mõtypot Yat Nug Hamuat miꞌi miit ri yt iweꞌeg hin i topy­huꞌat e katu­pono miꞌi hawyi Mekewat Nu Wato toipun turan toꞌakit hap tokag pik hap topy­huꞌat e miwan me e. Iꞌewyte uwe uwe tipun Mekewat Nu hawyi taꞌaipok tuwe­wawi hawyi mekewat miit Mekewat Nu mikuꞌi wo topy­huꞌat e. Taꞌi e Mekewat Nu Koro tote eiwe­taꞌat hawyi eipiit pokꞌe itote hawyi Mekewat Nu Koro mimo­kuꞌi wo eweikup­teꞌen aru wuatꞌi eꞌat pe e Iesui toꞌauka kat haria pe tuwepiat tehay iãꞌãkap hawuo.

Mio tã toꞌe hawyi paꞌi akag koꞌi iꞌewyte nagnia ehay enoi haria teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope — Yt naku i Iesui ehay ahete iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Pywo pe ti ahetiat tohenoi mekewat hãꞌãkap wuo iꞌatuꞌe. Miꞌi pote taꞌa­tu­pytyk teran Iesui iꞌauka hamo maꞌato miitꞌin pupi teꞌe­ro­kenꞌẽ i. Katu­pono iraniaꞌin Iesui mimu­ꞌeria — Waku kahato aimuꞌe Iesui iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope miꞌi tupono yt taꞌa­tu­pytyk kuap i. Watat Iesui hawyi ipotmu­ꞌeria aiꞌauka rakaria wo tukup­teꞌen iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope.

Taꞌa­tukat kahato Iesui pytyk hamo wãtym muat hap yt heremo i hawuo. Taꞌa­tu­haꞌup nug ihainiaꞌin me yt nakuaria i pe Iesui maꞌat haria taꞌa­tuehay wo. Miꞌiria wakuaria ewywuaria tõꞌẽ taꞌa­tuehay wuat Iesui maꞌat hamo. Iꞌatu­po­ꞌoro haria taꞌa­tupag neran Iesui taꞌa­tu­po­rekuat nuat po pe iꞌauka hamo. Iesui ihay saꞌag hap morekuat ete hap taꞌa­tukat hawyi.

Putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe hawyi taꞌa­tu­maꞌat reran taꞌa­tuehay wo — Woꞌo­muꞌe hat koro iꞌatuꞌe hãpyk kahato emienoi miitꞌin me uruwa­nẽtup hawe iꞌatuꞌe. Uruikuap aikotã Tupana miky­ꞌesat yn ewy etunug miitꞌin me iꞌatuꞌe. Iꞌewyte pywo pe yn uruwesat hap uruikuap iꞌatuꞌe. Taꞌi yt erekenꞌẽ hin i rasig miitꞌin pupi Tupana ehay etimo­herep wuatꞌi miitꞌin me turan iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe. Taꞌi uruikuap aikotã waku kahato ereĩneꞌen wuatꞌi miitꞌin kyꞌe hap ete sio more­kuaria sio aheropat haria iꞌatuꞌe. Uruikuap aikotã miit emiit powyro hano ereĩneꞌen iꞌewyte miit akag koꞌi powyro hano ereĩneꞌen wy iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Pyno ehenoi uruepe sio waku watum saꞌup aipo­rekuat uruewa­nĩ­kaptia pe mekewat wẽtup ywania Humanu ywania porekuat wato Sesa e hap het rakat pe sio yt iꞌatuꞌe. Waku watum morekuat Sesa pe imiẽtup ewy sio yt apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe imaꞌat hamo.
Miꞌi hawyi meremo Iesui tomaꞌat hap toikuap tuwepe hawyi toꞌe iꞌatuepe.

— Eweterut ro uhowawi mekewat saꞌup wẽtup eꞌat piat aipotpap saꞌup mekewat wẽtup imehit rakat kawiat e. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌatuium iꞌape rakat Iesui pe hawyi apoꞌe iꞌatuepe — Pyno uwe miit akag iãꞌãkap mesuwe miwan me uwe set toĩneꞌen meiũ saꞌup iꞌape tote e. Miꞌi pote — Taꞌi mekewat morekuat koro Sesa e hap iãꞌãkap mekewat Sesa set itote toĩneꞌen miwan me iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­wesat.

Pyno morekuat wato Sesa set toĩneꞌen itote pote Sesa wanuat toĩneꞌen are e. Miꞌi pote morekuat Sesa wanuat tohẽtup iꞌape koꞌi pote ewetum no tope morekuat Sesa saꞌup are e. Iꞌewyte Tupana miẽtup hap ok tã saꞌup ewywuat ewetum no Tupana wanuat Tupana pe are e Iesui tomaꞌat reran e haria pe apoꞌe haria pe.

Miꞌi hawyi teꞌe­ru­we­mõti kahato Iesui pupi yt taꞌa­tu­maꞌat kuap i haype katu­pono Iesui poꞌog poꞌog iweꞌeg nakat tomaꞌat reran haria kai pote. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌatu­pohep taꞌyn miitꞌin sem ehamo Iesui apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe hap. Miꞌi hawyi yt kat iꞌatuꞌe kuap i itote miitꞌin ehamo maꞌato teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup kahato Iesui piat taꞌa­tu­wesat hap kape.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi tõꞌẽ Iesui ewawi Tupana ehay miwan miat miitꞌin muꞌe haria akag koꞌi Satu­seuria e hap koꞌi. Miꞌiria ti — Aiku­ꞌuro hawyi yt kat i raꞌyn aheĩneꞌen pakup i hap e haria. Tõꞌẽ hawyi apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe — Woꞌo­muꞌe hat aheꞌa­seꞌi Musei miwan me mio tã toꞌe ahepe — Eykeꞌet ikuꞌuro hawyi maꞌato yt kat i te mẽpyt rakat pote waku iykeꞌet i hehiwu heꞌaito wo toĩneꞌen iywyt saꞌyru nug hamo hakiꞌyt nug hamo ikuꞌuro yt kat i haipe­piaria pote e ti ahaꞌa­seꞌi Musei tomiwan me iꞌatuꞌe.
— Pyno saꞌa­wyꞌi so tukup­teꞌen so 6 ywytꞌin taꞌa­tuy­keꞌet etawa pe. Iꞌatuy­keꞌet toĩneꞌen teha­ryꞌi wywo hawyi ikuꞌuro yt kat hin i haꞌyru hakiꞌyt te turan ikuꞌuro so.
Miꞌi hawyi so iywyt poꞌog wuat yian nakat wywo raꞌyn hehiwu maꞌato iywyt ikuꞌuro wy yt kat i imẽpyt i te turan.

Miꞌi hawyi so wẽtup ok iywyt wywo raꞌyn hehiwu toĩneꞌen maꞌato iꞌewyte yt imẽpyt i te turan ikuꞌuro so. Mio tã hap ewy 6 ok takaria iywytꞌin hehiwu wywo toĩneꞌen tuereto hawyi yne so topap hawyi taꞌa­tue­hiwu yt kat i imẽpyt rakano te so.
Miꞌi hawyi so iꞌewyte iꞌatue­hiwu ikuꞌuro iꞌatuꞌe yt imẽpyt i te turan ikuꞌuro so iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.
Pyno uruikuap teran karãpeĩ tukup­teꞌen yne miitꞌin guꞌuro pyi hawyi apuru uwe wary wo aru mekewat hiwu iꞌatuꞌe katu­pono 7 ok heꞌaito apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat — Pywo pe ti mesu­wa­ro­tiaria woꞌo­kyiꞌat hap taꞌa­tunug ihainiaꞌin hary­po­riaꞌin aikotã aikotã aheko ewy wen maꞌato atipy pe yt miꞌi tã hin i e. Taꞌi miitꞌin tuwẽtem guꞌuro pyi hawyi atipy piaria ewywuaria tukup­teꞌen wuatꞌi eꞌat pe yt kat i woꞌo­kyiꞌat hap itote yt taꞌa­tunug i woꞌo­kyiꞌat hap itote are e.
Katu­pono atipy piaria ewywuaria wo teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat miꞌiria tuwe­nõꞌẽ guꞌuro pyi hawyi yt iꞌatu­ku­ꞌuro i wuatꞌi eꞌat pe tukup­teꞌen Tupana mẽpytꞌin sese wo are e.

Iꞌewyte ahaꞌa­seꞌi Musei miwan kaipyi wati­muꞌe hawyi watikuap aheĩneꞌen pakup i hap watu­wẽtem guꞌuro pyi hap watikuap katu­pono mio tã toꞌe Musei tomiwan me — Taꞌi mekewat ariaꞌyp wukꞌe hap kaipyi Tupana toꞌe uhepe — Uito ti ewat eꞌaseꞌi Aparãu eTupana e. Uito ti eꞌaseꞌi Isaki eTupana e uhepe. Iꞌewyte Uito ti ewat eꞌaseꞌi Iako eTupana e uhepe ariaꞌyp wukꞌe hap kaipyi e Musei tomiwan me mekewat eꞌat ihay Tupana wywo hap eꞌat pe turan e. Miꞌi tupono ahaꞌa­seꞌi Musei miwan kaipyi watikuap ahaꞌa­seꞌi Aparãu Isaki Ioko toĩneꞌen ne taꞌa­tu­ku­ꞌuro pytkai katu­pono Ahetu­pana ieĩneꞌen haria eTupana wo toĩneꞌen are. Yt naku i map haria eTupana Ahetu­pana toĩneꞌen watoꞌe e. Taꞌi ieĩneꞌen haria eTupana katu­pono Musei mio tã e — Tupana ti gupteꞌen haria ahaꞌa­seꞌi Aparãu Isaki Ioko eTupana toĩneꞌen Aparãu Isaki Ioko ikuꞌuro rakaria tukup­teꞌen pytkai Musei toĩneꞌen mesuwat yi tote turan pytkai mio tã e.
Miꞌi hawyi wẽtup ok miwan ehay enoi hat itote toꞌe Iesui pe — Woꞌo­muꞌe hat waku kahato uruwesat hap e.

Miꞌi hawyi yt apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe kuap i poꞌog naꞌyn Iesui pe miwan kuap kahato rakaria. Miꞌi hawyi iꞌatu­ponik taꞌyn — Are pãi iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup hawe iwesat kuap kahato Iesui pote yt wati­ꞌa­parap kuap i Miꞌi ahehay wo iꞌatuꞌe. Taꞌi Miꞌi Miit poꞌog iweꞌeg aikai iꞌatuꞌe Iesui piat taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup hawe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui toꞌe i Musei miwan kuap kahato rakaria pe yt apotoꞌe hap wesat kuap i rakaria pe — Woꞌo­muꞌe haria e kat pote ri rat eweiꞌe eimuꞌe haria pe — Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Aipo­rekuat nuat ri morekuat Tawi emiariru emiariru kaipywiat tuwe­mo­herep eweiꞌe ahepe e. Katu­pono saꞌa­wyꞌi sese ahaꞌa­seꞌi pot morekuat Tawi toꞌe tomiwan me towepy hawe — Uipo­typot koro Tupana toꞌe Uipo­typot koro Tupana pe — Eraꞌapyk o Uimi­mõ­typot no mesuwe uipo sese kai e. Waku ereĩneꞌen mesuwe uikai hawyi ti aru atunug ewanĩ­kaptia yne epy ywytꞌok­pype e TUPANA UIKAꞌIWAT pe e ahaꞌa­seꞌi morekuat Tawi towepy hawe e.

Pyno Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Aika­ꞌiwat nuat toĩneꞌen pãi Tawi KAꞌIWAT KORO wo e. Kat pote pyno eweiꞌe — Morekuat Tawi emiariru emiariru topy­huꞌat aru Tupana Mipo­ꞌoro Aika­ꞌiwat Koro wo yt Tawi e hap ewywuat e Iesui tuwepiat e yt tomohey i haria pe Iesui morekuat Tawi kaꞌiwat pote mio tã.
PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi itotiaria teꞌe­ru­wa­nẽtup kahato Iesui e hap kape turan Iesui toꞌe temiitꞌin me.

Uheka­tu­wyria e eiweꞌeg wo o miitꞌin ehamo miitꞌin mikuap mo watunug waku aiwe­mõ­typot hamo aiwe­mo­wato hamo yt Tupana mõtypot hap kyꞌesat hap wywo are e. Katu­pono yt naku i wato­py­huꞌat typy ehay moherep haria ewy are e. Miꞌiria ti — Waku poꞌog uruto iraniaꞌin kai iꞌatuꞌe taꞌa­tu­wa­nẽtup hawe e. — Waku poꞌog uruto eimuꞌe haria akag wo eweiꞌe uruepe iꞌatuꞌe ahepe. Miꞌiria taꞌa­tu­mõ­typot hap miitꞌin miat yn taꞌa­tu­ky­ꞌesat taꞌa­tu­minug waku hap kaipyi miitꞌin ehamo miitꞌin mikuap mo. Yne waku hap taꞌa­tunug wen maꞌato Tupana mõtypot hap kape yt teꞌe­ru­we­wa­nẽtup hin i e. More­kuaria wywo yn teꞌe­ra­ꞌapyk teran haype Tupana mõtypot yat hawe ienuk hap iwato rakat hap tote — Eiwe­haꞌat ro uruewawi e hap yn toĩneꞌen iꞌatu­pyꞌa pe. Yt naku i miꞌiria ewywuat watoĩ­neꞌen e Iesui temiitꞌin me ahepe.

Miꞌiria iꞌatu­wẽpap se kahato Tupana kape maꞌato yt pywo pe i e. Iꞌatuehay iꞌywop kahato taꞌa­tunug Tupana kape miitꞌin ehamo miitꞌin mikuap mo — Uruto Tupana kuap kahato haria e hamo iraniaꞌin me maꞌato yt Tupana kape hin i iꞌatuehay are e. Yt eweimohey teiꞌo miꞌiria katu­pono yt pywo pe i iꞌatuehay se maꞌato ahekat kyꞌewi Tupana mohey haria tukup­teꞌen are e. Taꞌi iꞌatuehay at Tupana kape miitꞌin ehamo miitꞌin mikuap mo. Iꞌywop kahato taꞌa­tunug taꞌa­tuehay Tupana kape wuatꞌi miitꞌin ehamo maꞌato yt pywo pe i e. Eiweꞌeg wo o pyno mekewat typy sehay nug haria pupi are e Iesui ahepe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui tehaꞌat miitꞌin kape iꞌatumiium Tupana kapiat hap kape tehaꞌat kahato hawyi taꞌa­kasa raꞌyn hekat rakaria miium hap kape. Iwato kahato taꞌa­tupag heiam me Tupana mõtypot hamo.

Iꞌewyte taꞌa­kasa wẽtup ok hiwu yt hekat rakat i itote hap kape taꞌa­kasa. Miꞌi hawyi hiwu tum naꞌyn tomiium kurin sese hap ewy tutum katu­pono typy kurin kat ape yn totopag mekewat yparakai tote Tupana kapiat imiium heiam ikaꞌa pe totopag hap kape taꞌa­kasa Iesui.

Miꞌi hiwu kape tehaꞌat hawyi Iesui toꞌe temitꞌin me — Eiwe­haꞌat ro mekewat hiwu kape mekewat yt hekat i kahato rakat kape katu­pono mekewat hiwu tum iwato kahato Tupana pe e. Poꞌog poꞌog tutum Tupana pe iraniaꞌin hekat rakaria miium hap kai are pãi e. Katu­pono iraniaꞌin hekat rakaria taꞌa­tue­ka­reꞌen sem kaipyi heĩpyt hit yn taꞌatuium Tupana pe maꞌato mekewat hiwu tum naꞌyn Tupana pe tomiꞌu yne saꞌup are tutum naꞌyn yne tomoieĩ­neꞌen sese hamuat saꞌup Tupana pe mesup e. Miꞌi pote areꞌe ehepe mekewat hiwu miium poꞌog Tupana mowepit hap topy­huꞌat torania hekat rakaria miium kai katu­pono tutum yne yne tope pote are e Iesui topot­mu­ꞌeria pe ahepe.

PIAT EWYMiꞌi hawyi Iesui potmu­ꞌeria teꞌe­ra­haꞌat kahato Tupana mõtypot yat ikahu kahato hap etiat hawyi teꞌe­roꞌe toꞌope — Pãi iꞌatuꞌe ikahu kahato mesuwat Tupana mõtypot yat iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Iwato kahato tig mesu­wa­rotiat nu koro koꞌi Tupana mõtypot yat iꞌatu­minug iꞌatuꞌe. Waku kahato mesuwe iꞌatuꞌe. Eiwe­haꞌat ro mekewat miitꞌin miium koꞌi Tupana kapiat hap kape iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope. Taꞌi taꞌa­tu­mo­kahu kahato Tupana mõtypot hap yat mesuwe iꞌatuꞌe toꞌope.

Mio tã iꞌatuꞌe hawyi Iesui toꞌe iꞌatuepe — Uhemiitꞌin e eiwe­haꞌat ro meiũwat nu koro koꞌi kape e. Taꞌi mesu­wa­rotiat nu koro koꞌi ikahu kahato pytkai iwato kahato pytkai hewo hewo wyti aru hawyi yt kat i aru wẽtup nu koro topy­huꞌat mekewat eꞌat pe toꞌo­tote tote rakat are e.

Miꞌi hawyi heka­tu­wyria apoꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe Iesui pe — Urumuꞌe hat iꞌatuꞌe karãpe aru pãi mesuwat nu koro koꞌi hewo hewo hap topy­huꞌat iꞌatuꞌe. Aikotã aru pyno uruikuap mekewat eꞌat putꞌokꞌe hap iꞌatuꞌe Iesui pe.

Miꞌi hawyi Iesui tiꞌa­tu­wesat topot­po­ꞌo­roria pe — Eiweꞌeg wo o are katu­pono wyti aru uhet wywo uhet eroꞌok haria putꞌok­ꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe ehepe eimaꞌat hamo are. — Uito Iesui ti rat iꞌatuꞌe wyti aru. Uito ti ariot raꞌyn eipo­rekuat koro wuat iꞌatuꞌe aru. Tupana mipo­ꞌoro uito wuatꞌi miitꞌin porekuat nuat iꞌatuꞌe aru õꞌẽ haria. — Araꞌaipok taꞌyn manaꞌin uhytꞌiꞌin iꞌatuꞌe aru ehepe wen maꞌato yt eweiwa­nẽtup teiꞌo iꞌatueso rakaria kape are katu­pono eimaꞌat hamo tõꞌẽ are. Yt pywo piat rakaria i miꞌiria pote e. Ehekat kyꞌewi eipiit kyꞌewi tõꞌẽ aru — Uito Tupana mipo­ꞌoro sese e haria e Iesui ahepe.

— Taꞌi mekewat eꞌat pe wyti aru wuꞌuka hap koꞌi kahato eweikuap yne mesu­wa­rotiat wuꞌuka hap etiat eweikuap aru e. Miꞌi hawyi yt kat hin i woꞌo­wese hap mesu­wa­rote hap ewywuat eweipuẽti aru are e. Yt ikahu hin i hap ewy miitꞌin toꞌo­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka atuꞌuka kahato wyti aru hap kape eiwa­ꞌa­kasa pytkai yt eweikenꞌẽ miꞌi pupi katu­pono poꞌog poꞌog saꞌag miꞌi eꞌat kai turan putꞌokꞌe mekewat hoꞌopot hoꞌopot hap eꞌat koro are e. Miꞌi hawyi woꞌo­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka atuꞌuka sakpo hap eꞌat wyti aru putꞌokꞌe are e. Miꞌi hawyi more­kuaria koro koꞌi toꞌo­moma teran aru hawyi toꞌo­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka atuꞌuka iraniaꞌin ywania epore­kuaria koꞌi wywo e.

— Iꞌewyte wyti aru mekewat eꞌat yt naku i hap koro owakai mesuwat yi aipytyp huruk hurukꞌe kahato tyryꞌe tyryꞌe hap ewy hawyi yt kat hin i miitꞌin miꞌu mesuwat yi tote toĩneꞌen are e. Miꞌi hawyi wuatꞌi etama piaria hesyꞌat kahato rakaria wo tukup­teꞌen e. Miꞌi hawyi miitꞌin satyꞌi satyꞌi hap yt ikahu hin i hap ewy teꞌe­ru­we­mo­herep aru mesu­wa­rote e Iesui. Taꞌi yt naku i hap yn wyti aru miitꞌin ete taꞌa­tu­puẽti are e. Iꞌewyte atipy wyti aru yt aimikuap ewy hin i topy­huꞌat aru katu­pono ipoity kahato uiꞌe hap ewywuat hap kape eweiꞌa­kasa aru e. Taꞌi atipy kaipyi ywaiti pyi hewo hewo kahato miitꞌin ete yt naku i hap ewywuat yt karãpe i eweiꞌa­kasa hap ewywuat e. Miꞌi hap koꞌi kape eiwe­haꞌat turan waku eiwa­tetup mesuwat uimienoi kape e.

Maꞌato mekewat eꞌat pe wyti aru mesu­wa­ro­tiaria yt uimohey haria eipytyk kahato wyti aru ehatyꞌi hatyꞌi hamo are e Iesui. Taꞌi Tupana mõtypot hap yat kape eheroto eipe hawyi — Yt nakuaria i kahato miꞌiria iꞌatuꞌe ehepiat uipot­po­ꞌo­roria eipe pote are e. Miꞌi hawyi wyti aru taꞌa­tu­pyhik kahato eipe are e. Morekuat koro koꞌi tuꞌi­saria eiꞌauka teran haria tukup­teꞌen uhemiit eipe pote are e.

— Maꞌato eheroto haria pe iꞌewyte more­kuaria pe waku ehenoi uhehay wakuat iꞌatuepe eweikup­teꞌen iꞌatu­py­ꞌa­setpe turan mekewat eꞌat. Ereĩneꞌen sura­raꞌin po pe pytkai waku ewehenoi ewanĩ­kaptia pe sehay wakuat uhetiat e.
— Yt eweiwa­nẽtup teiꞌo saꞌa­wyꞌi — Kat som waku aru areꞌe uiꞌauka teran haria pe iꞌatu­wesat hap ete are e.

Katu­pono mekewat eꞌat saꞌag me aru uito ti aru areĩneꞌen eiwywo kahato hawyi atopag eiwẽ pe uhehay iꞌatu­wesat hamuat are e. Taꞌi aikotã waku kahato hap ahenoi ehepe e. Miꞌi hawyi ehewa­nĩ­kaptia yt taꞌa­tu­mohit kuap i eiꞌe hap hawyi paaꞌi­ꞌa­tuꞌe uhehay wakuat eiwẽ pywiat pupi are e.

Pywo ti rat meiũran aru eiꞌy­wotꞌin eityꞌin yt uimohey i haria yt iꞌatu­wese hin i ehete uhehay upiaria eipe pote iꞌewyte eheka­tu­wyria sese wyti aru eimaꞌat hanuaria teꞌe­ro­py­huꞌat uikyꞌe haria sese eipe pote are e. Miꞌi hap eꞌat pe eika­tu­wyria sese tiꞌa­tu­kaykay sura­raꞌin sem eiꞌauka hamo are e. Miꞌi hawyi taꞌa­tu­ho­ꞌo­ꞌa­tu­ꞌuka kahato uhehay moherep haria mekewat eꞌat pe are e.
Yt uwe i eiky­ꞌesat haria tukup­teꞌen mekewat eꞌat pe uikai eweikup­teꞌen eipe pote are e.
